T03TD3788E:1b-1: panytsa bim sha ta sa ha sri ka a'arya pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta au pa de sha aa bhi sa ma ya aa lam k'a ra sh'astra sya k'a ri k'a bartik'a /
T03TD3788E:1b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha [dd] rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par 'grel pa /
T03TD3788E:1b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03TD3788E:1b-5: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang //
T03TD3788E:1b-6: 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
T03TD3788E:1b-7: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag kun mkhyen pa //
T03TD3788E:1b-8: sangs rgyas nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ldan yum de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03TD3788E:1b-9: don gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:1b-10: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:2a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa gsum gyi rang bzhin tha dad med pa'i yon tan gyis 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod @2a * //
T03TD3788E:2a-2: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi man ngag de bshad par dam bcas nas /
T03TD3788E:2a-3: 'di ltar rnam par bshad par byed pas mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan nye bar bshad par bya'o snyam du dgongs so //
T03TD3788E:2a-5: mdo'i don bsdus nas tshig bsdus pas skye bo blo dman pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun par rgya cher rnam par phye bas shes par bya ba'i ched du smras pa phyag 'tshal ba nye bar dgod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa don yong par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:2a-6: 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:2a-7: ci mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan bzhi bsdus pa yin nam /
T03TD3788E:2a-9: yang na rnam pa bsdus pas rgyan du gyur pa yin /
T03TD3788E:2a-11: phyogs dang po ltar yin na /
T03TD3788E:2a-12: 'bad pa don med pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:2a-14: mdo 'di las mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos dag las ma smos pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de bshad pa ni med do //
T03TD3788E:2a-15: gnyis pa ltar na rnam par byang ba'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po ma bsdus pas /
T03TD3788E:2a-16: 'di gang gi gnyen po yin par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:2a-17: gsum pa ltar na yang rnam pa bzhi med pa tsam zhig bsdus pa'i phyir don rtogs pa med pas cung zad kyang ma bshad pa yin no zhe na /
T03TD3788E:2b-0: phyogs gsum car @2b gyis kyang bsdus pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:2b-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:2b-6: thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:2b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:2b-9: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung bar 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:2b-10: rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
T03TD3788E:2b-11: lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin no //
T03TD3788E:2b-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
T03TD3788E:2b-14: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad 'tshal ba nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags /
T03TD3788E:2b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03TD3788E:2b-16: rab 'byor thams cad ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams ji snyed pa 'di tsam yin la /
T03TD3788E:2b-17: de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi /
T03TD3788E:2b-18: lam thams cad kyang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:2b-19: rnam pa thams cad kyang ma yin pa de'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:2b-20: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni thams cad shes pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:2b-22: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa 'tshal ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags /
T03TD3788E:2b-24: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyan thos kyi lam gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:2b-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:2b-26: sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa'i lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing /
T03TD3788E:2b-27: lam thams cad shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:2b-28: de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing de dag gi lam gyi bya ba yang bya ste /
T03TD3788E:2b-29: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:2b-30: sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:2b-31: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma sbyangs par de dag gi yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o //
T03TD3788E:3a-0: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag @3a * //
T03TD3788E:3a-1: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags /
T03TD3788E:3a-3: rab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-5: mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams rab tu brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-7: mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de /
T03TD3788E:3a-8: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:3a-9: de lta bas na de ni gzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-11: rnam pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsdus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin pas zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:3a-12: 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:3a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de du zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:3a-14: de la thams cad shes pas ni nyon mongs pa'i ma rig pa tsam spangs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:3a-15: lam shes pa nyid kyis ni gnyen po thams cad kun nas bskyed do //
T03TD3788E:3a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:3a-17: yang thams cad shes pa nyid ni chos 'di dag ji snyed pa la brten pa'i 'bras bu bdag tu rmongs pa spangs pa can yin no //
T03TD3788E:3a-18: lam shes pa nyid ni theg pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-19: de kho na nyid mngon sum du mi byed pa rten pa 'bras bu sems can ma bsdus pa sdud pa dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-20: sems can yongs su ma smin pa smin par byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-21: sems can yongs su ma grol ba grol bar byed pa can yin no //
T03TD3788E:3a-22: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi spyi'i rten can 'bras bu nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-23: yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:3a-24: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa can no //
T03TD3788E:3a-25: yang rnam pa gang gis na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya zhe na /
T03TD3788E:3a-26: rab 'byor rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste /
T03TD3788E:3a-28: zhi ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3788E:3a-30: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa la dmigs pa /
T03TD3788E:3a-31: bdag po'i rkyen ni dran pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:3b-0: rnam @3b pa ni zhi bas mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:3b-1: rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po gnyis med pa ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:3b-2: de lta yin na 'gog pa dmigs pa dang ldan pa des 'gog pa thob par 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:3b-3: de ni zhi ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:3b-4: des 'gog pa yin par mi bzhed de ;
T03TD3788E:3b-5: rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:3b-6: 'gog pa ni ye shes yin te /
T03TD3788E:3b-7: de lta bu gang yin pa la ni 'gog par bzhed do //
T03TD3788E:3b-8: yang ci kun mkhyen gsum po 'di dag spangs par gyur pa la khyad par mchis sam /
T03TD3788E:3b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba spangs pas khyad par yod do //
T03TD3788E:3b-12: kun rdzob tu de dag la khyad mchis zhes bgyi'am /
T03TD3788E:3b-13: rab 'byor bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te 'on kyang de dag gis 'dod chags dang /
T03TD3788E:3b-15: gti mug spangs pa yod do //
T03TD3788E:3b-16: nyan thos rnams la ni lus ngag gi rnam 'gyur so so'i skye bo bzhin du 'jug go zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:3b-17: dper na dge slong mchong rgyug byed pa bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:3b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:3b-19: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:3b-20: sangs rgyas nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ldan yum de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs pa la /
T03TD3788E:3b-21: de ji lta bu zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes 'dri ba la /
T03TD3788E:3b-22: mngon rtogs bdag nyid bdun yin par //
T03TD3788E:3b-23: shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bya //
T03TD3788E:3b-24: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03TD3788E:3b-25: thams cad shes pa nyid dang gsum //
T03TD3788E:3b-26: rnam kun rtse mor bcas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:3b-27: mthar gyis bcas dang skad cig bdag / chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste //
T03TD3788E:3b-28: rnam pa brgyad du bsdus pa yin //
T03TD3788E:3b-29: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03TD3788E:3b-30: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03TD3788E:3b-31: sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
T03TD3788E:3b-32: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03TD3788E:3b-33: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ngo //
T03TD3788E:3b-34: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03TD3788E:3b-35: tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
T03TD3788E:3b-36: rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid du 'dod //
T03TD3788E:3b-37: mog mog por byed la sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-2: 'di dang gzhan gyi phan yon gyis //
T03TD3788E:4a-3: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3788E:4a-4: byed pa dang ni mos pa dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-5: bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-6: bsngo dang rjes su yi rang dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-7: de rnams yid la byed pa gzhan //
T03TD3788E:4a-8: bsgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes //
T03TD3788E:4a-9: bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam //
T03TD3788E:4a-10: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi //
T03TD3788E:4a-11: lam shes de 'drar shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:4a-12: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
T03TD3788E:4a-13: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-14: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-15: thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
T03TD3788E:4a-16: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-17: sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-18: mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ba yin //
T03TD3788E:4a-20: rnam par sbyor ba bcas rnams dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-21: yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas //
T03TD3788E:4a-22: thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-23: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03TD3788E:4a-24: srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-25: zhing dag bla na med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-26: de ltar thabs la mkhas pa ni //
T03TD3788E:4a-27: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:4a-28: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-29: brtan dang sems ni kun gnas dang ;
T03TD3788E:4a-30: / mthong zhes bya dang sgom pa zhes //
T03TD3788E:4a-31: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03TD3788E:4a-32: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03TD3788E:4a-33: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03TD3788E:4a-34: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3788E:4a-35: log pa bsgrub pa rtse mor gyur //
T03TD3788E:4a-36: mthar gyis bya ba shes pa ni //
T03TD3788E:4a-37: rnam pa bcu gsum bdag nyid do ;
T03TD3788E:4a-38: / gcig gi mngon rdzogs byang chub ba //
T03TD3788E:4a-39: rnam pa bzhi ru yang dag mtshon //
T03TD3788E:4a-40: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03TD3788E:4a-41: sprul pa dang ni de ltar gsum //
T03TD3788E:4a-42: mdzad pa dang bcas bzhi ru brjod //
T03TD3788E:4a-44: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:4a-45: 'di ni tshig le'ur byas pa bco lngas mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i don bsdus pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:4a-47: mngon rtogs bdag nyid bdun yin par //
T03TD3788E:4a-48: shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bya //
T03TD3788E:4a-49: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:4b-0: chos sku mdzad par @4b bcas pa ste //
T03TD3788E:4b-1: rnam pa brgyad du bsdus pa yin //
T03TD3788E:4b-2: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis kyis ni bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:4b-3: de la 'dir dngos po brgyad kyi dbye bas bsdus pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:4b-5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-6: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ;
T03TD3788E:4b-7: thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-8: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-9: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-10: mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-11: skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-12: de dag gi 'bras bur gyur pa ni chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi sku'o zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:4b-13: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03TD3788E:4b-14: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03TD3788E:4b-15: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:4b-16: tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa bcu gsum gyis ni rgyas par bstan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:4b-17: de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa dngos po brgyad kyi rab tu dbye bas bsdus par bstan pas de ltar bsdus pa dang rgyas par rnam par phye ba nyid kyis legs par bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:4b-18: de bshad zin nas da ni gang zhig mngon par rtogs pa'i don gang la khyad par can gyi rnam pa gang dang /
T03TD3788E:4b-19: dngos po gang ji snyed bstan pa de dag gi go rims bsdu ba 'ba' zhig brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:4b-20: de la re zhig / sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
T03TD3788E:4b-21: dkar po'i chos rnams don gnyer 'dod //
T03TD3788E:4b-22: ji ltar gzhan gyi ming gzhan gyi yin par 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:4b-23: sems ni yul so sor rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la /
T03TD3788E:4b-24: don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni sred pa yin pas so zhe na /
T03TD3788E:4b-25: bden mod kyi 'on kyang 'dir rgyus 'bras bu bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:4b-26: don du gnyer ba dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid don du gnyer ba yod na 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyi don du sems bskyed pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:4b-27: de ltar na 'dun pa'i rtsa ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:4b-28: yang na don du gnyer ba ni smon lam yin te /
T03TD3788E:4b-29: de dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid kyi phyir sems bskyed pa'i don du gnyer ba nyid la sems bskyed ces bya'o //
T03TD3788E:5a-0: de ltar byas na yang smon lam dang lhan @5a * //
T03TD3788E:5a-1: cig spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems bskyed par 'gyur bar 'thad pa yin no zhes gang gtso bo yin par 'dir bstan te /
T03TD3788E:5a-2: don du gnyer ba can gang yin pa sems bskyed pa'i gtso bo yin par rnam par gzhag pa byas so //
T03TD3788E:5a-3: dkar po'i chos rnams dang gzhan gyi don de yang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:5a-4: de rnams de dang de ni mdo bzhin du //
T03TD3788E:5a-5: bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod //
T03TD3788E:5a-6: de dang zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i chos rnams so //
T03TD3788E:5a-7: de ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan don no //
T03TD3788E:5a-8: de la 'dir mdo ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gis mdor bsdus nas bstan to //
T03TD3788E:5a-9: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:5a-10: zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:5a-11: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya bas dkar po'i chos thams cad nang du 'dus par gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:5a-12: de la 'dir mdo de dag gis rgyas par bstan pa ni sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
T03TD3788E:5a-13: mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba sbyin pa po dang /
T03TD3788E:5a-15: len pa po mi dmigs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:5a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:5a-17: byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rnams ni mngon par rtogs pa bdun dang /
T03TD3788E:5a-18: chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa bsdus pa'i rgyas par bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:5a-19: ji snyed rdzogs par mthar thug pa'i bar du gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:5a-20: lhag ma sems bskyed pa'i skabs su 'di 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:5a-21: de dag 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i mdo'i gzhung 'grel pa nyid kyis don rgyas par bstan pas yang 'dir rnam par ma phye'o //
T03TD3788E:5a-22: da ni gang zhig bsdus pa rnams kyi tshig bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:5a-23: mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
T03TD3788E:5a-24: rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:5a-26: rnam par rangs pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:5b-0: rnam par @5b dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:5b-1: rnam par bsdos pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:5b-2: rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:5b-5: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes so //
T03TD3788E:5b-6: de la rkyal pa rlung gis bus pa bzhin du srog mthar thug pa'i rjes la rim gyis lus rgyas par gyur te /
T03TD3788E:5b-7: ma lus par rnam par bam pas na rnam par bam pa ste /
T03TD3788E:5b-8: de ni dbyibs la chags pa rnams lus kyi dbyibs de'i rgud pa ston pas 'di bsgom par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-9: gang phyi dang nang dang bar rnam pa du mar 'bus gzhigs pas na 'bu can te /
T03TD3788E:5b-10: de ni nang khong stong du gyur par snang bas lus rgyas par gyur pa la chags pa rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-11: gnas tha dad nas 'dzag pas rnam par 'dzag pa ste /
T03TD3788E:5b-12: de ni lus kyi nang dang 'brel pa las dri nga bar snang bas phreng ba dang dri la sogs pa'i dbang las byung ba'i dri la sogs pa la chags pa rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-13: phan tshun du rnam par dmar bar 'thor zhing dgyes la 'dzag pas na rnam par dmar ba ste /
T03TD3788E:5b-14: de ni rnam par dmar bas gos shing mi mthun pa'i dngos por snang bas rgyan gyis brgyan pas mdzes pa sha la chags pa can gyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-15: rnam par gsal bar sngo bas na rnam par bsngos pa ste /
T03TD3788E:5b-16: kha dog tha dad par mtshungs pa'i gnas su zangs kyi mdog dang /
T03TD3788E:5b-17: rnag 'dzag pa'i gnas su skya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:5b-18: sngon po'i gnas der phyin zhing sngo ba ras sngon pos g-yogs pa lta bu ste /
T03TD3788E:5b-19: 'di ni ro'i lus kyi tshig bla dags so //
T03TD3788E:5b-20: de ni pags pa la chags pa'i rgud pa ston pas yul gyi kha dog la chags pa rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-21: khyi dang ce sbyang la sgos pas phan tshun du rnam pa sna tshogs par zos pa ni rnam par zos pa ste /
T03TD3788E:5b-22: de ni sha rgyas pa 'jig par ston pas de ni nu ma la sogs pa'i sha rgyas pa la chags pa rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-25: rkang pa yang gzhan du sna tshogs par rnam par 'thor bas te /
T03TD3788E:5b-26: de ni yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar snang bas yan lag dang nying lag gi sgeg pa la chags pa rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:5b-27: rus pa nyid ni rus gong ste /
T03TD3788E:6a-1: re sbrel bas tshogs gcig pa'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:6a-2: de ni lus kyi rus pa'i mi mthun pa'i dngos por snang bas so la sogs pa rus pa'i 'byor pa la chags pa rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3788E:6a-3: ma lus pa rnam par tshig pas rnam par tshig pa ste /
T03TD3788E:6a-4: de ni pags pa'i dbyibs dang mi mthun par 'khums par snang bas kha dog dang dbyibs la 'dod chags pa rnams kyi gnyen por bsgom pa ste /
T03TD3788E:6a-5: lus 'di yang shi ba'i ro dang 'dra'o zhes dang po'i tshig bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:6a-6: mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bcur gzhan dag 'dod de /
T03TD3788E:6a-7: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes ma gtogs pa rus pa rnams gtubs pas rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes te /
T03TD3788E:6a-8: tshogs pa'i lus la chags pa'i gnyen por mtshon la sogs pas lus gtubs pas tha dad par rnam par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:6a-9: 'bus gzhigs pa'i srin bu'i 'du shes ni yang lus la bdag tu chags par mtshungs par lta ba'i gnyen por srin bu'i rigs du mas lus khyab pa'i rang bzhin can du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:6a-10: de la dang po rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:6a-11: gnyis pa yang gnyen por gyur pa nyid ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:6a-13: 'jig tshogs la de'i lus su lta ba'i gnyen por mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:6a-14: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes ni kha dog dang dbyibs la chags pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir 'di ni gdon mi za bar grangs su nye bar brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:6a-15: de nyid kyi phyir mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dgu nyid legs pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:6a-16: / skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad ces bya ba ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:6a-17: mdo las ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T03TD3788E:6a-18: 'di ni 'dod pa chung ba rnams kyi chos yin gyi 'dod pa che ba rnams kyi ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:6a-20: rab tu rnam par dben pa dang /
T03TD3788E:6a-22: dran pa nye bar 'jog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:6a-24: shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi yin gyi shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:6a-25: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa bdun po 'dis gnas brtan mood gal gyi bu gnas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:6b-0: bcom ldan 'das @6b kyis kyang mood gal gyi bu skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad po 'di la rnam par rtogs shig /'di ni spros pa med pa'i chos dang /
T03TD3788E:6b-1: spros pa med pa'i kun dga' ra ba la ltos pa med pa'i kun dga'i ra ba'i tshul dang ldan pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:6b-2: de la 'dod pa chung bas ni chos bzhi spong ste /
T03TD3788E:6b-7: de la tshul 'chos zhes bya ba ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin du ste /
T03TD3788E:6b-8: 'di na 'ga' zhig rnyed par 'dod cing rnyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:6b-10: tshigs su bcad pa 'dod la sems ltos pa dang bcas pas bcings pas dgon pa par gyur pa'am /
T03TD3788E:6b-12: stan gcig pa nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan gang yang rung ba la nye bar brten te gnas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te /
T03TD3788E:6b-13: bdag la gzhan dag gis bsnyen bkur byed /
T03TD3788E:6b-16: rjed par byed na ci ma rung /
T03TD3788E:6b-19: tshigs su bcad pa bsgrub par yang bya'o snyam du sems shing /
T03TD3788E:6b-21: bkur sti don du gnyer bas rnyed pa la sogs pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing /
T03TD3788E:6b-22: tshul de lta bu'i spyod lam la rtog pa 'di ni tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:6b-23: kha gsag ces bya ba ni 'di na gang zhig rnyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:6b-24: bkur sti'i ltos pa dang bcas pas gzhan dag la 'di ltar khyed ni bdag gi ma dang 'dra ba dang /
T03TD3788E:6b-26: sbun zla ji lta ba dang /
T03TD3788E:6b-27: nye du gang yang rung ba ji lta ba dang /
T03TD3788E:6b-28: snag gi gnyen mtshams 'dra ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:6b-29: khyed de ltar yin pa des na /
T03TD3788E:6b-30: kho bos sbyin pa la sogs pa yang khyed cag gi don du yin no //
T03TD3788E:6b-31: kho bo ni khyed cag gi don du thag ring po nas kyang khyed kyi thad du 'ong zhing 'dir gnas pa yang khyed cag nyid kyi don yin no //
T03TD3788E:6b-32: zhes zer na yang de rnams mang du de la bkur sti mi byed pa na rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i ltos pa dang bcas pas sems bcings pas gzhan dag la tshul de ltar kha gsag smra zhing yongs su smra bas dgos pa'i don gyi 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i gcam gsag gi las byed pa 'di ni kha gsag ces bya'o //
T03TD3788E:7a-1: slong zhes bya ba ni 'di na rnyed pa'i phyir dngos po de dang de la mi gsal bar gzhogs kyis rnyed pa'i las byed pa ste /
T03TD3788E:7a-6: lde mig kyog po 'di ni bzang ngo zhe'am /
T03TD3788E:7a-8: gal te kho bos 'di lta bu zhig rnyed na bcang bar bya ba na sbyin pa po yang rnyed par dka'o //
T03TD3788E:7a-9: gang yang rung ba'i khyim du song nas der 'di skad ces smras te /
T03TD3788E:7a-10: khyed kyi 'bras chan 'di ni bzang ngo //
T03TD3788E:7a-13: khyed kyi bza' bar bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:7a-14: bca' bar bya ba 'di ni bzang ngo //
T03TD3788E:7a-15: sngon chad kyang bdag cag la khyed kyis byin par gyur la kho bo cag kyang khyed kyis byin par byas na yang dag par dga' na da ltar ni khyed cag bdag cag la sbyin par bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:7a-16: bya ba byed par mi sems so zhes de gang yang rung ba'i mi gsal ba brjod pas brkams pa las byung ba'i gzhogs slong gi las kyi dngos po de dang de rjod par byed pa 'di ni gzhogs slong zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:7a-17: thob kyis 'jal ba zhes bya ba ni 'di na 'ga' zhig rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing /
T03TD3788E:7a-18: rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i ltos pa dang bcas pas sems bcings pas gzhan la 'di skad ces smras te /
T03TD3788E:7a-19: khyed kyis ma la yang sbyin par mi bya /
T03TD3788E:7a-21: sring mo la yang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:7a-23: snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed na khyed kyis gang zhig la sbyin par byed pa yin /
T03TD3788E:7a-24: gang zhig gi khyim du song nas yang de nyid la khyod kyi khyim du song na de nyid kyi khyim du dgra bcom pa bzhugs shing khyed dang 'dra bar mi bya /
T03TD3788E:7a-25: dgra bcom pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:7a-26: lhan cig tu 'dug pa dang 'brel pa'i gtam smras par gyur pa ni khyed rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa yin /
T03TD3788E:7a-27: 'byor pa legs par thob pa yin /
T03TD3788E:7a-28: khyed kyis mir rnyed pa don yod pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:7a-30: 'di yang 'di snyam du sems su gzhug par yang bya ste /
T03TD3788E:7a-31: bdag gi khyim du 'phags pa ma gtogs pa dge slong ngam /
T03TD3788E:7a-32: bram ze su yang 'jug par mi byed la /
T03TD3788E:7b-0: 'phags pa 'di @7b ni gal te dgra bcom pa yin no snyam du sems par byed do //
T03TD3788E:7b-1: gang du rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pas sems bcings pa de de lta bu'i tshul du gzhan rnams la nges par sgrogs pa ni thob kyis 'jal ba zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:7b-2: chog shes pas ni rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa spong bar byed pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:7b-3: de la rnyed pas rnyed pa tshol ba zhes bya ba ni 'di na 'ga' zhig rgyal po'am /
T03TD3788E:7b-4: rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am /
T03TD3788E:7b-7: gzhan gang yang rung bas lhung bzed dam /
T03TD3788E:7b-12: yo byad gang yang rung ba gter ba yod na de yongs su blangs nas gzhan dag la bstod cing 'dems te /
T03TD3788E:7b-13: 'di ni bdag la rgyal po che ge mo zhes bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:7b-14: dam par gyur pa gzhan zhig bdag la mchog sbyin no zhes smras pa na /
T03TD3788E:7b-15: 'di snyam du ci nas re zhig de lta bu yang 'phags pa 'di la sbyin zhing bya ba byed na /
T03TD3788E:7b-16: kho bos kyang 'phags pa la sbyin par bya zhing bya ba ci'i phyir mi bya snyam du sems su gzhug pa 'di ni gzhan gyi rnyed pas rnyed pa gzhan tshol ba zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:7b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni lam zhes pa la mthong ba'i lam de'i dbang du byas nas bstan to //
T03TD3788E:7b-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:7b-19: gang de lta yin na rin chen zla bas zhus pa'i mdo dang /
T03TD3788E:7b-20: rin chen phreng ba'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T03TD3788E:7b-21: bcom ldan dpal bzangs dpal bzangs zhes bya dang ni tsan dpal tsan dpal zhes bya dang //
T03TD3788E:7b-22: gzhan yang mtha' yas snang ba bkod dpal zhes bya rdzogs sangs rgyas su grags pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:7b-23: / tog dpal tog dpal zhes bya dang ni mya ngan med dpal dang ni rnam kun mya ngan med dpal dang //
T03TD3788E:7b-24: rin chen mchod dpal rin chen mchod dpal zhes bya dang ni bde gshegs me tog dpal zhes bya ba dang //
T03TD3788E:8a-0: rgyal ba brtson 'grus gsum gyi rol pa brtson 'grus gsum gyi rol pa @8a * //
T03TD3788E:8a-2: 'od dpal 'od dpal zhes bya bcom ldan yon dpal yon dpal mtsho zhes bya ba ni //
T03TD3788E:8a-3: bcom ldan bcom ldan ldan phyogs bcu dag na gang dag bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan gyi //
T03TD3788E:8a-4: de rnams kyi ni mtshan rnams bzung bar byas na phyir mi ldog nyid 'gyur ba lags ;
T03TD3788E:8a-6: de bzhin du sems can ji snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:8a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang tha dad par snang ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:8a-8: bstan pa 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te /
T03TD3788E:8a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan thos pa las rigs kyi bu dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyed pa gzigs nas sems can phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa yin gyi /
T03TD3788E:8a-11: de rnams kyis mtshan thos pa'i mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:8a-12: rigs kyi bu dper na shing 'ga' zhig nyid kyi sa bon khyad par can du gyur pa'i sa bon rnam par gyur pa de yang sa bon gyi skyon thams cad dang bral bar gyur cing 'di'i rkyen rnams tshogs par gyur pa las myu gu skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:8a-13: rigs kyi bu de la sa bon zhes ji ltar brjod par bya /
T03TD3788E:8a-14: bcom ldan 'das sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad spangs pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
T03TD3788E:8a-15: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du mtshan thos par gyur pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon dang ldan pas na /
T03TD3788E:8a-16: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:8a-17: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa tsam nyid phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyur 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:8a-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gang /
T03TD3788E:8a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa ye shes phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i sa zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni ye shes ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:8a-20: sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skyes pas zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:8b-0: gang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod pas @8b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:8b-1: 'dir kha cig na re bden pa dang /
T03TD3788E:8b-4: nye bar zhi ba la brten te sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-5: gzhan dag ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du skyed pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-6: gzhan dag ni 'di las sangs rgyas 'di ltar 'khrungs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin la /
T03TD3788E:8b-7: thabs la mkhas pa ni yab yin te /
T03TD3788E:8b-8: de gnyis las sangs rgyas 'byung bas na sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs yin no zhe'o //
T03TD3788E:8b-9: gzhan dag ni sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i chos rnams ni bslab pa ste /
T03TD3788E:8b-10: de'i phyir bslab pa yang dag par blangs pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-11: gzhan dag ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la mngon du phyogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snying rje chen po gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-13: gzhon nu'i sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyis de yang dag par bskul nas yang sems can gyi don mngon du byed pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-14: dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi zad par bya bar 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:8b-15: byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du yang rgya mtsho chen por chu'i thigs pa gcig bor ba'i dpes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du zad pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:8b-16: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3788E:8b-17: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:8b-18: gang mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid do //
T03TD3788E:8b-19: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gang gis chos kyi dbyings la rigs zhes bya bar 'chad par 'gyur ba de'i chos nyid gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:9a-0: yang dag pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes @9a * //
T03TD3788E:9a-1: bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ye shes thams cad kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:9a-2: thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3788E:9a-3: rjes su rtogs par zhes bya ba rjes su smos pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:9a-4: ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa'i ri rnams skra nyag ma gcig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med par 'phang bar 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi bsgrubs pa byas pa ltar 'di la ma dad par mi bya ste /
T03TD3788E:9a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan phul du byung bas 'dod pa bzhin du thob pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa la gang yang mi srid pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:9a-6: gdon mi za bar 'di de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:9a-7: gzhan du na de bzhin du me 'bar ba dang /
T03TD3788E:9a-8: chu 'bab pa'i cho 'phrul ya ma zung la yang mi dad par mi bya bar mi rigs so //
T03TD3788E:9a-9: yang skra nyag ma gcig gis ri rab bcings pa dang 'phangs pa med mod kyi des de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pas gang gdul bya pha rol pos de bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:9a-11: 'dus ma byas kyi pha rol tu 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:9a-12: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi chos sku'i mtshan nyid la khyad par med par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:9a-13: sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi 'khor zhes bya ba ni phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:9a-14: gsang ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes la sogs pa la rjes su zhugs par gyur pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi 'khor zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:9a-15: phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni yang sa bcu las ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:9a-16: spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:9a-18: skye ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:9a-19: mngon par 'byung ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:9a-20: yang gsang ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni ji ltar de nyid las 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:9b-0: @9b dus dang dus ma yin pa la rnam par spyod pa'i gsang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:9b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa'i gsang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:9b-2: sems can rnams bsdu ba dang /
T03TD3788E:9b-3: tshar bcad pa ni gsang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:9b-4: de'i phyir gzhan nyan thos rnams ni phyi'i 'khor zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:9b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3788E:9b-7: kun nas bskor ba ni yongs su bskor ba'o //
T03TD3788E:9b-8: cher mchod cing rjed pa sngon du byas pa ni mdun du byas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:9b-9: phyogs yongs su chad pa ni mdun du byas pa ltar na ni snga phyi 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:9b-10: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi tshogs nas 'og min gyi lha rnams su gyur pa'i bar du de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
T03TD3788E:9b-11: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung bas ni 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'jig rten rnams mngon par mtho ba dang /
T03TD3788E:9b-12: nges par legs pa ston pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:9b-13: rang gi tshogs yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:9b-14: yon tan gyi phyogs su zhen pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:9b-15: de la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhung bzed kyi dbang du mdzad pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:9b-16: de rnams kham gyi zas mchog tu ro zhim pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing mang ba yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:9b-17: gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa dper byed /
T03TD3788E:9b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum pa la sogs pa ni rim gro byed pa'i dbang du mdzad pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:9b-19: de rnams ni sgyu rtsa la ma lus pa la mkhas pas 'dod pa tsam la rag las pa 'jug pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:9b-20: tshangs ris la sogs pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i dbang du mdzad pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:9b-21: de rnams kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i skal ba mnyam pas gzhan dag 'dod chags dang bral ba la mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:9b-22: de la 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:9b-23: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams te /
T03TD3788E:10a-0: 'di ni shas cher bstan pa yin gyi tshangs pa la @10a * //
T03TD3788E:10a-1: sogs pa na yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:10a-2: yang rtogs pa sngon du gtong ba su zhig gang 'di lta bu'i dbang du byas pa gsum ston par byed ce na /
T03TD3788E:10a-3: gang gis kyang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i chos nyid du rnam par gzhag ste /
T03TD3788E:10a-4: so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin zhing rten cing 'brel par chos rnams kyi chos nyid tshad mar byas pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:10a-5: de la rgyal chen bzhi po ni de rnams kyi bdag po yin pas na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs so //
T03TD3788E:10a-6: legs par spyod pa lhan cig spyad pa las sum cu rtsa gsum po der mtshungs par skyes pas na sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
T03TD3788E:10a-7: sdug bsngal dang bral bar nye bar song bas na 'thab bral lo //
T03TD3788E:10a-8: dga' bar song zhing nye bar phyin pas na dga' ldan te /
T03TD3788E:10a-9: mgu ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:10a-10: rang gis sprul zhing byas pa'i longs spyod rnams kyis dga' zhing rol pas na de ni 'phrul dga'o //
T03TD3788E:10a-11: gzhan gyis sprul pa'i longs spyod rnams la dbang byed cing gnas pas na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do //
T03TD3788E:10a-12: tshangs pa'i 'khor yin pas na tshangs ris so //
T03TD3788E:10a-13: tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor yin pas na tshangs 'khor ro //
T03TD3788E:10a-14: cig shos de'i mdun na 'don lta bur gnas pas tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don no //
T03TD3788E:10a-15: tshangs pa gzhan rnams las tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis tshangs pa chen po 'phags pa yin pas na tshangs chen no //
T03TD3788E:10a-16: tshangs pa gzhan dag pas 'od chung bas na 'od chung ngo //
T03TD3788E:10a-17: de dag las tshad med par che ba'i 'od 'byung ba yod pas na tshad med 'od do //
T03TD3788E:10a-18: de dag ni dga' ba dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan las grub cing sprin mthong ba la sogs pa las byung ba'i glog ltar phan tshun 'od gsal ba 'byin pa'i phung po'i rgyun yod pas na 'od gsal lo ;
T03TD3788E:10a-19: / yang na de lta bu'i gzugs kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pas na 'od gsal lo //
T03TD3788E:10a-20: dge ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi 'od gcig tu 'dug cing mi 'gyur ba la bya bar bshad la /
T03TD3788E:10a-21: de ni de'i gong gi 'phags ba rnams las de'i 'od chung ba yin pa'i phyir dge chung ngo //
T03TD3788E:10b-0: de dag tshad med @10b par che ba'i phyir tshad gzung bar mi nus pas tshad med dge'o //
T03TD3788E:10b-1: de dag ni dge ba ste 'od kun tu 'byung ba ma lus par rgyas pas na dge rgyas te /
T03TD3788E:10b-2: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad de dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan las grub cing bdag nyid kyi dngos po rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
T03TD3788E:10b-3: de rnams ni dper na rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang gi mar me gnas pa rin po che'i 'od dang 'dres pa'i rang gi 'od kyis 'od gcig tu byung bar gyur nas gnas pa dang 'dra bar lus gcig tu 'bar bar snang bar gnas so //
T03TD3788E:10b-4: 'du shes las 'dod chags dang bral ba bsgoms pas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs kyi phung po tsam yod kyi de la 'du shes yod pa ma yin pas na 'du shes med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:10b-7: de rnams na ni bsam gtan gyi mthu las grub pa'i 'bras bu chen po yin pas 'bras bu che ba'o //
T03TD3788E:10b-8: phung po lnga dang ldan pas so so'i skye bo'i sa'i mtha' nyid du gnas shing gnod pa cung zad kyang med la bdag nyid kyi gnas dus nyung zad cig gis mi 'dor bas mi che ba'o //
T03TD3788E:10b-9: la la ni 'dod pa med par 'dod de /
T03TD3788E:10b-10: de dag gi gzhung ltar na de rnams ni 'og ma la med pas na 'dod pa med pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:10b-11: su la yang gdung bar mi byed pas na mi gdung ngo //
T03TD3788E:10b-12: phongs pa med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par snang zhing shin tu yid 'phrog pa yin pa'i phyir gya nom snang ngo //
T03TD3788E:10b-13: gzhan dag ni blta na sdug ces zer ro //
T03TD3788E:10b-14: lta ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:10b-15: rab tu mthong ba'i phyir shin tu mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:10b-16: phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:10b-17: de rnams kyi gong na gzhan med pas na 'og min te /
T03TD3788E:10b-18: de ni mthar thug pa'i mchog yin no //
T03TD3788E:10b-19: zhes btsun pa zangs kyi lo ma pas bshad do //
T03TD3788E:10b-20: gzhan dag ni sdig mtha' yas zhes zer te /
T03TD3788E:10b-21: sdig pa ni sems la gnas par grags pa'i tshul te /
T03TD3788E:10b-22: de dag shin tu 'joms pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:10b-23: yang sems bskyed pa 'di'i rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni gzhan 'phags pa por gos mi zad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:10b-24: sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas blta zhing sbyar ro //
T03TD3788E:11a-1: gzhung mangs pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir nye bar ma bkod do //
T03TD3788E:11a-2: sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba la sems ni rnam par shes pa dang rnam par rig pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-3: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ji lta zhe na /
T03TD3788E:11a-4: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
T03TD3788E:11a-5: des dkar po'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:11a-6: bskyed pa zhes smos pa ni ma bskyed pa bskyed par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-7: sems zhes bya ba ni de rtogs pa'i chos kyi dang po'i mtshams su gyur par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:11a-8: de lta mod kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dgu po'i de dag dang skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad sngar bstan pa de dag dang sems bskyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba ci zhig 'brel zhe na /
T03TD3788E:11a-9: sems bskyed pa'i yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3788E:11a-10: sems bskyed pa'i yongs su mi nyams pa'i rgyu mtshan ni brgyad de /
T03TD3788E:11a-11: 'dod chags de'i gnyen po mi sdug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-12: log pas 'tsho ba de'i 'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-13: yang dag par dga' ba dang rgud par lta ba de'i rab tu dben pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-14: le lo de'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-15: dran pa nyams pa de'i dran pa nye bar gnas pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-16: rnam par g-yeng ba de'i ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T03TD3788E:11a-17: shes rab 'chal pa de'i ni shes rab bo //
T03TD3788E:11a-18: 'jig rten pa'i sna tshogs pa la mngon par dga' ba de'i gnyen po ni spros pa med pa'i kun dga' ra ba'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las sems bskyed pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o //
T03TD3788E:11a-20: sems bskyed pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3788E:11a-22: // / da ni gdams ngag brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:11a-23: de la don du gnyer bar bya ba thob par byed pa'i man ngag ni gdams ngag go //
T03TD3788E:11a-24: thob pa'i yon tan yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir yongs su mi nyams par byed pa'i thabs ni gdams ngag yin la /
T03TD3788E:11a-25: de'i rjes la ma thob pa'i yon tan thob par byed pa'i thabs ni rjes su bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:11a-26: mjug bsdu bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:11a-27: gdams ngag de yang rnam pa bcur 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:11b-0: gdams @11b par bya ba bsgrub pa dang //
T03TD3788E:11b-1: bden pa rnams dang bde gshegs sogs //
T03TD3788E:11b-2: ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang //
T03TD3788E:11b-3: lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang //
T03TD3788E:11b-4: spyan ni lnga ru shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:11b-5: mngon shes yon tan drug dang ni //
T03TD3788E:11b-6: mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ba mchog / bsgom pa'i lam ste gdams ngag bcu //
T03TD3788E:11b-8: de la bsgrub pa la gdams pa ni gang sh'a ri'i bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:11b-9: mi dmigs pa'i tshul du bsgrub pa ni sgrub pa de nyan thos la sogs ba dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T03TD3788E:11b-10: mdo gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis 'dam bu'i tshal la sogs pa lta bur yongs su gang ba dper bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:11b-11: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed des yongs su gang ba'i shes rab las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:11b-12: sh'a ri'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang ;
T03TD3788E:11b-13: mood gal gyi bu 'dra ba sha stag gis 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:11b-16: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
T03TD3788E:11b-19: til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur kyang zhes gang gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:11b-20: nges par byed pa'i cha bzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:11b-22: bsgom pa'i lam dag go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
T03TD3788E:11b-23: 'dam bu ltar las dang nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa chung du bzod pas mi nus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:11b-25: mtshon dag dang 'dra ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa drag pos nyen du zin kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun kun tu mi 'chad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:11b-26: bu ram shing dang 'dra bar skye ba dang 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gzhan thob pa na bde 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing /
T03TD3788E:11b-27: rgyun ma'i 'chad pa'i sbyor ba chos sgom pa'i mngar ba las mi 'da' ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:12a-1: rgyu dang 'dra bar mngon par 'bigs pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam rtogs par byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:12a-2: 'bras kyi zhing dang 'dra bar 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu mchog nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:12a-3: til gyi zhing 'dra bar me tog la sogs pa'i dngos po dang tha mi dad du zin kyang ji ltar mthong ba mngon du byed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:12a-4: dus gzhan du bsgoms pas spangs pa'i khyad par gyi dbang du byas nas dpe drug dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:12a-5: ci'i phyir tshal smos she na /
T03TD3788E:12a-6: dro bar rtogs pa la sogs pa'i gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i rigs kyi khyad par shes par bya ba'i phyir yin te /
T03TD3788E:12a-7: don mang po brtags na yang dpe gcig gis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:12a-8: re zhig snga ma snga ma la'am zhes bya ba'i sgra smos pa ni dpe phyi ma phyi ma drang bar bya ba'i don yin no //
T03TD3788E:12a-9: de lta yin na tha mar ram zhes ci'i phyir smos she na /
T03TD3788E:12a-10: 'phags pa'i gang zag de rnams las mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa shes par byed pa drang bar bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:12a-11: de lta na dpe gzhan dag gis ci'i phyir ma bshad ce na /
T03TD3788E:12a-12: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rigs bsdus pa'i ngo bo shes par bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:12a-13: gzhan yang re re zhing brjod pa brtags na ni dpe ji snyed cig brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:12a-14: nye bar bshad pa la mi mkhas pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:12a-16: dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T03TD3788E:12a-17: mdo gal gyi bu 'dra ba zhes gang gsungs pa 'dis ni ji skad gsungs pa'i rtogs pa mthun pa rnams kyis so //
T03TD3788E:12a-18: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:12a-19: 'di ni grangs kyi khyad par dang /
T03TD3788E:12a-23: dpe las 'das pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:12a-24: de la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:12a-25: grangs dang zhes bya ba'i bar ni grangs kyi khyad par gyi khyad par med pa'i grangs bzung ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:12b-0: de @12b las gzhan pa'i grangs gsal bar shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:12b-1: brgya la sogs pa smos pa ni khyad par smos pas khyad par med pa'i grangs khong du chud pa'i rgyur byas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:12b-2: khyad par med pa tsam yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i don du brgya la sogs pa smos pas go rims mang po yin par shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:12b-3: char yang zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i khyad par ro //
T03TD3788E:12b-4: bgrang bar yang zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi khyad par yin te /
T03TD3788E:12b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rigs de la bgrang du med pa'i phyir ro /
T03TD3788E:12b-6: rgyur yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i khyad par te /
T03TD3788E:12b-7: shes rab de ni 'di'i rgyu tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:12b-8: dper yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni dpe las 'das pa'o //
T03TD3788E:12b-9: 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' ci tsam zhig gi dbang du byas nas de lta bu'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgo pa yin /
T03TD3788E:12b-10: ci dang po sems bskyed pa yin nam /
T03TD3788E:12b-11: spyod pa la zhugs pa yin nam /
T03TD3788E:12b-12: phyir mi ldog pa yin nam /
T03TD3788E:12b-13: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin nam /
T03TD3788E:12b-14: sa bcu pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:12b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas nye bar gnas pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:12b-16: de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su chud pas ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:12b-17: gsum pa yang ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:12b-18: brgyad pa la ni mngon par 'dod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bkag pas nyan thos thams cad las shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:12b-19: de yang kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khyed la shes par bya /
T03TD3788E:12b-20: khyed la khong du chud par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:12b-21: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo la mtshungs par gyur na de nyid du de'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3788E:12b-22: yang de'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhig yin /
T03TD3788E:12b-23: 'on te nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin na de ni re zhig mi rigs te /
T03TD3788E:12b-24: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i yid la byed pa ni sems bskyed pa nas brtsams te ring du yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:13a-0: 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes zer na ni bsgoms pas spang @13a * //
T03TD3788E:13a-1: bar bya ba ma spangs pa dang de yang mi rigs so //
T03TD3788E:13a-2: bstan pa 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzhag pa'i brjod par bya ba ni mang po yod de /
T03TD3788E:13a-3: 'dir rtse mo thob pa rnams kyi ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-4: bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ni ngan 'gro las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-5: bsam gtan thob pa rnams kyi ni de'i yan lag las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-6: rgyun du zhugs pa thob pa rnams kyi ni srid pa brgyad pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-7: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi ni 'dir srid pa gnyis pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-8: phyir mi 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-9: dgra bcom pa ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:13a-10: lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13a-11: 'dir yang dam pa'i chos padma dkar po la sogs pa'i mdo tshad mar byas nas /
T03TD3788E:13a-12: ji ltar 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa de bzhin du dgongs pa can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:13a-13: dus de srid du 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa bshol ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:13a-14: de nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi don gyi bya ba rgyun chad pa 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T03TD3788E:13a-15: gnyis pa yang ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:13a-16: de yang de rnams las rtogs pa go bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:13a-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:13a-19: spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3788E:13a-20: de bas na yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can gyi brdar btags pa'i sems kyis dang po sems bskyed pa nyid 'dir byang chub sems dpa' yin par mngon no //
T03TD3788E:13a-21: gang de lta yin pa de bas na rab tu byed pa dang por sems bskyed pa bstan to //
T03TD3788E:13a-22: gal te de lta yin na sh'a ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:13b-0: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig @13b bsgoms pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:13b-1: sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas chos kyi sku thob par bsdus par bstan pa'i sbyor ba rtogs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba yin no zhes bstan pa'ang mi rigs te /
T03TD3788E:13b-3: de dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa mang po'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir shes rab nyin gcig yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no zhe na /
T03TD3788E:13b-4: 'dir yang mar me'i snying po tshig pa'i dpes sems bskyed pa dang po dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-5: phyi ma 'bras bu dang bcas par lan btab /
T03TD3788E:13b-6: lhag ma ni go slabs rnams par ma phye'o //
T03TD3788E:13b-7: sgrub ba la gdams pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3788E:13b-9: // / bden pa la gdams pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:13b-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gdams pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:13b-11: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas phung po dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-14: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-18: stong pa nyid kyi sbyor bas zhes bstan pa ste /
T03TD3788E:13b-19: 'di'i mdo ni sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsung pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:13b-20: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams skye ba dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-22: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-24: chos phan tshun yang dag par 'du ba bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:13b-25: 'di'i mdo ni gal te gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam /
T03TD3788E:13b-26: 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:13b-27: gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam /
T03TD3788E:13b-28: rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:13b-29: gzugs ni tshor ba yang dag par 'du ba yin no zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:13b-30: de dag stong pa nyid ni de'i rang bzhin bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:13b-31: 'di'i mdo ni don 'di ltar sh'a ri'i bu gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-0: de rnams stong pa nyid dang phan tshun ngo bo gcig pa yin @14a * //
T03TD3788E:14a-2: 'di'i mdo ni sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs gzhan ma yin la /
T03TD3788E:14a-3: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:14a-4: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsung pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:14a-5: des na 'dis ni sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-6: skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:14a-7: 'gog pa'i bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas stong pa nyid la skye ba dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-9: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-13: dus gsum bkag pa'i sgo nas de dag la phung po la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-14: 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i phyogs la spyod pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bkag pa bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:14a-15: de'i mdo ni sh'a ri'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye /
T03TD3788E:14a-16: mi 'gag / kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med /
T03TD3788E:14a-22: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:14a-23: gang yang 'dra ba de la ni gzugs med do //
T03TD3788E:14a-24: tshor ba med do zhes bya ba nas ma rig pa skye ba med do //
T03TD3788E:14a-25: ma rig pa 'gag pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar dang ;
T03TD3788E:14a-26: rgyun du zhugs pa med do //
T03TD3788E:14a-27: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-29: byang chub med do zhes bya ba'i bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:14a-30: lam gyi bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-34: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-35: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-37: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-38: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-41: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:14a-42: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor ba'am /
T03TD3788E:14a-43: mi sbyor ba de la rjes su mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i mdo ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:14a-44: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ldan zhes bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:14b-0: mi ldan zhes bya bar bdag nyid la @14b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:14b-3: smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid la sogs pa de dang sbyor bar byed pa bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:14b-4: de'i mdo ni de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
T03TD3788E:14b-5: stong pa nyid kyis 'byed pa ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:14b-7: mtshan ma med par mi sdud mi 'byed do //
T03TD3788E:14b-9: smon pa med par mi sdud mi byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:14b-10: 'dis ni lam gyi bden pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin par gsal bar bstan to //
T03TD3788E:14b-11: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams sngon gyi mthar sbyor ba dang 'byed pa rab tu bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:14b-12: mdo ni sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
T03TD3788E:14b-13: 'di ltar de sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:14b-14: dus rnams gcig la gcig sbyor ba dang bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:14b-15: mdo ni de sngon gyi mtha' la phyi ma'i mtha' mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
T03TD3788E:14b-16: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid nyer bar bzung nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:14b-17: dus re rer rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:14b-18: mdo ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:14b-20: de ni 'di ltar 'das pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:14b-21: / de ltar lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:14b-23: dkon mchog la gdams pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:14b-24: de ni dkon mchog gsum la gdams pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:14b-25: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang yin pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni phung po dang /
T03TD3788E:14b-28: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /
T03TD3788E:14b-29: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:14b-30: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T03TD3788E:15a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:15a-4: 'di'i mdo ni de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na gzugs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sbyor bar mi byed de /
T03TD3788E:15a-5: gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:15a-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su sbyor ba bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:15a-9: mdo ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:15a-10: sangs rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed de /
T03TD3788E:15a-11: sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15a-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag dang /
T03TD3788E:15a-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag ngo bo gcig bar bzhed pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:15a-18: sangs rgyas nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa /
T03TD3788E:15a-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin no //
T03TD3788E:15a-20: byang chub nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa /
T03TD3788E:15a-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub po zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15a-22: chos dkon mchog gi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa dngos po med par sbyor ba bkag pa yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:15a-24: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:15a-25: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba mi sbyor ro //
T03TD3788E:15a-26: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15a-27: chos ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad du 'dod chags dang bral bar bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:15a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15a-29: 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba zhes bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:15a-30: mdo ni de ltar spyod pa 'dis 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa ji snyed pa bsal bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15b-0: de la 'jig rten nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa dang lta ba zag pa dang @15b bcas pas bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3788E:15b-1: byang chub sems dpas ni de dag rtsa ba nas shin tu gzhom pa'i phyir rnal 'byor du byed do //
T03TD3788E:15b-2: 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes bzhin du yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba len par byed do //
T03TD3788E:15b-3: srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes bzhin du yang bsam bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to //
T03TD3788E:15b-4: yang byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:15b-5: nyon mongs pa med par brjod par mi bya'o //
T03TD3788E:15b-7: nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi spyod pas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod par mi bya la /
T03TD3788E:15b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:15b-9: bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
T03TD3788E:15b-10: dge 'dun dkon mchog gi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:15b-11: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gam /
T03TD3788E:15b-13: mi nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes nas de myur du 'di la rnal 'byor du byed ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:15b-14: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa myur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15b-15: dkon mchog la gdams pa bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:15b-16: ma zhen pa la gdams pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:15b-17: lus de ci zhig lus de gang gi lus las rtsom zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:15b-18: lus la sogs pa mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:15b-19: yongs su mi ngal ba'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni ;
T03TD3788E:15b-23: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:15b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:15b-25: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T03TD3788E:15b-28: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:15b-31: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med do zhes rlom sems bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:15b-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na gzugs la rlom sems med ces bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:16a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems @16a * //
T03TD3788E:16a-1: med ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:16a-2: rlom sems med par gyur na yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:16a-3: lam yongs su 'dzin pa la gdams pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:16a-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:16a-5: de rnams kyis chos bstan pa'ang nyan to //
T03TD3788E:16a-6: de dag gi dge 'dun yang mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:16a-7: de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams mthong zhing /
T03TD3788E:16a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rnam par ye shes kyi yul du byed pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:16a-10: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni /
T03TD3788E:16a-11: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:16a-12: de rnams las chos bstan pa'ang nyan to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:16a-13: spyan lnga la gdams pa las /
T03TD3788E:16a-14: sha'i spyan gyi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:16a-15: dpag tshad brgya'i bar nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:16a-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba ni sha'i spyan gyi yul yin te /
T03TD3788E:16a-18: sha'i ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:16a-19: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
T03TD3788E:16a-20: lha'i spyan gyi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:16a-21: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:16a-22: 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i mig gi yul gang yin pa de rab tu shes so //
T03TD3788E:16a-23: lha rnams kyi'ang de dag gi de'i yul gyi khyad par mi shes so //
T03TD3788E:16a-24: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa'i yul can ni lha'i mig yin te /
T03TD3788E:16a-26: sh'a ri'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lha rnams zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:16b-0: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub @16b sems dpas rab tu shes so //
T03TD3788E:16b-1: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
T03TD3788E:16b-3: de'i lha'i mig des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:16b-4: shes rab kyi spyan gyi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:16b-9: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:16b-10: kha na ma tho ba med pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:16b-11: mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa'i chos su rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ni shes rab kyi spyan zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:16b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi spyan gang gis chos gang ji snyed pa 'dus byas sam /
T03TD3788E:16b-16: mi dge ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:16b-17: chos kyi spyan gyi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T03TD3788E:16b-18: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste zhes bya ba nas 'di la ni bdud 'byung par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:16b-19: 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:16b-20: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad rtogs pa'i yul can ni chos kyi spyan te /
T03TD3788E:16b-22: 'di la sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi spyan gyis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-23: 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-24: gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-25: 'di ni mtshan ma med pas gnas pa'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-26: 'di ni smon pa med pas gnas pa'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-27: gang zag 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /
T03TD3788E:16b-29: brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:16b-30: the tshom spangs pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-31: bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o //
T03TD3788E:16b-32: de la rab tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems spangs pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
T03TD3788E:17a-0: de nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med @17a * //
T03TD3788E:17a-1: pa'i 'dod chags dang nga rgyal rnams spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom par brjod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17a-2: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:17a-3: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par byang chub pa'i lam yul spyan ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan yin te /
T03TD3788E:17a-5: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
T03TD3788E:17a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17a-7: spyan gang gis byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong ba'am /
T03TD3788E:17a-11: rnam pa thams cad mi mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
T03TD3788E:17a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pas na dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17a-15: sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus so zhes smras pa ni yang dag par smra ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:17a-17: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bskyed do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17a-18: spyan lnga la gdams pa bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:17a-19: mngon par shes pa drug la gdams pa bstan par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:17a-20: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:17a-21: sa yang g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03TD3788E:17a-22: rdzu 'phrul gyis de dang de dag bsgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:17a-25: gal te rdzu 'phrul du ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa so sor nyams su myong bar byed de /
T03TD3788E:17a-26: sa yang g-yo par byed do //
T03TD3788E:17a-27: gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17a-28: de'i dmigs pa'i sems bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:17a-29: gang 'di ltar de rdzu 'phrul mi dmigs te /
T03TD3788E:17a-30: gang gi rlom sems su bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:17a-31: gang la'ang rlom sems pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17a-32: de bzhin du lha'i rna ba dang /
T03TD3788E:17a-33: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:17b-0: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon @17b par shes pa yang dag par bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:17b-2: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du byas te /
T03TD3788E:17b-3: thams cad sgyu ma lta bur gnas pa na der dmigs pa'i sems bkag nas thams cad du yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa zhes bya ba ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par shes par brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:17b-4: yang rgyu ci'i phyir mngon par shes pa la gdams par mdzad ce na /
T03TD3788E:17b-5: mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtod par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:17b-7: mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtod par byed pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17b-8: gzhan yang mngon par shes pas gdul bya btul nas sbyin pa la sogs pa drug las gang yang rung ba nyid kyis gnas te /
T03TD3788E:17b-9: de dang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs sbong du bcug nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do zhes bstan te /
T03TD3788E:17b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas skabs re re zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin pas dang /
T03TD3788E:17b-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba yang yod do //
T03TD3788E:17b-13: shin tu stong pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa med par nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:17b-14: de bzhin du kha na ma tho ba med par nye bar bzung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:17b-15: de bzhin du 'khrug pa med pa nyid nye bar bzung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:17b-16: / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar btags pa ste zhes bya ba ni gang yang ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:17b-17: sbyin pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin par nye bar gdags shing /
T03TD3788E:17b-18: tshul khrims la tshul khrims 'chal ba nye bar 'dzin pa la gdags so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:17b-19: mngon par shes pa lhag ma'i don ni rtogs par sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T03TD3788E:17b-20: mngon par shes pa drug la gdams pa bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:17b-21: mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:18a-0: de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis byin gyis brlabs pas bstan zhes gsungs @18a * //
T03TD3788E:18a-2: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi kha nas thabs la mkhas pas rang nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yin pas zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:18a-4: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:18a-5: 'di nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:18a-6: ci'i phyir gzhan gyi kha na ston par mdzad ce na /
T03TD3788E:18a-7: gzhan dag kyang don de thob par mdzad cing spyod pa nyid kyis na bdag nyid la gzung bar 'os pa ma yin pa nyid kyis nyes pa spang bar bya ba'i don du'o //
T03TD3788E:18a-8: ci'i phyir nyan thos kyi kha nas ston par mdzad ce na /
T03TD3788E:18a-9: byin gyis brlabs pa la mnga' brnyes pa shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
T03TD3788E:18a-10: ci'i phyir gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi kha nyid nas ston par mdzad ce na /
T03TD3788E:18a-11: de ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa'i mchog tu gyur pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i skal ba mnyam pas lhag pa'i phyir mthong lam dang rjes su mthun pa'i ston pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:18a-12: de ltar byas na tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so //
T03TD3788E:18a-13: ji ltar nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te bstan pa 'di yang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o zhes 'og nas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:18a-14: de la mthong ba'i lam skad cig ma bcu drug las sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:18a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang /
T03TD3788E:18a-19: khams rnams de dag re re yang btags pa tsam yin te zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:18a-22: sems can sems can zhes brjod kyang sems can cung zad kyang mi dmigs so //
T03TD3788E:18a-23: gang yang ming du btags pa'i chos de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:18a-24: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:18a-25: de dag kyang brtags pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'gag pa bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:18b-0: btags pa'i @18b chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am /
T03TD3788E:18b-2: gzhan du na ming du btags pa yin te zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:18b-3: gang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:18b-4: phung po la sogs pa rnams dang ;
T03TD3788E:18b-5: tshor ba drug shes pa drug po re re nas phye ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:18b-28: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18b-29: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18b-30: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18b-32: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18b-33: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18b-36: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:18b-38: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mthong ba bkag pa yin te zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3788E:18b-40: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:18b-41: mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3788E:18b-43: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes rgya cher gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:18b-44: gang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:18b-46: chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i rgyus yin pas zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:18b-48: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:18b-49: gang kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:18b-50: kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-0: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyi mtshan @19a * //
T03TD3788E:19a-1: nyid med par bkag pa yin pas zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:19a-3: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:19a-4: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro /
T03TD3788E:19a-5: rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19a-6: gang kun 'byung la chos shes pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19a-7: phung po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-8: shes pa drug la mngon par zhen pa bkag pa yin pas zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:19a-9: mdo ni gang ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:19a-10: des ming dang brdar byas pa'i chos su btags par khong du chud pas gzugs la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do //
T03TD3788E:19a-11: tshor ba la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do //
T03TD3788E:19a-12: 'du shes la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19a-13: gang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-15: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-16: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-19: chos rnams mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung nas mngon par zhen pa bkag pa yin pas zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:19a-21: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do //
T03TD3788E:19a-22: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-24: de ni 'di ltar gang mngon par zhen par byed pa po'am /
T03TD3788E:19a-25: gang gis mngon par zhen par byed pa'am /
T03TD3788E:19a-26: gang la mngon par zhen par bya ba'i chos de dag yang dag par yod pa ma yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19a-27: gang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19a-28: de ltar spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel te /
T03TD3788E:19a-29: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa yin pas zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:19a-31: mngon par zhen pa med par de ltar spyod pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:19a-32: chos thams cad rnam par 'phel te zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:19b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes gang @19b gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19b-1: gang 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19b-2: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa yin pas zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:19b-3: 'di'i mdo ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19b-4: de ni mtshan ma med par lhun gyis grub pa la gnas pa'i mtshan nyid byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:19b-5: de yang 'gog pa'i bzod pa'i dbang du mdzad nas de nyid bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19b-6: rigs kyi bu legs so legs so //
T03TD3788E:19b-7: 'di ni don dam pa de la bzod pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:19b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19b-9: gang 'gog pa la chos shes pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19b-10: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing der skyes nas des bstan pa'i chos nyan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:19b-12: de mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:19b-13: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:19b-18: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i so so'i yan lag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa 'dus pa'ang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:19b-19: de dag ma yin pa gzhan zhig la'ang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:19b-20: byang chub sems dpa' la de dag yong ba ma yin /
T03TD3788E:19b-21: de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:19b-22: de dag gi bdag nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes bya ba ni de dag byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo yin pa bkag nas rnam grangs gzhan gyis dgag par bzhed pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:19b-24: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
