T03TD3788E:38b-11: sems can ngan 'gror skyes pa thams cad la sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang de rnams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du rang nyid kyis sdug bsngal de dag nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes khas blangs pa'i rjes la rang gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:38b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid kyis sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:38b-13: nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems mi bskyed pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa nyid kyi phyir sems gzhan mi bskyed pas sems can thams cad skyob cing yongs su mi gtong ba dag dang /
T03TD3788E:38b-14: des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:38b-15: phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyis bya'o //
T03TD3788E:38b-16: gang sems dbyer med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:38b-17: de la 'dod cing mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa 'di ni chos la dga' ba'o //
T03TD3788E:38b-18: de'i bsgom pa'i ming du byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya ba ste chos la dga' ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:38b-19: chos la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar dang /
T03TD3788E:38b-20: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas te /
T03TD3788E:39a-0: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin nas nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas nas thams @39a * //
T03TD3788E:39a-1: cad du yang mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba mchog gis 'byed pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:39a-2: sems bskyed pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas spong ba che ba'i bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
T03TD3788E:39a-3: yang gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus spobs pa skyes so zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:39a-6: skyes bu la sogs par lta ba dang /
T03TD3788E:39a-11: phung po la sogs pa rnams su lta ba zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su lta ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:39a-12: sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:39a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:39a-14: byang chub khong du chud pa dang /
T03TD3788E:39a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa nyid de bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:39a-16: thabs la mkhas pa mi dmigs pas dmigs pa la sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3788E:39a-18: lta ba'i tshogs mi skye ba'i rgyu yin par bstan pa nyid kyis bshad ma thag pa'i mi dmigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pas khyad par du byas pa'i don yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:39a-19: spangs pa che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas rtogs pa che ba'i bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
T03TD3788E:39a-20: yang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis spobs pa skyes so zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:39a-21: byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thun mong ma yin pa'i sems chags pa med pa nyid de /
T03TD3788E:39a-23: sems de ni sems med pas zag pa med pa khongs su ma gtogs pa /
T03TD3788E:39a-24: skye ba la sogs pa las rnam par grol ba /
T03TD3788E:39a-25: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
T03TD3788E:39a-26: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:39a-28: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:39a-29: chos gang la yang skye ba'am 'gag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems /
T03TD3788E:39a-30: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:39a-31: de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:39b-0: brdar btags pa'i chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag par @39b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes bya ba ni drod kyi dus su ste /
T03TD3788E:39b-1: sngon dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag tu skye ba dang 'gag pa dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3788E:39b-3: 'grib pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rtse mo'i dus te /
T03TD3788E:39b-4: sngon dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag zad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:39b-5: khyad par du 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3788E:39b-6: 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i dus te /
T03TD3788E:39b-7: rtogs pa'i chos kyi nye ba dang ring ba dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3788E:39b-8: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
T03TD3788E:39b-9: rnam par byang ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi dus te /
T03TD3788E:39b-11: gnyen po'i phyogs ma lus pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3788E:39b-12: gang du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:39b-13: rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni mthong ba'i lam yin no //
T03TD3788E:39b-14: lugs las bzlog pa'i go rims kyis ni mthong ba'i lam gsal bar ston pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:39b-15: ci mthong ba mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:39b-16: de la nyan thos kyi sems med do //
T03TD3788E:39b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gsal bar ston to //
T03TD3788E:39b-19: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs la yang dag par chags pa med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:39b-20: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid nye bar bzung nas chos thams cad la chags pa med pa nyid du khas blangs pas ni rtogs pa'i yul shes par bya ba'i ched yin no //
T03TD3788E:39b-21: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:39b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med pa nyid khas blangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:39b-23: sems de la mngon par zhen pa'i rlom sems su 'gyur ba bkag pas ni mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rtogs pa la chags pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:39b-24: rtogs pa chen po nyid yin pa de bas spangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:39b-25: rtogs pa chen po khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir sems can gyi tshogs chen po nyid de /
T03TD3788E:39b-26: sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu gyur par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar bya ba'i ched dang /
T03TD3788E:40a-0: mthun par bsgrub pa'i ched du bya @40a * //
T03TD3788E:40a-1: ba bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du 'phags par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:40a-3: ched du bya ba'i khyad par ci yod ce na /
T03TD3788E:40a-4: dmigs pa ni de'i tshe 'phral du byung ba yin la sems can gyi ched du bya ba phyis 'byung ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:40a-5: stong pa bsgrub pa'i chos ni dmigs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:40a-6: phyis yun ring ba ni ched du bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:40a-8: ched du bya ba dag ni mda' ltong sbyar ba dang /
T03TD3788E:40a-9: 'ben la sogs pa dang chos dang mthun pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:40a-10: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las ched du bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:40a-14: ched du bya ba bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:40a-15: da ni bsgrub pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:40a-16: de la dkar po'i rten can gyi bya ba ni bsgrub pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:40a-17: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi dbye ba mngon par rtogs pa re re zhing 'dor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:40a-19: rtogs pa ni bsgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:40a-20: de yang dbye ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3788E:40a-25: rnam pa drug nyid kyi dbang du byas nas ;
T03TD3788E:40a-26: sbyin la sogs pa rnam drug la /
T03TD3788E:40a-27: de dag so sor bsdus pa yis //
T03TD3788E:40a-28: go cha'i bsgrub pa gang yin te //
T03TD3788E:40a-29: drug tshan drug gis ji bzhin bshad //
T03TD3788E:40a-31: ji ltar na drug la drug yod ce na /
T03TD3788E:40a-32: yang gnas brtan gang po spobs pa skyes pas go cha chen po bgos te /
T03TD3788E:40a-33: sems can thams cad ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:40a-34: 'di snyed do zhes yongs su chad pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi don du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams legs par spyod pa'i go cha nyid kyis de dag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:40a-35: de dag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'jog cing bdag dang gzhan pha rol tu phyin pa rnams zhes bya ba nas ma 'dres pa rnams la rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsgrub pa'i rten chen po nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:40b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa'i @40b rgyu mtshan gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:40b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sbyin pa gtong zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-2: de nyid nyan thos la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-3: chos de dag la bzod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-4: mos pa dang nye bar rtogs pas /
T03TD3788E:40b-5: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-6: de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-7: de nyid kyi theg pa gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-8: de nyid kyi sgyu mang byas pa'i 'du shes la nye bar gnas te sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-9: gtong pa po dang len pa po mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:40b-10: de dag ni go cha'i bsgrub pa dang po yin pa las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha la drug / de bzhin du de nyid kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3788E:40b-11: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3788E:40b-12: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3788E:40b-13: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lnga pa'o //
T03TD3788E:40b-14: de nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni drug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:40b-15: de ltar drug po de dag drug drug tu 'gyur mod kyi go cha rnams sbyin pa la sogs pa chos drug dang chos mthun pas go cha'i bsgrub pa drug tu bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:40b-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:40b-17: dmigs su med pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid kyis go cha'i bsgrub pa rang gi ngo bo chen po shes par bya ba'i ched du de bsam gtan la sogs pa la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed cing de rnams kyi ro myong bar byed pa yang ma yin la /
T03TD3788E:40b-18: de la chags par byed pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:40b-19: de rnams kyi dbang gis skye ba len par byed pa'ang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:41a-0: @41a * // bsam gtan la sogs pa la stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-2: smon pa med pa la lta bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byed pa ni ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:41a-3: thabs la mkhas pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:41a-4: go cha'i bsgrub pa thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i che ba nyid shes par bya ba'i ched yin no //
T03TD3788E:41a-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bsngags pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ni go cha'i bsgrub pa la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i che ba nyid shes par bya ba'i ched du yin no //
T03TD3788E:41a-6: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las go cha'i bsgrub pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:41a-8: // / go cha'i bsgrub pa bstan nas 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:41a-9: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3788E:41a-11: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-13: de ltar byas na mdo ni tshe dang ldan pa gang po bzang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-14: theg pa chen po zhon par gyur pa zhes bya zhe na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:41a-15: de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pas thog pa la zhon pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:41a-16: zhon pa la yang theg pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:41a-17: don gcig pa nyid kyis ming gcig tu rnam par gzhag kyang dbye ba rnam pa dgur 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:41a-18: bsam gtan gzugs med sbyin sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:41a-19: lam dang byams pa la sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:41a-20: dmigs pa med dang ldan rnams dang //
T03TD3788E:41a-21: 'khor gsum rnam par dag rnams dang //
T03TD3788E:41a-22: ched du bya dang mngon shes rnams //
T03TD3788E:41a-23: rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni //
T03TD3788E:41a-24: 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa theg chen la //
T03TD3788E:41a-25: zhon pa yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:41a-27: de la de'i dbye ba dgu ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:41a-29: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldan pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-30: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-32: mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-33: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41a-34: ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-0: mngon par shes pa'i 'jug @41b pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:41b-3: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i bsgrub pa ni gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug cing ldang bar gyur pa na dge ba'i rtsa bde bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba ni theg pa chen po yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:41b-7: de la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-9: mtshan ma zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-10: de la rnam pas dben pa ni 'dod pas dben /
T03TD3788E:41b-11: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos zhes bya ba nas rtags ni rtog pa dang bcas /
T03TD3788E:41b-12: dpyod pa dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-13: mtshan ma ni dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:41b-15: gong ma'i dbye bas rags pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-17: sa gang la tshor ba gang zhig yod pa de rtags so //
T03TD3788E:41b-18: mtshan ma ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:41b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa ni gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas /
T03TD3788E:41b-20: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos bstan pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid do //
T03TD3788E:41b-21: de nyid theg pa dman pa'i sems kyi go skabs mi 'byed pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'o //
T03TD3788E:41b-22: de nyid kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid kyis sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa'i yid la byed pa de dag la bzod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-25: khong du chud par byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:41b-26: sems pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid do //
T03TD3788E:41b-27: dang ba tsam nyid la mi mthun pa med pa ni mos pa'o //
T03TD3788E:41b-28: gnyis pa la sogs pa'i skad cig ma rgyun rjes su 'brel pa dang ldan pa ni bzod pa'o //
T03TD3788E:41b-29: gzhung sna tshogs pa gzhan la rigs pa rtog pa ni nye bar rtog pa'o //
T03TD3788E:41b-30: yongs su brtags pa'i don bskyang bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-0: de nyams par byed pa'i rkyen shes pa @42a * //
T03TD3788E:42a-1: kho na khong du chud par byed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:42a-2: don de la yid ches par bya ba'i phyir blo ma lus pas gnod par byed pa ni sems pa'o //
T03TD3788E:42a-3: de nyid brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa'i yid la mi byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid do //
T03TD3788E:42a-4: de nyid kyi bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-5: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid do //
T03TD3788E:42a-6: de nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-12: smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid do zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:42a-13: 'phags pa'i lam gyi 'jug pa ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-14: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang zhes bya ba nas ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ni theg pa chen po nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:42a-16: de'i mdo ni ji skad du //
T03TD3788E:42a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:42a-18: tshad med pa'i 'jug pa ni gang tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzod pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-19: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid kyis theg pa dman pa'i sems dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-22: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid kyis tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-23: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid kyis sems can rnams zag pa zad par nges par 'dren pa dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-24: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid kyis bsam gtan dang /
T03TD3788E:42a-27: mtshan ma rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba yin par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:42b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa'i go rims 'di ni @42b tshad med pa bzhi la gnas pa'i gang zag gi bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:42b-1: de nyid la de lta bu srid pa shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:42b-2: yang tshad med pa ni bzhi ste /
T03TD3788E:42b-7: btang snyoms la yang de dag re re zhing rnam pa gsum ste /
T03TD3788E:42b-8: sems can la dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:42b-11: de la sems can la dmigs pa ni rgyu rnam pa bzhis rnam par gzhag ste /
T03TD3788E:42b-12: nye bar bsdus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:42b-13: mi mthun pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:42b-14: rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:42b-15: 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:42b-16: ji ltar nye bar bsdu ba yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:42b-17: bde ba gsum gyis nye bar bsdus pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:42b-18: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni phan pa dang bde bas nye bar bsdus pa'i don du nye bar gnas so //
T03TD3788E:42b-19: rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i bde bas bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:42b-20: chen por gyur pa zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang /
T03TD3788E:42b-21: gnyis pa'i sa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:42b-22: de gnyis na dga' ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:42b-23: mi gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3788E:42b-24: de ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:42b-25: tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu tshad med pas na chu bo chen po bzhi'i chu 'dus pa dang 'dra bar de nyid tshad med par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:42b-26: de ltar yang bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:42b-27: de ltar na re zhig nye bar bsdus pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:42b-28: ji ltar na mi mthun pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs nyid yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:42b-29: gcugs med pa zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:42b-30: mi sdug pas nye bar bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:42b-31: sdug pas nye bar bsdus pa'i 'gal bar gyur pa gnod sems kyi gnyen po yin pas so //
T03TD3788E:42b-32: ji ltar na rnam par dag pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:42b-34: sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:42b-38: 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa rnams go rims ji lta ba bzhin du spangs nas de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:42b-39: 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'tshe ba med pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:42b-40: 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-0: @43a * // rgyu mthun pa gnod pa med pa nyid kyis ci rigs par 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43a-1: de ltar na re zhig sems can la dmigs pa ni rgyu rnam pa bzhis rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43a-2: chos la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni gcig thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:43a-3: thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid ni 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-5: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-8: gang dag la sems can du btags par byas pa'o //
T03TD3788E:43a-9: de la dmigs pa nyid ni shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:43a-10: legs par goms par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:43a-11: dmigs pa med pa yang rgyu rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3788E:43a-12: chos kyi dbyings mchog 'jig rten zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid la dmigs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:43a-13: 'jig rten pa'i chos las bdag med pa gtso bor gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:43a-14: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-15: yongs su chad pa med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:43a-16: de ltar na dmigs pa med pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43a-17: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems des ci zhig byed ce na /
T03TD3788E:43a-18: de'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3788E:43a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhag pa'i bsam pas lhag par mos pas spros pa nyid kyis khyab ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3788E:43a-20: ldan pa ni du mar shes par byas te /
T03TD3788E:43a-21: ma tra la sogs pa mtha' yas pas padma can bzhin du ring po nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:43a-22: nye bar rdzogs par byas te zhes bya ba ni blos de dang der nye bar yang dag par song ste de'i nye bar 'tshe ba bsal zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:43a-24: skad kyi dbyings kyi don ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:43a-25: snying rje la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:43a-26: mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni gang nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa mi dmigs pa dang ldan par shes pa nyid kyis chos thams cad g-yeng ba med pas mnyam par gzhag par shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-31: stong pa ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-33: smon pa med pa rnams la de dang mthun pa'i shes pa 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43a-34: dus gsum mi dmigs pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-0: khams gsum @43b mi dmigs pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-1: yang 'jig rten pa zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-3: de dang mi mthun pa rnams yang sbyin pa la sogs pa la mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni theg pa chen po de la zhon pa yin zhes bstan te /
T03TD3788E:43b-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang stong pa nyid shes kyang mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43b-6: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3788E:43b-7: gang yang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zhon pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43b-8: de'i mdo ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la zhon nas byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa rab tu 'dzin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43b-9: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung nas gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-10: khams la sogs pa rnams nas ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-11: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-12: de bzhin nyid la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-14: sangs rgyas gang yin pa de dag mi dmigs pa nyid nye bar bzung nas ming tsam nyid du shes pa'i phyir theg pa chen po de la de zhon pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:43b-15: de'i mdo ni de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'i ma 'dres pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom par byed cing bsgom pa dang rnam par bsgom pa'i ched du mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:43b-16: mngon par shes pa'i 'jug pa ni gang gzhan yang mngon par shes pa rnams thob nas sems can yongs su smin par byed /
T03TD3788E:43b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong /
T03TD3788E:43b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:43b-19: chos nyan zhing gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te theg pa chen po dang nam du yang mi 'bral te /
T03TD3788E:43b-20: rang gi ngo bo yongs su 'dzin pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:44a-0: de'i mdo ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub @44a * //
T03TD3788E:44a-1: kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa rdzogs pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:44a-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jug pa ni gang des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang /
T03TD3788E:44a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:44a-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas gang yin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming smos par mdzad cing de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod par mdzad pas theg pa chen po la zhon pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:44a-5: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:44a-7: // /'jug pa'i bsgrub pa bshad nas tshogs kyi bsgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:44a-8: de ni snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bcu drug tu gyur pa ni /
T03TD3788E:44a-9: brtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug / zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:44a-10: zung du 'brel pa'i lam gang dang //
T03TD3788E:44a-11: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3788E:44a-12: ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang //
T03TD3788E:44a-13: lam dang sa bcu gang yin dang //
T03TD3788E:44a-14: gnyen po tshogs kyi bsgrub pa yi //
T03TD3788E:44a-15: rim pa yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:44a-17: de la tshogs kyi bsgrub pa rnam pa bcu drug ni 'di lta ste //
T03TD3788E:44a-18: snying rje chen po'i tshogs dang /
T03TD3788E:44a-27: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gyi tshogs dang /
T03TD3788E:44a-28: thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs dang /
T03TD3788E:44a-33: gnyen po'i tshogs zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:44b-0: de la snying rje chen po'i tshogs ni gang go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i sgo nas @44b tshogs kyi bsgrub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba dang /
T03TD3788E:44b-1: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
T03TD3788E:44b-2: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas sdug bsngal de dang de nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal ba thos nas /
T03TD3788E:44b-3: dge ba des de rnams ngan song de rnams las thar nas byang chub pa'i bar du sangs rgyas mnyes pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pas sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i thugs rjes byas pa yin par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:44b-4: sbyin pa'i tshogs ni gang sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis sems can de snyed cig zas la sogs pa'i yo byad de dang de 'dod pa rnams la zas la sogs pa'i yo byad de dang de sbyin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:44b-5: chos bstan pa des byang chub pa'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos ston pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:44b-6: tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni gang sems can de snyed dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T03TD3788E:44b-7: bsam gtan la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar la byang chub kyi bar du chos bstan pa des bkod pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:44b-8: bzod pa'i tshogs ni gang sems can thams cad de snyed cig bdag la dbyug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:44b-10: khu tshur gyis brdeg kyang de la bdag gis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o //
T03TD3788E:44b-11: rang gi bzod pa de dang 'dra ba la gzhan da rab tu dgod pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:44b-12: brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni gang sems can de snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu 'jog go //
T03TD3788E:44b-14: yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:44b-15: rab tu 'jog pa dang mi 'bral bar byed pa'i tshig gi don yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:44b-16: bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni gang sems can de snyed cig rang nyid chos thams cad kyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos gang la yang 'khrul pa'am /
T03TD3788E:44b-17: 'khrul pa med par rjes su mi mthong ba bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du de nyid la yang dag par bskul zhing 'jog pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:45a-0: shes rab kyi tshogs ni gang 'di ltar chos gang la yang @45a * //
T03TD3788E:45a-2: pha rol mi dmigs pa de bzhin du de rnams kyang de la yang dag par bskul zhing 'jog pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:45a-3: de la tshu rol ni 'khor ba ste /
T03TD3788E:45a-4: byis pa rnams kyis re zhig myangs pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:45a-5: pha rol ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03TD3788E:45a-6: rang gi don la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams brtson 'grus la rab tu sbyor bas pha rol tu sems dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:45a-7: zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni gang yang bdag nyid pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ;
T03TD3788E:45a-8: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:45a-9: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa nas ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la 'di snyed ces bya bar yongs su chad pa med pa'i sems can yig khams la dmigs pas yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste /
T03TD3788E:45a-10: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas tshe 'di nyid la 'debs bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:45a-11: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas tshe phyi ma'i bde bas bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:45a-14: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gcig tu bde bas bsdus pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:45a-17: rtse gcig pas gcig tu bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:45a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni shin tu phul du byung ba'i bde bas nye bar bsdus pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:45a-19: lhag mthong gi tshogs ni gang sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am /
T03TD3788E:45a-20: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis pas ni 'ga' yang med kyi rang nyid dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:45a-21: ci zhig tu 'gyur ram zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ji ltar bstan par 'gyur zhe na /
T03TD3788E:45a-22: gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba ci yang rung ba'i bzhin du yod pa ni mi rigs te /
T03TD3788E:45a-23: de ni brjod pa tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:45a-26: rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin yin pa'i phyir te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:45b-0: rtog ges yongs su ma bskyod cing sun ma phyung ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang ba tsam du gyur ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar @45b du'o //
T03TD3788E:45b-1: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas de'i don 'tshal ba lags te /
T03TD3788E:45b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha 'dzam 'tshal ba lags par rig par bgyi ste /
T03TD3788E:45b-3: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgyu ma chos nyid nye bar bzung ba lags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-4: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi shes pa gsal bar byas pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:45b-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3788E:45b-6: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-8: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-9: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams nas ma 'dres pa'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-11: theg pa chen po 'go cha dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-12: gzugs la sogs pa nas theg pa chen po'i go cha'i bar du rnam grangs stong pa nyid kyis go cha med pa'i go cha bgos pa yin par rjes su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:45b-14: byed pa po nye bar mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:45b-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nas sems can du bstan cing brjod pa'i bar du ma byas /
T03TD3788E:45b-17: mngon par ma byas pa nyid kyis na phung po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-19: sems can la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-26: ma 'dres ba'i bar du de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-27: phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-31: chos nyid nges pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-32: yang dag pa'i mtha' rnams su byang chub dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:45b-34: de nyid nye bar bzung nas byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-36: mngon par 'dus byas pa bkag pas zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:45b-39: tshogs kyi bsgrub pa ni rnams ma skyes pa bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-40: de khyad par du 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:45b-41: 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas tshig gcig dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-0: gcig go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes @46a * //
T03TD3788E:46a-2: zung du 'brel pa'i lam gyi tshogs ni gang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung nas mi byed /
T03TD3788E:46a-4: mngon par mi byed do zhes gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:46a-12: mngon par 'du ma byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-13: ma skyes pa nyid kyis na shin tu mi dmigs pa'i rnam pas phung po la sogs pa rnams nas byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-14: ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing spyod zhing /
T03TD3788E:46a-17: sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /
T03TD3788E:46a-18: sangs rgyas de dag las chos nyan zhing /
T03TD3788E:46a-22: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bstan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par byang chub nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can rnams theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan las 'das kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-23: sangs rgyas rnams ma bcings ma grol ba yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:46a-24: de la shes rab kyis yongs su bzung bas ni ma bcings pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:46a-25: snying rjes yongs su bzung bas ni ma grol bar rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:46a-26: de ltar rigs pas byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje ni srid par gnas pa'i rgyu yin la /
T03TD3788E:46a-27: shes pas de ru gnas byas kyang //
T03TD3788E:46a-28: 'khor bar chags par mi byed do //
T03TD3788E:46a-29: dran pa yis ni bsdams pa'i sems //
T03TD3788E:46a-31: so sor rtog pa'i lcag brdabs pas //
T03TD3788E:46a-32: phun tshogs gnas su 'dren par byed //
T03TD3788E:46a-33: skye ba'i sems la brten pa dag /'ga' zhig mya ngan 'da' bar 'dod //
T03TD3788E:46a-34: 'jig rten legs pa la brten la //
T03TD3788E:46a-37: shes rab dang snying rje'i sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-38: de dag phan tshun tha mi dad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-39: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las 'das pa dang /
T03TD3788E:46a-40: sbyor ba la shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:46b-0: rtogs pa po'i dbang du mdzad @46b nas sbyor ba ni gang gis /
T03TD3788E:46b-3: gang zhig nges par 'byung zhes gang gis ston pa'i zhus pa lnga yin te /
T03TD3788E:46b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
T03TD3788E:46b-5: gang de la ji ltar na zhugs par rig par bgyi /
T03TD3788E:46b-6: gang las nges par 'byung ba lags /
T03TD3788E:46b-7: gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
T03TD3788E:46b-8: gang zhig 'dis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:46b-9: de la dang po zhus pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:46b-10: thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams re re zhing mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bdag nyid gnas shing gzhan dag kyang yang dag par bskul ba ni theg pa chen po zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:46b-11: yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i stong pa nyid ni ye shes kyi tshogs nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:46b-12: de la 'dir nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i stong pa nyid ni nang gi mig la sogs pa lnga rtag pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:46b-13: 'jig pa ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de /
T03TD3788E:46b-14: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa nye bar bzung ba'i phyir nang stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-15: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa rtag pa ma yin /
T03TD3788E:46b-16: 'jig pa ma yin pa nyid de'i rang bzhin de yin par nye bar bzung ba'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-17: de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnams de'i rang bzhin de yin par nye bar bzung ba'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-18: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa yin pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-19: phyogs bcu po ni phyogs kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir chen po stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-20: don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03TD3788E:46b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa'i don gyi tshul gyis stong pas na don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-22: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum po /
T03TD3788E:46b-23: khams gsum po nyid kyis stong pas na 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-24: 'dus ma byas ni skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:46b-26: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ni de nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:46b-27: mtha' ni mtha' stong pa nyid kyis na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-0: tha mar gyur pa rnams des stong pa @47a * //
T03TD3788E:47a-1: nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-2: dor ba ni spangs pa ste /
T03TD3788E:47a-3: yongs su spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dor ba las go bzlog pa nyid kyis na dor ba med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:47a-4: de ni des stong pa nyid kyi phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-5: 'phags pa thams cad kyis ma byas pa'i rang bzhin te /
T03TD3788E:47a-6: de ni des stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-7: chos rnams ni chos rnams kyis stong pa yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-8: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gzugs su rung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-9: gang la dus gsum mi dmigs pa ni de nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-10: 'dus pa'i chos rnams ni ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:47a-11: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:47a-12: de ni 'dus pas stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-13: dngos po med pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid ni des stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-14: dngos po med cing 'dus ma byas pa ni de rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:47a-15: rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:47a-16: mthong bas ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
T03TD3788E:47a-18: chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi byed pa stong pas na gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:47a-19: phyogs 'dis ni rab tu byed pa'i go rims ma tshang ba'i rab tu byed pa'i don ston pa yin par yang brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:47a-20: de dag ni gzhan dgag pa'i sgo nas stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig ston pa yin pas de dag la ni mngon par rtogs pa'i go rims 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin zhing /
T03TD3788E:47a-21: de rnams ni rab tu byed pa'i don kho na rjod par byed kyi bstan bcos don gtso bor byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni stong pa nyid kyi rab tu byed pa'i song ba dang /
T03TD3788E:47a-22: 'ong ba'i bya ba'i rim pa med pas ched du bya ba las nyams pa srid par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:47b-0: 'dir yang ci rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa ci @47b zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:47b-1: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:47b-2: 'di ltar gang mi dmigs pa de ni yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:47b-3: dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:47b-4: stong pa nyid 'di yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems kyis ma dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:47b-5: de ltar na stong pa nyid med pas chos thams cad yod pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3788E:47b-6: de ni 'dir dpyad par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:47b-7: 'di ni chos thams cad la dmigs pa dang bral bas stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:47b-8: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes tsam nyid yin no zhes bya bar 'dod do //
T03TD3788E:47b-9: kha cig ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo cha gnyis pa nyid kyis na cha gcig la gnas pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'dod do //
T03TD3788E:47b-10: la lan re de ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dmigs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:47b-11: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:47b-12: gang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni rmi lam gyi rta la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa la dmigs pa can gyi shes pa bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:47b-13: snga ma'i phyogs gnyis po de dag kyang ye shes kyi dngos po med pa yul du 'gyur la /
T03TD3788E:47b-14: stong pa nyid 'dus byas su thal bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:47b-15: phyogs gsum pa la nyes pa yod par mi brjod dam zhe na /
T03TD3788E:47b-16: nyes pa yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:47b-17: gang gi phyir lha sbyin bsad nas yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:47b-18: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni brjod par bya ba mang du yod mod kyi ye shes kyi tshogs bzhag pa 'di ni phyogs tsam mo //
T03TD3788E:47b-19: bsod nams kyi tshogs ni gang de la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:47b-20: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas gang gsungs zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03TD3788E:47b-21: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas ting nge 'dzin brgya rtsa gcig bstan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:47b-23: nges par 'byung ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:47b-25: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:47b-28: tshogs kyi bsgrub pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:48a-1: pa yin zhes song zin ba dang sbyor bar blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:48a-2: lam gyi tshogs ni gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te bslab pa las 'das pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-3: rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen por gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-4: 'dug pa la sogs pa'i spyod lam rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-7: lta ba dang rnam par lta ba'i bya ba rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-9: rngub pa rnams la rdza mkhan gyi dpes ring ba dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-10: thung bar rab tu shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-11: lus kyi gnyen po'i 'du shes ba lang gi shan pa'i dpes bstan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-12: khams rnams la so sor brtags nas gtsang bar phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por chud pa'i snod kyi dpes mi gtsang bar so sor brtags pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-13: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-14: de bzhin du phyi rol dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-15: phyi dang nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta bas /
T03TD3788E:48a-16: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa na lus de yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no //
T03TD3788E:48a-18: 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin te zhes bya ba la gsungs te /
T03TD3788E:48a-21: gnas skabs de nyid 'phel bar gyur pa las 'chi ba la thug pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyis chos nyid bsgrub pa de la sbyor ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:48a-22: tshig gnyis po 'dis shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:48a-23: gang yang me la sogs pas mthar thug par byas pa de la yang chos nyid 'di las ma 'das so zhes bya ba'i tshig gsum yin no //
T03TD3788E:48a-24: gdung can zhes bya ba la stobs zad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-27: shin tu ldan pa'i don te /
T03TD3788E:48a-28: gang de yod pa de ni myur ba'i 'bad pa can no //
T03TD3788E:48a-29: shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par shin tu rig pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48a-30: dran pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa ma brjed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48a-31: rnam par bsal ba zhes bya ba ni phyir bzlog pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48a-34: yid mi bde ba dag las so //
T03TD3788E:48a-35: de lang dang nga'i zhes bya ba mngon du byas nas lus la sems pa ni chags pas so //
T03TD3788E:48a-36: tshor ba mi sdug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48a-37: rab tu ldan pa'i sems zhum pa nyid ni yid mi bde ba'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-0: de bzhin du bde bar phyin ci log pa'i gnyen po tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag @48b pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-1: rtag par phyin ci log pa'i gnyen po sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-2: bdag tu phyin ci log pa'i gnyan po chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-3: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-4: skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-5: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-6: skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir zhing bsgom pa la sogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed kyang gnas te /
T03TD3788E:48b-9: yang dag par 'jog cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-11: tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa'i dbang du mdzad nas tshig gcig dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-13: gnyis kyis gsungs par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-17: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-18: de la mos pa ni byed 'dod pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-19: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa ste /
T03TD3788E:48b-20: des nyon mongs pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pas na de ni 'du byed do //
T03TD3788E:48b-21: de yod pas na de dang ldan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-22: gang des yon tan sna tshogs bsgrubs pas na rkang pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-23: de'i yan lag yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:48b-24: sgom mo zhes bya ba'i sgom pa ni goms par byed pa ste /
T03TD3788E:48b-26: de yang sbyor ba las su rung ba nyid dam /
T03TD3788E:48b-27: sbyor ba brtan par gyur pa'am /
T03TD3788E:48b-28: mi dge ba'i tshogs dang ma 'dres pa'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-29: sgom pa yang chos mngon pa bdag rnam pa gnyis su 'dod do //
T03TD3788E:48b-32: chen po rnam pa gsum dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-33: bcos ma dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dang /
T03TD3788E:48b-35: mthong ba'i chos de nyid la bde bar gnas pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-36: gzhan dag ni bzhir 'dod de sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa ni lus kyi'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-37: yongs su sbyangs pa bsgom pa ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-38: gnod pa med pa ni sems kyi'o //
T03TD3788E:48b-39: ma lus par brten pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi'o zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:48b-40: dben pa la gnas pa bsam gtan dang po dang ldan par gyur pas des 'dod pa la sogs pa las rnam par dben pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49a-1: chags dang bral ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gnyis pa dang ldan par gyur pas des rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:49a-2: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49a-3: 'gog pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa dang ldan par gyur ba ste /
T03TD3788E:49a-4: dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni de 'gag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49a-5: rnam par spong ba yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /
T03TD3788E:49a-6: gzugs med pa dang ci rigs par ldan par shes pa sngon du 'gro bas dor bya bsal bas na rnam par spong ba zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-7: yang bag la nyal ba yang dag par bcom pa ni dben pa'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-8: kun nas ldang ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-9: kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gcod pa ni 'gog pa'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-10: nye bar len pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa ni rnam par spangs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-11: yang chos mngon pa ba rnams ni dben pas na khams las dben pa'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-12: 'dod chags las bral bas na nyon mongs ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
T03TD3788E:49a-14: rnam par spong bas na dngos po rnam par spong ba ste /
T03TD3788E:49a-15: tshig thams cad kyis mya ngan las 'das pa nyid ston pa yin no zhes chos mngon pa pa rnams 'chad do //
T03TD3788E:49a-16: dmigs pa la brten pa'i stobs kyis snga ma'i rten gtong ba ni rnam par spong ba zhes bya'o zhes gnas brtan sangs rgyas bshes gnyen gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rab tu byed par bshad do //
T03TD3788E:49a-17: 'dir yang bdag gis ni rnam par rtog pa bzhi'i gnyen po rnam pa bzhi ni mthong ba'i lam yin no //
T03TD3788E:49a-18: de la rtog pa de rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:49a-19: dben pa la gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya ba yin par rig par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:49a-20: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams mthong ba'i lam gyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49a-21: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po ni dben pa ste /
T03TD3788E:49a-22: des rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs spang bya rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49a-23: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
T03TD3788E:49a-24: des dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49b-0: 'dzin @49b pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po ni 'gog pa ste /
T03TD3788E:49b-1: des bdag rang dbang can la sogs pa'i 'dzin pa ma lus par 'gog cing spong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:49b-2: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po ni rnam par spong ba ste /
T03TD3788E:49b-3: des bdag tu btags pa'i mtshan ma sna tshogs dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-4: phung po la sogs pa ji lta ba nyid yongs su shes pas spong ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49b-5: de bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa lnga po dbang byed pa'i don gyis na dbang po yin no //
T03TD3788E:49b-6: lnga po de dag nyid mi thub pa'i don gyis na stobs so //
T03TD3788E:49b-12: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis mthong ba'i lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49b-13: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-20: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T03TD3788E:49b-21: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du phyin pa'i don gyis na lam mo //
T03TD3788E:49b-22: sgra ji bzhin shes pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa bcu gcig dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-23: mi shes pa kun shes pa la sogs pa'i dbang po dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-25: dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-29: lus su gyur pa'i bza' ba dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-30: btung ba dran pa rnams dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-31: rjes su dran pa bcu po rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-33: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-36: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-37: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-39: thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-40: gzhung gi tshogs brtsams pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:49b-41: bstan pa de dag ni lam gyi tshogs yin par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:49b-42: chos de dang de dag thams cad mthong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:49b-43: bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:49b-44: sa'i tshogs ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i dbye bas rnam pa bcur 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:50a-2: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:50a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:50a-5: chos thams cad kyi 'gro ba dang ;
T03TD3788E:50a-6: 'ong ba bkag pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:50a-7: yangs gang la chos du zhig yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur zhe na /
T03TD3788E:50a-8: rnam pa bcus sa dang po yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:50a-9: yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis //
T03TD3788E:50a-10: sa ni dang po thob 'gyur te //
T03TD3788E:50a-11: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-12: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
T03TD3788E:50a-13: gtong dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-14: dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-15: rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-16: sangs rgyas bkur 'dod dga' ba dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-17: chos ston pa dang bden pa yi //
T03TD3788E:50a-18: tshig ni bcu po yin par 'dod //
T03TD3788E:50a-19: 'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas //
T03TD3788E:50a-20: yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:50a-22: mdo las ji skad du lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T03TD3788E:50a-23: phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyong ba mtshan ma mi dmigs pa nye bar gzung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:50a-24: rnam pa brgyad kyis ni sa gnyis pa yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:50a-25: tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod //
T03TD3788E:50a-26: rab tu dga' dang snying rje che //
T03TD3788E:50a-27: bkur sti gus par nyan pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-28: brgyad pa sbyin la sogs par brtson //
T03TD3788E:50a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:50a-30: de la byas pa gzo ba ni chung du byas pa las lhag par byed pa ste /
T03TD3788E:50a-31: chud mi gson pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:50a-32: rnam pa lngas ni sa gsum pa yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:50a-33: thos pas mi ngoms nyid dang ni //
T03TD3788E:50a-34: zang zing med par chos sbyin dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-35: sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-36: 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-37: ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba //
T03TD3788E:50a-38: rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga //
T03TD3788E:50a-40: rnam pa bcus sa bzhi pa yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:50a-41: nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang //
T03TD3788E:50a-42: sbyangs pa yang dag sdom bsten dang /
T03TD3788E:50b-0: bslab pa yongs su mi gtong @50b dang ;
T03TD3788E:50b-1: /'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-2: mya ngan las 'das dang bdog kun gtong //
T03TD3788E:50b-3: mi zhum pa dang lta ba med //
T03TD3788E:50b-5: dgon pa la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:50b-6: 'dod pa chung ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:50b-7: de la 'dod pa chung ba ni gang ma rnyed pa'i rnyed par mi 'dod pa'o //
T03TD3788E:50b-8: chog shes pa ni ji ltar rnyed pa las lhag par mi 'dod pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:50b-9: rnam pa bcus ni sa lnga pa yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:50b-12: bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-13: mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-14: rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log / yid gnyis dang ni nyon mongs bzod //
T03TD3788E:50b-15: bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs nas //
T03TD3788E:50b-16: sa ni lnga pa yang dag 'thob //
T03TD3788E:50b-18: rlom pa nyid ni khengs pa ste /
T03TD3788E:50b-19: mtho ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T03TD3788E:50b-20: rnam pa drug gis ni sa drug pa yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:50b-21: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T03TD3788E:50b-22: bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pa //
T03TD3788E:50b-23: zhes bya ba'i mdo ni ji skad du //
T03TD3788E:50b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:50b-25: slob ma dang ni bse ru la //
T03TD3788E:50b-26: dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs pa //
T03TD3788E:50b-27: slong na mi zhum bdog pa kun //
T03TD3788E:50b-28: btang yang mi dga' med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-29: dbul yang slob pa mi spong bas //
T03TD3788E:50b-30: sa ni drug pa yang dag thob //
T03TD3788E:50b-33: nyan thos 'dod pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:50b-34: rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:50b-35: 'khor ba la skrag pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:50b-36: dbye ba nyi shus sa bdun pa yongs su sbyong ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:50b-37: bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-38: srog dang gang zag chad rtags dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-39: mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-40: khams dang skye mched dag dang ni //
T03TD3788E:50b-41: khams gsum pa la chags gnas dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-42: sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-43: dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-44: der lta ba la mngon zhen dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-45: stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:50b-46: de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni //
T03TD3788E:51a-2: de yis sa ni bdun pa thob //
T03TD3788E:51a-4: gang gis dri ma nyi shu rnam par spangs pas sa bdun pa gnon pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51a-5: yang de nyid la rnam pa nyi shus yin te /
T03TD3788E:51a-6: rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-7: 'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-8: snying rjes rlom pa med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-9: chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes //
T03TD3788E:51a-10: mi skye ba la bzod ba dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-11: chos rnams rnam pa gcig ston pa //
T03TD3788E:51a-12: rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-13: 'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong //
T03TD3788E:51a-14: zhi gnas nges bar sems pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-15: lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-16: sems dul ba dang thams cad la //
T03TD3788E:51a-17: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-18: chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod par //
T03TD3788E:51a-19: zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-20: kun tu bdag gi ngo bo ni //
T03TD3788E:51a-21: ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o //
T03TD3788E:51a-22: zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51a-24: stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba dang /
T03TD3788E:51a-25: mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:51a-26: smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:51a-27: brtse ba ni snying rje ba'o //
T03TD3788E:51a-28: de dag dang rlom pa med pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51a-29: de la snying rje ni skal ba dman pa rnams la'o //
T03TD3788E:51a-30: phan gdags pa'i dus la rtog pa'i bsam pas snying rje bya ba dang ldan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la phan gdags pas bsdu bar sbyor ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:51a-31: dbye ba rnam pa bzhis sa brgyad pa yongs su spyod do //
T03TD3788E:51a-32: yang rnam pa bzhi ni 'di dag yin te /
T03TD3788E:51a-33: sems can kun yid shes pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-34: mngon par shes pas rtse ba dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-35: sangs rgyas zhing bzangs bsgrub pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-36: sangs rgyas bsten dang dbang po shes //
T03TD3788E:51a-37: zhing gi sbyong ba sgyu ma yi //
T03TD3788E:51a-38: ting nge 'dzin ni thob pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-39: bsams bzhin srid pa len pa dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-40: las ni rnam pa brgyad du 'dod //
T03TD3788E:51a-42: zhing sbyong zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten ni sems can gyi ste /
T03TD3788E:51a-43: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta bu'o //
T03TD3788E:51a-44: chos rnam pa bcu gnyis bsgrubs pas sa dgu pa yongs su sbyong ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:51a-45: smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang //
T03TD3788E:51a-46: lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang //
T03TD3788E:51b-0: spobs pa chu bo lta bu @51b dang ;
T03TD3788E:51b-1: / mngal du 'jug pa'i mchog dang ni //
T03TD3788E:51b-2: rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang //
T03TD3788E:51b-3: 'khor dang skye gnas dag dang ni //
T03TD3788E:51b-4: nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams kyis //
T03TD3788E:51b-5: yon tan phun tshogs rdzogs ba yin //
T03TD3788E:51b-7: sa bcu ba nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa nye bar gnas pas de la de bzhin gshegs par brjod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su chud pa las dgongs pa ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-8: sa dang po la sogs pa de dag gi yang yongs su sbyong ba'i chos bstan te /
T03TD3788E:51b-9: de la bshad pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:51b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:51b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T03TD3788E:51b-12: rang gi mtshan nyid re re nas mi dmigs pa'i rnam par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:51b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ba ji lta bu zhe na /
T03TD3788E:51b-14: sa dgu las shin tu 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:51b-15: sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni //
T03TD3788E:51b-16: gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas pa //
T03TD3788E:51b-17: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa //
T03TD3788E:51b-18: bcu pa yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:51b-20: de las dgu ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:51b-21: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa ni dad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:51b-22: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:51b-23: mos pas spyod pa'i sa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-24: de la rigs kyi sa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-25: de la yang brgyad pa'i sa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang po yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-26: de la yang mthong ba'i sa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i sa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-27: de la yang bsrabs pa'i sa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-28: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni de yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i sa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-29: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni de yang dgra bcom pa'i sa yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-30: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
T03TD3788E:51b-31: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang rnam pa dgu yin no //
T03TD3788E:51b-32: sa'i tshogs bstan nas gnyen po'i tshogs brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:51b-33: mthong dang goms pa'i sa dag la //
T03TD3788E:51b-34: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dbye ba rnams //
T03TD3788E:51b-35: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:51b-36: gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya //
T03TD3788E:51b-38: de la yang rnam par rtog pa brgyad do //
T03TD3788E:52a-0: @52a * // 'di dag ni re zhig mthong ba'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par rtog pa bzhi yin no //
T03TD3788E:52a-1: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3788E:52a-4: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3788E:52a-5: gang zag rdzas su yod pa'i rten can dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-6: skyes bu btags bar yod pa'i rten can no //
T03TD3788E:52a-7: bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang bzhi po kho na yin no //
T03TD3788E:52a-8: dngos po'i rnam pa tsam gyi rten can dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-9: gnyen po'i rnam pa'i rten can te /
T03TD3788E:52a-11: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad btags pa'i rten can dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-12: btags pa de'i mtshan ma'i rten can te /
T03TD3788E:52a-14: rnam par rtog ba de dag ni khams gsum ka'i yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52a-15: rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du de gang las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni khams gsum las nges bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:52a-16: gang gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ba ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T03TD3788E:52a-17: ji ltar gnas par 'gyur ba de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa gnyis mthong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-18: sgom pa gnyis kyi mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rnam par mi rtog pa la sbyor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:52a-20: theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyi ga yang ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:52a-22: mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:52a-23: gzugs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de la mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par rtog pa dang po'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas chos kyi dbyings dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-26: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-29: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:52a-34: khams la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52a-35: de bzhin du phung po dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-0: skye mched rnams la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba @52b mi 'thad pas mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams ni gzugs la sogs pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:52b-4: de rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-5: khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa bkag pas rmi lam dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-12: sprul pa rnams nges par 'byung ba mi 'thad pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-14: de rnams kyi rang bzhin khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba bkag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa yin pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:52b-16: de rnams kyi rang bzhin de dag stong ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-17: mthong ba'i lam gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nges par 'byung ba mi 'thad pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar gnas pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-19: de rnams kyi ngo bo dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-20: khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bkag pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-23: de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo de dag stong ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-24: mthong ba'i lam gyi 'dzin pa'i dbang du mdzad nas dgra bcom pa dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-27: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nges bar 'byung bar mi 'thad pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-29: de rnams de dag gis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:52b-31: de rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-32: khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:52b-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:52b-35: de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo de dag gis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:53a-0: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i @53a * //
T03TD3788E:53a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo de dag stong ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes ston pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53a-4: mthong ba'i lam gyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas ming dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-8: gdags pa rnams nges par 'byung ba mi 'thad pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53a-10: de rnams ni de rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:53a-12: de rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-13: khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53a-16: de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo de dag stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:53a-17: de la ming du btags pa ni 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-19: tshor ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:53a-20: mtshan mar btags pa ni dngos po 'di ni gzugs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:53a-21: tshor ba ni nyams su myong ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53a-22: brdar btags pa ni khams dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-24: skye gnas las skyes pa'i dbye bas sems can rnams rang gi skad dang brdar ji ltar grags pa'o //
T03TD3788E:53a-25: 'di dag thams cad kyi dbye ba yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T03TD3788E:53a-28: tha snyad ji lta ji lta ba'i rjes su 'jug pa tsam nyid yin gyi don dam pa stong pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:53a-29: de bzhin du skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-31: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:53a-33: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53a-34: bsgom pa'i lam gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
T03TD3788E:53a-35: rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad mi gnas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:53a-36: yang rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad mi gnas par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas ba zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:53b-2: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:53b-3: rnam par byang ba med ba dang /
T03TD3788E:53b-4: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nyid theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:53b-5: mi gnas pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53b-7: de rnams de dag gis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:53b-9: stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:53b-10: mi gnas pa la bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53b-12: de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo de dag stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53b-13: bsgom pa'i lam gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa des gang yang nges par 'byung ba med do //
T03TD3788E:53b-15: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:53b-16: gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs na chos rnams las chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:53b-20: srog la sogs pa rnams shin tu rnam bar dag pa nye bar bzung ba'i phyir dmigs su med do //
T03TD3788E:53b-21: chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:53b-22: phung po rnams nas ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams kyang /
T03TD3788E:53b-23: shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung ba'i phyir mi dmigs te /
T03TD3788E:53b-24: so sor rang gi ngo bor dmigs pa nye bar mi dmigs so //
T03TD3788E:53b-26: rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do zhes bya ba nas ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du dmigs pa mi dmigs so zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:53b-27: 'dir shin tu rnam par dag pa smos pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mtshan shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:53b-28: bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa rnams nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung ba'i phyir dmigs su med do //
T03TD3788E:53b-29: gang dag dmigs su med ce na /
T03TD3788E:53b-30: rang gi ngo bo dmigs su med do //
T03TD3788E:54a-0: rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa dmigs @54a * //
T03TD3788E:54a-1: su med do zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhes bstan pa yin no /
T03TD3788E:54a-2: sgom pa'i lam gyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad nas rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-3: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa bcu rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-4: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-9: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-10: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-12: sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams lam gyi 'bras bur gyur pa 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan mi dmigs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:54a-13: yang gang rnam par rtog pa bzhi po sngar bstan pa nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang 'brel pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:54a-14: de ltar 'dir ni yang gnyen po'i dbang du mdzad pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:54a-15: snying rje la sogs pa 'di dag ni byang chub kyi rgyu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshogs zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:54a-16: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las tshogs kyi bsgrub pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T03TD3788E:54a-18: // / tshogs kyi bsgrub pa bshad nas nges par 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:54a-19: ched du bya dang mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:54a-20: sems can don la 'bad med dang //
T03TD3788E:54a-21: shin tu nges par 'byung ba dang //
T03TD3788E:54a-22: thob pa'i nges par 'byung nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:54a-23: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid du //
T03TD3788E:54a-24: nges bar 'byung ba'i lam nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:54a-25: rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid ni //
T03TD3788E:54a-26: nges 'byung bsgrub pa yin zhes bya //
T03TD3788E:54a-28: de la nges par 'byung ba'i bsgyur pa ni rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:54a-30: ched du bya ba'i nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-31: mnyam pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-32: sems can gyi don gyi nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-33: lhun gyis grub pa'i nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-34: shin tu nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-35: thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54a-36: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-0: de la @54b ched du bya ba'i nges par 'byung ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03TD3788E:54b-1: mchog tu nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-2: spangs pa'i nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-4: gang du mchog nyid nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:54b-5: ji ltar 'di ltar de dang de //
T03TD3788E:54b-6: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:54b-7: go cha chen po bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i go cha'i bsgrub pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-8: theg pa chen po la yang zhon pa zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i che ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-9: ci'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi bsgrub pa'i che ba nyid kyis 'di'i chen po rnam pa gsum po nges par 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:54b-10: de ni 'chad par 'gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:54b-11: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas zhes gnas brten rab 'byor gyis nges par 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:54b-12: de nyid bstan pa ni rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
T03TD3788E:54b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-14: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-16: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-17: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:54b-18: ma 'dres pa'i bar du ji skad bstan pa rnams theg pa chen po'i nges par 'byung ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:54b-19: rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin /
T03TD3788E:54b-21: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te /
T03TD3788E:54b-22: phyin ci ma log pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:54b-23: de kho na bden pa yang dag pa ste /
T03TD3788E:54b-24: ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:54b-25: gang gi phyir rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par rtag pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtag pa'i ma rig pas rnam par gzhag cing de ni rkyen gyi 'du byed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa sred pa dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-0: @55a * // srid pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no //
T03TD3788E:55a-1: de bas na theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:55a-3: 'jig rten na grags pa tsam gyi don ji lta ba nyid ma yin pas mngon par rtogs pa'i 'bras bu'i theg pa chen po ni de la mngon par zhen pa'i bcings pan yid yin zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:55a-4: gzhan du na theg pa chen po gnyen po nyid ni don med do zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:55a-7: gnyi ga'i dbang du mdzad nas tshig dang po dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-10: gnyis pa gnyis ni snga ma dag gis bshad pa dag gi tshig yin la /
T03TD3788E:55a-11: de nas de la gzhan gsum gyi dbang du byas nas ni tshig gsum yin no //
T03TD3788E:55a-12: de bzhin du dmigs pa la sogs pa de rnams kyis mnyam pa'i nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bas gzhan du 'gyur ba'i chos can ni tshig bcu gcig yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:55a-15: phung po la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas ma 'dres pa'i bar du dngos po dang dngos po med pa bkag par gsungs pa ni theg pa chen po'i nges par 'byung ba yin par 'dod pa'i 'og ma rnams la yang khas blang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:55a-19: spangs pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad nas rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-21: rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-22: rigs kyi sa'i gang zag nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-24: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa dang dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po dang /
T03TD3788E:55a-25: dngos po med pa bkag pas theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:55a-26: rtogs pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad nas sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:55a-27: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa rnams dngos po dang /
T03TD3788E:55b-0: dngos po med @55b pa bkag pas theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:55b-1: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po dang dngos po med pa bkag pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:55b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:55b-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:55b-4: theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:55b-5: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po dang dngos po med pa bkag pas bstan to //
T03TD3788E:55b-6: sangs rgyas kyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mnan cing /
T03TD3788E:55b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang dngos po dang dngos po med pa bkag pa bstan to //
T03TD3788E:55b-8: sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rang gi sku'i 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:55b-9: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa bkag pa bstan to //
T03TD3788E:55b-10: sangs rgyas kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing tshad med cing grangs med ba'i 'jig rten gyis khams gsung gis go bar mdzad pa snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:55b-11: de la gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu las de las kyang mnyen pa gang zhen /
T03TD3788E:55b-12: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston par mdzad pa'i phyir mnyen pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-13: mthong ba'i chos nyid la bde bar nges par mdzad pa'i phyir 'joms pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-14: don bzang ba'i phyir yid du 'ong ba'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-15: yi ge bzang ba'i phyir yid du 'thad pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i rjes la thob pa'i phyir dag ba'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-17: nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal gyi bag chags thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-18: tshig dang yi ge rab tu grags pa'i phyir rab tu gsal ba'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-19: mu stegs can blo gros ngan pa thams cad kyi lta ba rnam par 'joms pa'i stobs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir snyan cing 'jebs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-20: bsgrubs pa nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i phyir mnyan par 'os pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-21: pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rtsol ba'i phyir mi tshugs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-22: thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i phyir snyan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:55b-23: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir dul ba'o /
T03TD3788E:56a-0: @56a * // bslab pa bcas ba'i thabs bde ba mnga' ba'i phyir mi rtsub pa'o //
T03TD3788E:56a-1: de las 'das na nges par 'byung ba'i thabs yang dag par ston par mdzad pa'i phyir mi brlang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:56a-2: theg pa gsum gyis 'dul ba ston pa'i phyir rab tu dul ba'o //
T03TD3788E:56a-3: rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir rnar snyan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:56a-4: ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i phyir lus sim par byed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:56a-5: lhag mthong gis rab tu dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa'i phyir sems tshim par byed pa'o //
