T03TD3788E:99a-0: nges par 'byung ba'i ma tshang ba thob pas brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag ni skye ba rjes su zin kyang sh'a ri'i bu de @99a * //
T03TD3788E:99a-1: dag 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-2: de chos nyid kyi rigs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:99a-3: nges par thob par 'gyur bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-4: phan yon gyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:99a-7: // / phan yon bshad nas de'i bar chad brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:99a-8: skyon ni bcu tshan bzhir bcas pa //
T03TD3788E:99a-9: drug tu nges par rtogs par bya //
T03TD3788E:99a-11: bzhi bcu rtsa drug ces bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:99a-12: de dag kyang tshegs chen pos thob pa ni gang pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni des shin tu phyis te spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-13: spobs pa myur zhes pa ni gang dang po pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas su ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye ba na'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-14: lus kyi gnas ngan len du 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum ni gang yang glal ba dang /
T03TD3788E:99a-16: phan tshun ste ga cing 'dri na lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i bar chad yin par bstan pa nyid yin par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:99a-17: steg pa ni rang gi yo byad kyis gzhan gyi yan lag bzhi bkod pa'o //
T03TD3788E:99a-18: sems kyi gnas ngan len ni gsum ste /
T03TD3788E:99a-20: phan tshun yi ge gzhan la chags shing 'dri zhing nyan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:99a-21: bdag gis 'di'i gting mi rnyed do zhes bya ba zhes smra zhing /
T03TD3788E:99a-22: sems bskyed nas langs te 'gro ba ni sems kyi bar chad byed pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-23: gzhan la chags pa ni gang log par rtog cing dmigs pas dngos po la chags pa ste /
T03TD3788E:99a-24: phan tshun smra ba'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-25: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i kha ton la sogs pa byed pa ni gang yang lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba de nyid kyis mgo bo dang /
T03TD3788E:99a-26: yang sems kyi rnam par 'gyur ba de nyid kyis 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed pa ni bar du gcod pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99a-27: phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni gang yang 'dir ni bdag lung ma bstan te /
T03TD3788E:99a-28: bdag gi ming yang ma brjod do zhes ma dad par gyur nas zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-0: yul la sogs par brtag pa med pa'i @99b rigs pas so //
T03TD3788E:99b-1: rgyu la mngon bar zhen pa'i nyams pa ni gang shing gi rtsa ba spangs te 'dab ma dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-2: yal gal 'ju bar byed pa'i dpes ni rgyu yongs su nyams par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:99b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rdzogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-6: gya nom pa'i ro myang ba las nyams par gsungs pa ni khyi'i dpes gya nom pa ja'i myang ba las nyams ba ni don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-7: theg pa'i mchog 'dzin pa las nyams pa ni gang glang po 'dod pas glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes tshol ba'i dpes theg pa mchog las nyams par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-8: ched du bya ba las nyams pa ni gang rgya mtsho chen po dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-9: ba lang gi rjes su 'gran pas dpes ched du bya ba las nyams par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-10: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa las nyams pa ni gang phya mkhan gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i gzhal med khang nyi ma dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-11: zla ba'i tshad kyis gzhal yas khang byed bar 'dod pa'i dpes rgyu dang 'bras bur 'joms pa las go bzlog pa ston pas de dang rjes su mthun par 'brel pa las nyams par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-12: bla na med pa'i gnas las nyams pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-13: khams kyi rgyal phran bskrun par byed pa'i dpes chos kyi sku'i go 'phang las nyams par don gyis yang bar du gcod pa'i bdud kyi las nyid bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-14: yul rnam pa mang po la rnam par rtog pa'i spobs pa 'byung ba ni gang chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:99b-15: chos kyi yul de la sogs pa mang po 'byung bas yi ge 'dri ba la mngon bar zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-16: dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa'i yi ge la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-18: 'di'i yi ge med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-19: yul la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-22: tshigs su bcad pa'i ro myang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:99b-23: lam ma yin pas thabs la mkhas ba zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:100a-0: @100a * // bar du gcod pa bdun ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo yod pa ma yin pas dngos po med pas dngos po med pa 'dri bar mi nus pa'i phyir dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-1: bris pa'i yi ge la de yin par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-2: bris pa'i yi ge la de yin par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-5: tshigs su bcad pa'i ro myong bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa por ste /
T03TD3788E:100a-7: bdud kyis nye bar bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams las thabs la mkhas pa tshol ba ni bdud kyi las nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100a-9: snyom las kyi nyams pa ni gang yang chos smra ba dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-11: phan tshun du mngon par 'brel ba ni gang gcig la gcig 'dun pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-12: snyom las kyi nyams pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100a-13: 'dun pa'i yul tha dad pas nyams pa ni gang yang de dag nyid gcig la gcig 'dun pa dang ldan pa yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100a-16: 'dod zhen chung ba nyid kyis nyams pa ni gang yang de dag gcig la gcig rnyed pa la sogs pa lhur len pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-17: chos nyan pa 'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100a-18: de bzhin du sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-21: mi dge ba'i chos nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-22: gtong ba la ser sna byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-23: sbyin pa la kun du 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-24: mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-25: rnam par spros pas go ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-26: mdo la sogs pa'i chos mngon par shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-27: mngon par mi shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-28: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-31: thabs ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-36: 'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dun pa dang bral ba dang ma bral ba nyid ces bya ba go rims bzhin du 'chad pa po dang /
T03TD3788E:100a-40: tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa rnams pa bcu gcig ni bar chad bcu gcig tu bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:100b-0: gang gzhan yang de dag sbyangs pa'i yon @100b tan dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:100b-1: yang de dag nyid phan tshun 'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dun pa dang bral ba nyid kyis tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100b-2: ngan 'gro las phyir phyogs pa ni gang gzhan yang la la zhig der 'ongs te /
T03TD3788E:100b-3: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i mi bsngags pa brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100b-4: bde 'gror 'gro ba la yid bde ba ni gang de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams legs par brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:100b-5: 'di ni dang por nyan pa po dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-6: phyis chos smra ba nges par bya ba'i tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa nges par byas pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:100b-7: da ni dang por 'chad pa po dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-8: phyis nyan pa po'i nges par byas pa'i tshogs dang mi ldan pa rnam pa bdun du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:100b-15: phyi mar gzhag pas bar chad rnams la 'jug par 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:100b-17: 'chad pa po gnyi ga sngon dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-18: phyi ma gnyi ga la brten pa nyid du shes par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:100b-20: nyan pa po dag gis mngon par 'brel ba'i tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:100b-21: gang 'di ltar gcig pu nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-23: 'dod pa nyid ni rjes su 'brel pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-24: go skabs mi 'byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-25: zang zing cung zad 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-26: de sbyin par mi 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-27: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-28: bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-30: de bzhin du lo legs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-31: mu ge byung ba la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-33: chom rkun la sogs pa'i rgyus dkrugs pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:100b-35: khyim la lta bas nyan pa po 'dor bar bde ba ni rab 'byor chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste /
T03TD3788E:100b-36: zla med cing bdag gir byed pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:100b-37: chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:101a-0: dge slong chos smra ba ni bsod snyoms ster ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes bya ba @101a * //
T03TD3788E:101a-1: nas des nyan pa de dag phyir ldog pas phyir dong nas zhes bya ba'i bar bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-2: bdud sdig can gyis dbye ba'i sbyor ba ni gang gzhan yang bdud sdig to can 'di skad du /
T03TD3788E:101a-3: nged kyi khong du ji ltar chud pa 'di yin gyi khyod klog pa de ni shes rab kye pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes dbyen byed kyi /
T03TD3788E:101a-4: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba gang yin ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byed par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i sbyor bas zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-5: bcos ma nye bar bsgrub pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te /
T03TD3788E:101a-6: de yongs su shes nas rnam par spang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-7: yul ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa la dga' ba bskyed pa ni gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du 'ongs pa mthong ste /
T03TD3788E:101a-9: bdud kyis sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bor ste /
T03TD3788E:101a-10: des de la 'dod pa bskyed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:101a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos thams cad yod pa ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-14: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-15: skyon bzhi bcu rtsa drug ni bar chad du gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-16: 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che chen po'i dpes ni de ltar bar chad mang pos yongs su zin yang bar chad kyang rnam grangs bstan pas skyes bu rmongs pa bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T03TD3788E:101a-18: blo dman pa de dag la zhes bya ba ni bar chad byed pa nges pa las bzlog ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-19: bar chad mang po yod kyang de la yang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyus yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:101a-20: bar chad kyi chos skyes pa rnams bsal ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:101a-21: dkar pho'i phyogs ma lus pa rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu'i rgyu nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:101b-0: bu mang po yod pa'i dpes de la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad de la dgongs @101b shing de la brtson pa rnams la de rnams kyis srung ba la sogs pa mdzad pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:101b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:101b-3: 'jig rten ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101b-4: bar chad kyi chos rnams kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:101b-6: // / sbyor ba rnams bstan nas de'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya dgos pas de'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:101b-7: gang gis mtshon te mtshan nyid du //
T03TD3788E:101b-8: shes bya de yang shes pa dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-9: khyad par byed dang rnam gsum ste //
T03TD3788E:101b-10: mtshon bya'i ngo bo nyid gang yang //
T03TD3788E:101b-12: de ltar mtshan nyid bzhir 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:101b-13: de la shes pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas re zhig rnam pa bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:101b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-17: sems can sems kyi spyod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-18: de bsdus pa dang phyir bltas dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-19: mi bzad pa yi rnam pa dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-20: chags bcas sogs dang rgya chen dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-21: chen por gyur dang tshad med dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-22: rnam shes bstan du med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-23: sems bltar med dang shes pa de //
T03TD3788E:101b-24: g-yo ba la sogs shes bya dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-25: de la gzhan yang de dag ni //
T03TD3788E:101b-26: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par shes //
T03TD3788E:101b-27: thub pa de bzhin nyid rtogs dang //
T03TD3788E:101b-28: gzhan bstan pa zhes bya ba dag / thams cad shes pa nyid skabs kyi //
T03TD3788E:101b-29: shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yin //
T03TD3788E:101b-31: de la de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i shes pa ni gang rnam pa thams cad mngon bar byang chub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas shes pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:101b-32: stobs la sogs pa'i bar du'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101b-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug ba nas sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos de dag bskyed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:101b-34: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:101b-35: 'jig rten 'jig pa med par shes pa ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni 'jig pa ma yin /
T03TD3788E:101b-36: rab tu 'jig pa ma yin pa'i don gyis na /
T03TD3788E:102a-1: la sogs ba 'jig pa ma yin /
T03TD3788E:102a-2: rab tu 'jig pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i chos nyid nges par ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten ston par byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-3: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa ni gang zhen /
T03TD3788E:102a-4: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa mkhyen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rag las pa'i phyir de yang sems can du btags pa'i rgyu phung po la sogs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dmigs su med pa nyid kyis 'jig rten ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:102a-6: re zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-7: yang ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:102a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'am /
T03TD3788E:102a-9: dmigs par ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba nas 'thad pa bstan pa yin te zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-11: de rnam par g-yeng ba zhes bya ba ni chos nyid 'di la chos nyid de mi dmigs te /
T03TD3788E:102a-12: de nyid sems can thams cad kyi sems bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:102a-13: g-yengs pa yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du shes so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-14: sems mi bzad pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gang yang de rnams nyid kyis 'dod pa dang bral ba dang /
T03TD3788E:102a-16: spong ba'i rnam pa mi bzad pa'i rnam pa rab tu mkhyen par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-17: sems 'dod chags bcas par shes pa ni gang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni sems yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-19: rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med do //
T03TD3788E:102a-20: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na /
T03TD3788E:102a-21: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la sogs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa lta ci smos zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102a-22: sems rgya chen po shes pa ni gang sems kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pas rgya che bar byed pa'i sems rgya che ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-0: sems chen por gyur pa shes pa ni gang de bzhin du sems chen por gyur pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab @102b tu mkhyen to zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-1: sems tshad med pa ni sems kyi rgyu ni rten med cing tshad med pa ni sems de dag la gang gnas bar bya ba'i rten med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-2: sems bstan du med pa zhes pa ni gang sems la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-3: sems bltar med pa shes pa ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga la snang bar ma gyur to zhes snga ma bzhin du bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-4: sems g-yo ba la sogs pa shes pa ni gang sems 'phro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:102b-5: 'du ba la sogs pa'i phung po lnga la brten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du snga ma bzhin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-6: de yang bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:102b-7: srog gang yin pa de ni lus so //
T03TD3788E:102b-8: lus kyang gzhan srog kyang gzhan zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-9: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par shes pa ni gang yang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phung po lnga'i de bzhin du mkhyen pas bcum pa la sogs pa yongs su mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin nyid thugs su chud pa gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan cing brtag par zhes bya bar shes pa ni gang rab 'byor de ltar sems 'phro ba la sogs pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:102b-11: chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bshad do //
T03TD3788E:102b-12: de bas na des de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum yin pa'i phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten ston par byed do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:102b-13: 'di skad du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sgo nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'i phyir 'jig rten ston to zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:102b-14: da ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed pas 'jig rten ston par byed pa rnam pa bcu gsum gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:103a-2: smon pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:103a-3: skye med 'gag pa med sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:103a-4: 'khrug pa med pa nyid dag dang //
T03TD3788E:103a-5: 'du mi byed dang rnam mi rtog //
T03TD3788E:103a-6: rab dbye mtshan nyid med phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:103a-7: lam shes nyid kyi skabs kyis ni //
T03TD3788E:103a-8: shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin par bzhed //
T03TD3788E:103a-10: de la stong pa nyid shes pa ni gang de'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-11: mtshan ma med pa shes pa ni gang de'i mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-12: smon pa med pa shes pa ni gang de'i mtshan nyid smon pa med pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-14: 'gag pa med pa shes pa ni gang de'i mtshan nyid skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-15: 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-16: sogs pa smos pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-18: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-19: rang bzhin shes ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-20: rten med pa'i shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-21: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du shes pa bsdu bar rig pa bya'o zhes gang bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-22: gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-23: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-24: rten med pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-25: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ces bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-26: chos nyid 'khrug pa med pa shes pa ni gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad pas mtshan nyid de ni rnam par 'khrug par mi nus so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-27: mngon bar 'du byed pa med par shes pa ni gang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan nyid de dag mngon bar 'dus ma byas pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-28: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa ni gang de mtshan nyid de dag rnams zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:103a-32: 'dus byas pa'i dngos po bkag pas nam mkha'i dpes lam shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas yang dag par bstan to zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103a-33: rab tu dbye ba shes pa ni gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung /
T03TD3788E:103b-0: ma byung @103b yang rung zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:103b-1: de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
T03TD3788E:103b-2: mtshan ma thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis lam shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pas 'bras bu sems can gyi don byed ba yin par gsal bar bya ba'i ched du zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103b-3: mtshan ma med pa'i shes pa ni gang gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:103b-4: yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
T03TD3788E:103b-7: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mi 'khrug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3788E:103b-8: byang chub kyi phyogs ni nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3788E:103b-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba nas de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med bar mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103b-10: de bzhin du lam shes pa nyid kyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:103b-11: de las gzhan ji lta ba bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston pa shes pa'i dbye ba bcu bzhi las brtsams nas /
T03TD3788E:103b-12: de bzhin nyid kyi chos brten nas //
T03TD3788E:103b-13: gnas dang gus par bya ba dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-14: bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-15: mchod dang byed pa med nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-16: kun 'jug mkhyen pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-17: ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-18: 'jig rten stong nyid zhes bya dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-19: brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum dang //
T03TD3788E:103b-20: bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston //
T03TD3788E:103b-22: rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni //
T03TD3788E:103b-23: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
T03TD3788E:103b-25: de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi chos la brten nas bzhugs pa shes pa ni gang gis bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:103b-28: rab 'byor rgyu des de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi chos la brten nas bzhugs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:103b-29: de la gus par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:104a-0: mchod par bya ba shes pa ni gang de ltar chos la rim @104a * //
T03TD3788E:104a-3: mchod par mdzad pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub po zhes bya bar 'brel to //
T03TD3788E:104a-4: slar mdzad pa med pa nye bar bzung nas byas pa gzo ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-5: byed pa med pa shes pa ni gang byed pa po nye bar bzung nas chos thams cad byed pa med par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-6: thams cad du 'gro ba shes pa ni gang yang chos thams cad byed pa med pa la ye shes 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-7: ma mthong ba'i don bstan pa ni gang gzugs mthong ba med pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar la mthong ba med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i don gyis na mthong ba med pa'i gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba de ni 'jig rten ston pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-8: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par brjod pa shes pa ni gdul bya rnams yang dag par sdud pa ste /
T03TD3788E:104a-9: gang yang 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes brjod pa la sogs pas stong pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa gsum la dgongs nas 'phags pa'i gang zag gsum gyi dbang du mdzad de /
T03TD3788E:104a-11: go rims bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:104a-12: ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:104a-13: mngon sum du bya ba'i 'jug pa'i dbang du mdzad nas ston pa dang /
T03TD3788E:104a-15: mthong ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:104a-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa shes pa ni gang gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ston pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-17: zhi ba'i shes pa ni gang 'di ni zhi ba'o //
T03TD3788E:104a-18: ston pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-19: 'du shes 'gog pa'i shes pa ni gang yang chos rnams med pa nyid kyi ji nas 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:104a-20: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba de ltar gzigs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pas 'jig rten gzigs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104a-21: shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:104a-23: // / shes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas khyad par gyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:104a-24: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis //
T03TD3788E:104b-0: bden pa la brten @104b khyad par can //
T03TD3788E:104b-1: drug rnams dang ni bcu yis ni //
T03TD3788E:104b-2: khyad par mtshan nyid shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:104b-3: zhes bstan pa la bden pa'i rten can zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:104b-4: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i spyod yul can no //
T03TD3788E:104b-5: khyad par zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:104b-7: drug dang bcu zhes bya ba smos te /
T03TD3788E:104b-8: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i khyad par sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:104b-9: bsam pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:104b-10: rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab po //
T03TD3788E:104b-11: tshor ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:104b-12: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa nas dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3788E:104b-13: spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yin par brjod do //
T03TD3788E:104b-14: mi mnyam pa nyid kyi khyad par sdug bsngal la chos shes pas bsdus pa ni gang mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam ba las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:104b-15: rab 'byor gzugs mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104b-16: tshad med pa'i khyad par sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus pa ni gang tshad med pa zhes bya bas ni tshad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:104b-17: rab 'byor gzugs kyang tshad med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104b-18: grangs med pa'i khyad par sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pas bsdus pa ni grang med pa zhes bya ba ni bgrang ba las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:104b-19: rab 'byor gzugs kyang gangs med ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104b-20: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i khyad par ni bstan par gyur pa'i phyir rgyu'i khyad par gyi sgo nas thams cad la nye bar dgongs par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:104b-21: yang na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:104b-22: rjes su shes pa 'di ga nyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthar phyin pas mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang mnyam par gyur pa la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:104b-23: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /
T03TD3788E:105a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mdzad pa chen pos @105a * //
T03TD3788E:105a-1: nye bar zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:105a-2: nyan thos la sogs pa la yang chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mtshan nyid yod par mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
T03TD3788E:105a-3: yang ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi byad par du 'phags pa bstan ste ;
T03TD3788E:105a-4: rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:105a-5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po rnams rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:105a-6: mi dmigs pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa brjod par rigs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105a-7: gzhan yang nam mkha'i dpes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i chos bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa gsal bar thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:105a-8: zag pa med pa'i chos bstan pa gyu phun sum tshogs pas 'bras pu med pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni du ma zag pa ma lus pa las sems grol ba la sogs pa yang dag par 'dzin te /
T03TD3788E:105a-9: de bstan pa'i tshe 'bras bu thob po zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:105a-10: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud par byed pa'i khyad par kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus pa ni gang yang blon po'i dpes nyan thos dang /
T03TD3788E:105a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan pa nyid kyis mdzad pa chen po la sogs pas nye bar gnas pa nyid yin te /
T03TD3788E:105a-16: mngon bar chags pa med do zhes gsungs pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105a-17: de bas na thugs su chud pa thun mong ma yin pa'i 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105a-18: skyes bu'i khyad par gyis rig par bya ba'i khyad par kun 'byung la chos shes pas bsdus pa ni gang 'di'i cha phra ba dang /
T03TD3788E:105a-21: yid gzhungs pas shes par bya ba yin par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105a-22: de la phra ba ni de kho na nyid kyi don la 'jug pa'i phyir phra ba'o //
T03TD3788E:105a-23: ma lus pa'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir mkhas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:105a-25: ji snyed pa'i ngo bor rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:105a-26: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3788E:105b-0: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni sngon @105b blo yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:105b-1: so so'i skye bos skye bas thob pas don de gnyi ga la 'jug nus pa ni shes rab dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:105b-2: yid gsal ba ni de bden pa mthong bas don de gnyis ka la 'jug pa'i shes pa yod pas yid gsal ba'o //
T03TD3788E:105b-3: thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus ba ni gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi grangs snyed 'das pas rjes su 'brang ba nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du gyur pa'i shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:105b-4: spangs pa las 'di nyid la mos pa la sogs pa mchog tu 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105b-5: myur du shes pa'i khyad par kun 'byung la rjes su shes pas bsdus pa ni gang 'di ni phul du byung ba'i chos yin par rgya cher bshad pas /
T03TD3788E:105b-6: nyan thos kyi theg ba la ltos nas 'di nyid la mngon bar brtson pa rnams myur du mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105b-8: mang ba med pa'i khyad par 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus pa ni gang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das su zin kyang 'di la 'phel ba'am /
T03TD3788E:105b-9: 'grib pa med pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa che ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105b-10: drag tu bsgrub pa'i khyad par 'gog pa la chos shes pas bsdus pa ni gang ba drus ma be'u mi 'dor ba'i dpes thos pa dang bcas pa'i mos pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa sngon gyi thos ba la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:105b-11: yang dag sbyor ba'i khyad par 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus pas ni gang yang de nyid sangs rgyas mang po la brten pas dga' ldan nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa nyid skye ba snga mar yongs su dri ba ma byas pa dang ldan pa ni 'di la yid gnyis ldan pas de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid ma thos /
T03TD3788E:105b-12: yongs su dri ba ma byas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:105b-13: de dag ni sa gnyis su ltung zhing 'dod pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:105b-14: sngon gyi rgyu'i bag chags kyis rgyun chad cing spyad pa yin te zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-0: dmigs pa'i khyad par 'gog pa la rjes su shes pas bsdus pa ni gang yang rgya mtshor gru zhig pa'i dpes bar chad dang @106a * //
T03TD3788E:106a-2: bar chad med pa dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i mtshan mar dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-3: dmigs pa med pa'i dbang du mdzad nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-4: rten gyi khyad par lam la chos shes pa'i bzod bas bsdus pa ni gang yang bum pa so btang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-5: ma btang ba'i dpes bsgrub pa'i chos gzhi med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-6: gzhi yod par bstan pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-7: rgyu tshogs pa'i khyad par las chos shes pas bsdus pa ni gang yang rgya mtshor gru zag lhan byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-8: ma byas pa'i dpes sgrub pa tshang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-9: ma tshang ba'i don gyis bstan to zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-10: yongs su bzung ba'i khyad par lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas bsdus pa ni gang yang skyes bu rgas shing nyam chung ba'i dpes lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-11: thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-12: yongs su ma bzung bar ldan pas 'khor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-13: mya ngan las 'das par lhung ba dang mi lhung bar bstan pa'i don la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-14: yang thabs la mi mkhas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-15: thabs la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhen /
T03TD3788E:106a-17: nga yir 'dzin pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas pas sa gnyis su ltung ngo //
T03TD3788E:106a-18: de las bzlog pa ni thabs la mkhas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:106a-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-20: ro myang ba med pa'i khyad par bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pas yang dag par bsdus pa ni gang rang bzhin med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kun du rtog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106a-21: re ba med pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sngo bar byed cing bsten pa nyid la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106a-22: bshad ma thag pa'i lhug bas bstan pa'i don gang yin ba de tshigs su bcad pas phyis bsdus pa ni 'di yin te //
T03TD3788E:106a-23: bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang //
T03TD3788E:106a-24: gzhal dang grangs las yang dag 'das //
T03TD3788E:106a-25: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
T03TD3788E:106a-26: rig bya thun mong min zhes nyid //
T03TD3788E:106a-27: shes myur bri dang gang ba med //
T03TD3788E:106a-28: sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106b-0: dmigs @106b pa rten dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106b-1: yang dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang //
T03TD3788E:106b-2: ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
T03TD3788E:106b-3: bcu drug bdag nyid ces bya ste /
T03TD3788E:106b-4: gang gi lam ni gzhan dag las //
T03TD3788E:106b-5: khyad du 'phags pa khyad par ro //
T03TD3788E:106b-6: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T03TD3788E:106b-8: // / khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas byed pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:106b-9: phan dang bde ba skyob pa dang //
T03TD3788E:106b-10: mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang //
T03TD3788E:106b-11: gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni //
T03TD3788E:106b-12: yongs su 'dren pa nyid dang ni //
T03TD3788E:106b-13: lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyis //
T03TD3788E:106b-14: 'bras bu mngon sum mi byed bdag / tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
T03TD3788E:106b-15: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
T03TD3788E:106b-17: de la phan pa'i byed pa ni gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten la phan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106b-18: 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas /
T03TD3788E:106b-19: dka' ba spyod pas 'gro ba rgyud lnga rnam par grol ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod pa'i phyir phan pas bsdus pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106b-20: bde ba byed pa ni gang sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03TD3788E:106b-22: 'khrug pa rnams nas mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:106b-23: 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:106b-24: tshe 'di'i bde bas bsdus pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106b-25: skyob pa'i byed pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang ci yang rung ba las skyob cing /
T03TD3788E:106b-26: yang mi skye ba'i chos bstan pas 'jig rten skyob pa nyid kyi phyir rnam bar smin pa med pa'i chos la bkod pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106b-27: skyabs kyi byed pa ni gang sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu dgongs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur pa nyid kyis gtan du phan pa la zhugs pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:106b-28: gnas kyi byed pa ni gang chos thams cad 'dre ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:106b-31: 'gag pa med par chos ston pa nyid kyi gnas su gyur ba'i phyir sdug bsngal rgyu las bzlog pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107a-0: dpung gnyen gyi byed pa ni @107a * //
T03TD3788E:107a-1: gang zhig gang chos thams cad kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:107a-3: gzugs la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang med par chos ston pa'i dbung gnyen du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-4: mya ngan las 'das par mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa la zhugs pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107a-5: gling gi byed pa ni gang gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang phye ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pas chus yongs su bskor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-6: chos mthun par sred pa zad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir gling du gyur pa nyid kyis rang dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-10: gzhan gyi don rtogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bor gyur pa'i zhugs pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107a-11: yongs su 'dren pa'i byed pa ni gang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-13: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-14: rnam par byang ba med pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa'i phyir yongs su 'dren par gyur pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107a-15: lhun gyis grub pa'i byed pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:107a-16: rab 'byor gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-17: gzugs stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:107a-18: de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:107a-19: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon bar 'du byed pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te /
T03TD3788E:107a-20: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos thams cad shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir sems can gyi don la lhun gyis grub par 'jug cing zhugs pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107a-21: thams cad shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:107a-22: theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i don gyis 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa'i byed pa ni gang rab 'byor chos thams cad mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:107a-24: rnam par byang ba'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:107b-0: chos thams cad ni @107b mi g-yo ba'i ngang tshul can te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis lam shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas chos bstan pa nyid kyis theg pa ji lta bas nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:107b-1: de mngon sum du mi byed pa la zhugs pa'i don no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107b-2: rten gyi byed pa ni gang rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:107b-3: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngang tshul can te zhes bya bas rnam pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mkhyen pa nas chos ston pa nyid kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:107b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten du gyur pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107b-5: byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:107b-6: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-7: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-8: dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-9: ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-10: mngon bar zhen pa bkag pa dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-11: dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-12: mi mthun thogs pa med dang ni //
T03TD3788E:107b-13: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-14: de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-15: ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
T03TD3788E:107b-16: mtshan bzhi lta bur mtshon ba nas //
T03TD3788E:107b-17: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
T03TD3788E:107b-19: ji ltar bcu drug gi bdag nyid yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:107b-20: nyon mongs pa las dben pa'i rang bzhin ni gang 'dod chags dang //
T03TD3788E:107b-22: gti mug rnam par bsal ba'i phyir dben pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107b-23: de'i rtags dben pa'i rang bzhin ni gang 'dod chags dang /
T03TD3788E:107b-25: gti mug rnams kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107b-26: de'i mtshan mas dpen pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:107b-27: de la rtags ni lus la sogs pa'i gnas ngan len no //
T03TD3788E:107b-28: mtshan ma ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:107b-29: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs dag gis dben pa'i rang bzhin ni gang de bzhin du 'dod chags dang /
T03TD3788E:108a-0: dben pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba @108a * //
T03TD3788E:108a-2: lhag par mos par byed pa rnams la bsgom pa'i lam nye bar bkod pas zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108a-3: dka' ba nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang chos thams cad shin tu med pa yin pas de dang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:108a-4: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa ni dka' ba byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:108a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni don dka' ba yin par bstan pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3788E:108a-6: gcig tu nges pa'i ngo bo ni gang de la go bgos pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i sar lhung ba'i gnas med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:108a-7: nges par bsgom ba bstan pa nyid kyi don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108a-8: ched du bya ba'i rang bzhin ni gang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob bar bya ba'i don du go cha bgos pa'i ched du bya ba las gzhan du mi 'khrul par shes par bya ba'i don du'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108a-9: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni gang bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab ste /
T03TD3788E:108a-10: de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi bas bsgom par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:108a-12: sgom pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bsgom pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ba rnam par bsgom pa mi dmigs pa de bas na /
T03TD3788E:108a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bsgom pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgoms pa lags so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108a-15: mngon bar zhen pa bkag pa'i rang bzhin ni gang rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par zhen pa med par yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:108a-17: mi skrag ba la sogs pas lam shes pa'i rnam par bsgom pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108b-0: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni gang bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol ba'i bsam bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su rtog pa @108b lags zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:108b-2: sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yongs su rtog pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa nyid bstan pas zhes gsungs pa yin ta /
T03TD3788E:108b-4: gzugs nas rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang yongs su rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba nas thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:108b-5: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa nyid las /
T03TD3788E:108b-6: dmigs pa'i bsgom pa'i khyad par rab tu bskyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'i khyad par ngo bo ston pa'i don gyis zhus pa la /
T03TD3788E:108b-7: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no ;
T03TD3788E:108b-8: / zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:108b-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i khyad par shes pa'i don gyi lan so sor bstan pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108b-10: gal te de de ltar yin na /
T03TD3788E:108b-11: sdig pa'i chos rnams thams cad de //
T03TD3788E:108b-12: mi dge ba la sogs pa de ji ltar yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ji ltar yin zhen /
T03TD3788E:108b-13: gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:108b-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so zhes bya ba gsungs pa de nyid kyi phyir gcig la gcig ngo bo zab pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:108b-16: de dag gi de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:108b-17: de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ji ltar 'thad pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:108b-18: sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du thugs las chung ba nyid kyi rgyu ni dmigs par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:108b-19: dmigs par byed pa'i dbye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:109a-0: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun @109a * //
T03TD3788E:109a-1: pa'i rang bzhin ni gang lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:109a-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
T03TD3788E:109a-3: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa yang ma legs so //
T03TD3788E:109a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni mtshan ma la spyod do zhes bya ba 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa nyid kyis ni 'dzin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod ma yin pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:109a-5: thogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni gang de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum yongs su rdzogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang mthun pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la ye shes thogs pa med pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:109a-6: gzhi med pa'i rang bzhin ni gang gzugs la sogs pa'i rten mi dmigs pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:109a-8: shes bya mnyam pa nyid kyi don nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:109a-9: 'gro ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni gang 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa gsum po kun bskyed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la /
T03TD3788E:109a-10: gnas brtan rab 'byor dper byas nas /
T03TD3788E:109a-11: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du /
T03TD3788E:109a-12: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song ba nas /
T03TD3788E:109a-13: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
T03TD3788E:109a-14: de bzhin du chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni chos su mngon bar 'dod pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:109a-15: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi spyi yin no //
T03TD3788E:109a-16: chos nyid gnas pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya ste /
T03TD3788E:109a-17: chos nyid kyi rgyun 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o ;
T03TD3788E:109a-18: / bsgrub pa'i chos kyi khyad par du 'gro ba ni de'i rnam par rtog pa med pa ni chos nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:109a-19: mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni theg pa gsum gyi dbye ba dmigs su med pa'i chos nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:109b-0: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni theg pa @109b gsum gzhan du tshol ba med pa ni chos nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:109b-1: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03TD3788E:109b-2: de bzhin du phung po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-6: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa nyid du rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par gyur pa'i phyir ming de'i mtshan ma dpang por gyur pas /
T03TD3788E:109b-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rtogs pa mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:109b-10: mdo las de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa'i mtshan ma chen po bco brgyad du gyur pa ni g-yo ba dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-12: kun tu rab tu g-yos pa'o //
T03TD3788E:109b-16: lde / rab tu ldeg / kun tu rab tu ldeg go //
T03TD3788E:109b-19: kun tu rab tu chem mo //
T03TD3788E:109b-23: shig / rab tu shig / kun tu rab tu shig shig ces bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:109b-24: de la rnam pa drug ni g-yo ba dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-30: ltas chen po bco brgyad ni g-yo ba la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba rnam pa drug po de dag nyid go rims bzhin du chung du dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-32: chen po nyid kyis shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:109b-33: snod kyi 'jig rten spyad bar byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-34: ma byas pa'i dbang du byas pa gnyis dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-35: sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi dbang du byas pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3788E:109b-36: sems can gyi tshogs mi dge ba la spyod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-37: sna tshogs la mos pa dang /
T03TD3788E:109b-39: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i bya ba chung du dang /
T03TD3788E:110a-1: po'i dbye bas g-yos so zhes bya ba nas kun du rab tu shig shig ces bya ba'i bar du tshig bco brgyad kyis don bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes gnas brtan dbyig gnyen gyis bshad do //
T03TD3788E:110a-2: de ltar thams cad shes pa'i rnam par rjes su skyes pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:110a-3: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni gang lha'i bu dag gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
T03TD3788E:110a-4: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:110a-6: de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag med cing mi dmigs so //
T03TD3788E:110a-9: de bzhin du lam gyi rnam par shes pa yang rjes su skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:110a-10: de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin bcu drug ni gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab ste /
T03TD3788E:110a-11: rtag tu de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:110a-12: ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don gyis so //
T03TD3788E:110a-13: gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni /
T03TD3788E:110a-14: chos nyid las chos nyid brtsal ba'i don gyis so //
T03TD3788E:110a-15: chos nyid ces bya ba ni chos rnams kyi dbye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-16: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i chos thams cad thob pa'i rgyu'i don gyis so //
T03TD3788E:110a-17: chos gnas pa nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-18: chos skyon med pa nyid ces bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-19: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa de la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-20: yang dag pa ni phyin ci ma log pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:110a-21: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste /
T03TD3788E:110a-22: bdag med pa las gzhan du de kho na brtsal du med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-23: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-24: yang ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid dmigs su med ce na /
T03TD3788E:110a-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma skyes pa nyid yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:110a-26: de'i tshe du ma rnams la bstan pas rtogs pa thob pa gsal ba nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:110b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas @110b yongs su ma bzung zhing /
T03TD3788E:110b-1: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i sar ltung bar 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:110b-2: gzhan de rnams kyis de ltar shes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la sbyar zhing spro ba bskyed pa'i don du bya lus chen por gyur pa'i dpes sbyin pa la sogs pas rab tu zin kyang gnyis pho dang bral na nyan thos la sogs pa'i sar ltung ste /
T03TD3788E:110b-3: de ltar bstan pas gnyis po ni nges par 'byung ba la gco bo yin par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:110b-4: de la gshog ba dang ldan pa la ni 'dab chags zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:110b-5: des dbye ba ni bya nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:110b-6: zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir bya zhes bya ba smos so //
T03TD3788E:110b-7: de ltar bdag nyid lus che la gshog pa dang bral ba'i phyir zhig ces gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:110b-8: rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:110b-10: // / ci nas kyang 'dir sbyor ba la brtson pa thams cad 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:110b-12: de lta mod kyi ji lta bu zhig la zhe na /
T03TD3788E:110b-13: thar pa'i chad dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa rnams la'o //
T03TD3788E:110b-14: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa yang ji lta bu zhig ce na //
T03TD3788E:110b-15: mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs //
T03TD3788E:110b-16: yang dag bsgrub la mkhas pa ni //
T03TD3788E:110b-17: rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di ru /
T03TD3788E:110b-18: thar pa'i cha dang mthun par 'dod //
T03TD3788E:110b-20: gang rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa 'di thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang du byas nas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:110b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thabs la mkhas pas mtshan ma med par byas nas sbyin pa la sogs pa sbyin par byed pa ni spyod par rjes su gnang ba yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:110b-26: shes rab kyi mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:110b-27: yang ci'i phyir 'dir sbyin pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i 'du shes rnams bkag ce na /
T03TD3788E:110b-28: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos rnams gang cung zad kyang chos kyi ngo bor med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111a-0: @111a * // mtshan ma'i 'du shes kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111a-1: mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam par goms par byas pas des sla bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111a-2: mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes las bzlog pa ni 'khrul pa zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:111a-3: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' bzlog pa mthong bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:111a-4: mtshan ma'i 'du shes ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3788E:111a-5: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:111a-6: de las gzhan pa skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:111a-7: de bzhin nyid kyi 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:111a-9: gang la de dag gi med pa ni 'du shes med pa zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:111a-10: des ni yang mngon bar byang chub par sla ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:111a-11: gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:111a-14: de las bzlog pa'i chos gzhan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111a-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings las gzhan pa'i ldog pa byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas ni yang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sla ba ni 'thad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111a-21: de lta mod kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:111a-22: byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu yang 'dod par bya ba ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:111a-23: de lta bu'i nyes par 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:111a-25: khyed byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu yang 'dod dam zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:111a-26: bden pa la gnas pas des chos rnams mi dmigs na de ltar ga la 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:111a-27: byang chub sems dpa' gcig dang du mar khas mi len pa'i 'thad pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:111a-28: bden pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:111a-29: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du btags pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:111b-0: @111b thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:111b-1: da ni rtags brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:111b-2: gang gi rtags su shes she na /
T03TD3788E:111b-3: de la rtags ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03TD3788E:111b-4: gnas ma yin pa la skrag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111b-5: kun du zhum pa ni rgyun du skrag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111b-6: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni kun du skrag pa mthar thug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:111b-7: de dag gi snod ma yin pa thob pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:111b-8: gang zhig de las bzlog pa gang yin pa ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin te /
T03TD3788E:111b-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu brtags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
T03TD3788E:111b-10: byang chub sems dpa' la khyad par med do zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:111b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum du brtags pa mi dmigs pa sems ma zhum pa dang /
T03TD3788E:111b-12: mi skrag pa la sogs pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:111b-13: 'di ltar thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang /
T03TD3788E:111b-15: chen po rnams las de la chung du ni gang mtshan ma med par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:111b-16: sbyin pa la sogs pa gtong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:111b-17: thabs la mkhas pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:111b-18: 'bring ni gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam par goms par byas pa la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:111b-19: chen po ni gang gzugs la sogs pa de rnams las de bzhin nyid de gzhan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:111b-20: de las gzhan pa'i ldog pa'i chos mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:111b-21: de dag thams cad kyang thos pa dang /
T03TD3788E:111b-22: bsams pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin par rig par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:111b-23: dang por bstan pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:111b-24: sbyor ba la thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:111b-27: // / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa bstan nas da ni sbyor ba'i lam nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun par brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:111b-28: dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang //
T03TD3788E:111b-29: rgyu dang yongs su bzung ba yis //
T03TD3788E:111b-30: zhes sngar bstan pa ma yin nam /
T03TD3788E:112a-0: sbyor ba la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun @112a * //
T03TD3788E:112a-1: pa yang ci'i phyir bshad ce na /
T03TD3788E:112a-2: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni sems can thams cad kyi rten can sbyor ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:112a-3: dro ba rnams kyis dmigs pa 'dir //
T03TD3788E:112a-4: sems can thams cad yin par bsngags //
T03TD3788E:112a-5: de dag nyid la sems mnyam sogs //
T03TD3788E:112a-6: rnam pa dgu ru rig par bya //
T03TD3788E:112a-7: zhes bstan pa las 'dir sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par sbyor ba'i lam nges par 'byed pa dro bar gyur ba ji ltar brjod ce na /
T03TD3788E:112a-9: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed nas des dmigs nas gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:112a-10: de bzhin du byams pa'i sems bskyed nas des dmigs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:112a-11: nga rgyal med pa'i sems bskyed nas 'tshe ba med pa des dmigs par byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:112a-12: khong khro med pa'i sems bskyed nas des dmigs par byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:112a-19: snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi bar du sems bskyed nas des dmigs par byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:112a-20: yang rnam pa thams cad du mi zad pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pas ni gnyis su mi 'byed par shes par bya ba'i ched yin no //
T03TD3788E:112a-21: pha dang ma la sogs pa gnyis gnyis gcig tu byas nas rnam pa dgur 'gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:112a-22: 'dir re zhig sbyor ba'i lam la dro bar gyur ba de lta bu yin na /
T03TD3788E:112a-23: rtse mor gyur pa ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:112a-24: bdag nyid sdig pa las ldog cing //
T03TD3788E:112a-25: sbyin la sogs pa gnas pa gzhan //
T03TD3788E:112a-26: de dag la ni 'god pa dang //
T03TD3788E:112a-27: bsngags pa brjod dang rjes mthun nyid //
T03TD3788E:112a-28: rtse mor gyur ces bya ba la /
T03TD3788E:112a-29: bdag nyid sdig pa las ldog cing sbyin ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa ni gang bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed /
T03TD3788E:112a-30: gzhan dag kyang de la sbyor bar byed ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:112a-31: bdag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang /
T03TD3788E:112b-0: lugs dang mthun pa las bzlog pa la mnyam par 'jog par @112b byed cing de la gzhan dag yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:112b-1: de'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:112b-2: de snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan dag la yang mthun pas dga' bar byed cing /
T03TD3788E:112b-3: 'dir yang sems can thams cad la dmigs nas sdig pa las ldog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:112b-4: dge ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing /
T03TD3788E:112b-5: bsngags pa brjod pa la sogs pas mthun par dga' bar byed pa ni 'dir sbyor ba'i lam rtse mor gyur pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:112b-6: bzod par gyur pa ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:112b-8: bdag gzhan rten can bden zhes pa //
T03TD3788E:112b-10: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngar gzhan gyi rten can gyi dbye ba ltar /
T03TD3788E:112b-11: dmigs pa'i dbye bas phye ba ni gang bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya /
T03TD3788E:112b-14: lam bsgom par bya zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:112b-15: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par gnon cing /
T03TD3788E:112b-16: de la gzhan dag sbyor zhing bsngags pa brjod pa la sogs pas de gnon pa la mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:112b-17: dmigs pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag brjod pa snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:112b-18: 'dir sbyor ba'i lam nges par 'byed pa'i bzod par gyur pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:112b-19: 'jig rten pa'i chos ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:112b-20: chos mchog de bzhin sems can rnams //
T03TD3788E:112b-22: ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin du bzod pa bstan no //
T03TD3788E:112b-23: bdag gzhan rten can nyid kyang 'dir rjes su sbyar ro //
T03TD3788E:112b-24: dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i bre brag rnams ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:112b-25: sems can rnams smin byed sogs kyis /
T03TD3788E:112b-26: zhes bya ba la gang bdag nyid kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:112b-27: de de ltar slob cing 'dod pa de nyid kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:112b-28: dam pa'i chos gnas pa nyid sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:112b-30: 'di ltar de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snga ma bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113a-1: gzugs yongs su gzung ba med pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-2: zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-3: sbyor ba'i lam 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog de yang de'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa chung ngu dang /
T03TD3788E:113a-5: chen po'i rigs kyi dbye bas re re zhing rnam pa gsum gsum du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:113a-6: de la dro bar gyur pa chung ngu ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113a-7: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed nas des dmigs pas gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-9: gzhan la mi 'tshe ba nyid nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-11: phan pa'i sems bskyed nas des dmigs pa nyid du bya'o //
T03TD3788E:113a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-13: phyi ma gzhan la phan bar dgongs pa nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-14: chen po ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113a-18: sring mo la sogs pa'i sems bskyed nas des dmigs pa nyid du bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-19: 'phral dang yun ring por yid du 'ong bas bsdus pa la 'jug par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dang /
T03TD3788E:113a-20: phyi ma gnyi ga yin no zhes nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-21: rtse mo rgyud pa chung ngu ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113a-22: bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-23: gzhan sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la 'jug pa las bzlog par bzhes pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113a-24: rtse mor gyur pa 'bring ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113a-25: bdag nyid kyis kyang sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-26: gzhan bde ba'i rgyu la yang dag par sbyor bar bzhed pa nye bar bzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113a-27: rtse mor gyur pa chen po ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113a-28: bdag nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113a-29: gzhan dag sdug bsngal la bde bar phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa spangs par bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113a-30: bzod pa chung ngu ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113b-0: bdag nyid kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa @113b gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-1: gzhan dag 'phags pa'i lam la nges par sbyor bar bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113b-2: bzod pa 'bring ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113b-3: bdag nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:113b-4: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-5: gzhan dag 'bras bu la yang dag par sbyor bar bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113b-6: bzod pa chen po ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113b-7: bdag nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa nyid la 'jug par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-8: gzhan dag sangs rgyas nyid la yang dag par sbyor bar bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113b-9: bzod pa de yang skad cig ma gcig yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:113b-10: chos kyi mchog chung du ni bdag gis kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-11: khyad par med pa'i theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113b-12: chos kyi mchog 'bring ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113b-13: bdag nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-14: sems can rnams khyad par gyi lam la byang chub sems dpa'i mngon bar shes pa la yang dag par sbyor bar bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-15: chos kyi mchog chen po ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:113b-16: bdag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-17: gzhan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mthar thug pa la 'jog pa bzhed pa nye bar gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:113b-18: gang 'di ltar bzod pa'i chen po skad cig ma gcig yin par bstan pa de bzhin du chos kyi mchog kyang yin no //
T03TD3788E:113b-19: zhes bya ba de ni rang gi don gyi dbang du byas pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:113b-20: 'dir ni gzhan gyi rten can chung ngu dang /
T03TD3788E:113b-22: chen po'i bye brag bshad pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:113b-23: gzhan gyi don la gong nas gong du 'gro ba'i gnas skabs yod pa'i phyir de dang 'di la 'gal ba med do //
T03TD3788E:113b-24: sbyor ba'i lam nges par byed pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:114a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yin zhes zer na /
T03TD3788E:114a-3: da dag ni nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:114a-5: 'bras bu'i lam gyi dbye bas skyes bu zung bzhi yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:114a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yin par bstan pa'i phyir rnam pa kun mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:114a-7: phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas so so'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir dring tha dad pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:114a-9: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:114a-10: phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du 'tshal bar bgyi zhes bya bas ni bdag dang /
T03TD3788E:114a-11: gzhan rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni yongs su zhus pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:114a-12: rab 'byor gang yang so so'i skye bo'i sa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:114a-14: ma byas pa la blta bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:114a-15: gzhan rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du mdzad nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:114a-16: nges par 'byed pa'i chas bsdus pa sbyor ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs dang /
T03TD3788E:114a-17: bzod pa dang shes rab bsdus pa mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs dang ;
T03TD3788E:114a-18: rgyun dang ldan pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi gnas skabs so //
T03TD3788E:114a-20: nges 'byed yan lag nas bzung ste //
T03TD3788E:114a-21: mthong dang goms pa'i sa dag la //
T03TD3788E:114a-22: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas //
T03TD3788E:114a-23: de 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03TD3788E:114a-24: shes bstan pa ni dge 'dun yin //
T03TD3788E:114a-26: gzugs la sogs pa las ldog pa'i rtags rnam pa nyi shu ni nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag la gnas pa 'di'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T03TD3788E:114a-27: gang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ji lta bu lags zhes bya ba ni rtogs pas bsdus pa ni rtags zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:114b-0: rang gi rten @114b mtshon pa ni mtshan ma zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:114b-1: des yongs su longs spyod pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03TD3788E:114b-2: de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:114b-3: de ni gzhan dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:114b-4: rtags nyi shu gang dag yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:114b-5: gzugs la sogs pa las ldog pas te /
T03TD3788E:114b-6: gang rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam pa med pa /
T03TD3788E:114b-8: mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:114b-10: tshor ba po'i 'brel pa bkag pas gzugs la sogs pa nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:114b-12: gzugs la sogs pa rnams rang gi ngo bo gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:114b-13: gzhan yang yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis lha gzhan dag la phyag mi 'tshal zhing /
T03TD3788E:114b-14: me tog la sogs pas mchod par mi sems pa dang /
T03TD3788E:114b-15: gzhan yang mi khom pa brgyad dang /
T03TD3788E:114b-16: bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:114b-17: yang bdag nyid kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:114b-18: de nyid gzhan dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:114b-19: de'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin //
T03TD3788E:114b-20: mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin //
T03TD3788E:114b-21: sems can thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston cing bsgom pa la mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gtong zhing /
T03TD3788E:114b-22: de sems can thams cad kyis mngon par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /
T03TD3788E:114b-23: chos thams cad mi mthong bas chos zab ma la nam nur dang /
T03TD3788E:114b-26: de las lam gzhan 'dod cing mthar thug pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir nem nur ro //
T03TD3788E:114b-27: lam dang 'dra ba las bzlog pa ni yid gnyis so //
T03TD3788E:114b-28: rigs kyi chos dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'phel ba med par 'gro bas na /
T03TD3788E:114b-29: the tshom za ba'i phyir the tshom mo //
T03TD3788E:114b-32: yid kyi las dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:114b-34: lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-0: bag la nyal thams cad dus thams cad du med pa ni ma rig @115a * //
T03TD3788E:115a-2: lta bas bsdus pa'i bag la nyal ba yin gyi /
T03TD3788E:115a-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni bsams bzhin du srid pa len pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-4: srid pa'i zag pas bsdus pa ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:115a-6: 'ong ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam la sogs pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-7: gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa dang ldan zhing nad nyung ba nyid yin la /
T03TD3788E:115a-8: chos gos dang longs spyod smad du med pa nyid kyis drod du gtogs pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
T03TD3788E:115a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa nyid yin pas lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems kyi gya gyu dang bral bas nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa las 'das nas /
T03TD3788E:115a-11: gong nas gong du lus dang sems yongs su dag pa 'dzin cing rgyu nyid du gyur pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-13: bkur sti la sogs pa lhur len pa ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-14: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs te spyod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna la sogs pa'i sems mi bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-16: blo brten zhing zab pas gzhan las chos nyan pa na chos nyid sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
T03TD3788E:115a-17: yang bdud sdig can gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad sprul te /
T03TD3788E:115a-18: ngan song du lhung zhing sdug bsngal mi bzad pas rgyun du sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba'i dbang du byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:115a-19: zhes bstan cing 'byed pa na sems mi 'khrugs par 'gro ba yongs su skyob cing /
T03TD3788E:115a-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis rtse mor gtogs pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
T03TD3788E:115a-21: yang byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bdud sdig can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs te 'di skad du zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:115a-22: lam gzhan bstan du zin kyang dge slong dgra bcom pa'i dpes gzhan la yid ches par mi 'gro ba nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:115b-0: 'di ltar @115b des gang la yid ches pas 'gro ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:115b-1: gzhan yang bdud sdig can 'jig rten pa'i rnam pas rus gong gi 'du shes la sogs pa lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa na /
T03TD3788E:115b-2: 'di ni bdud sdig can yin no zhes khong du chud pas sems can thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems mi bskyed pa'i phyir bzod par gtogs pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
T03TD3788E:115b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par gsungs pa'i spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pas gnas shing /
T03TD3788E:115b-4: spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las yongs su mi nyams pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:115b-5: chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs so //
T03TD3788E:115b-6: mdo 'di'i don tshig lhug pas rgya cher bstan pa'i don rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:115b-7: nye bar 'brel pa sdud pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pa ni drug yin te /
T03TD3788E:115b-8: gzugs la sogs pa ldog sogs rtags //
T03TD3788E:115b-9: rnam pa nyi shu bskyed pa yis //
T03TD3788E:115b-10: nges 'byed yan lag la gnas pa'i //
T03TD3788E:115b-11: phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di //
T03TD3788E:115b-12: gzugs la sogs pas ldog pa dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-13: the tshom mi khom zad pa dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-14: bdag nyid dge ba la gnas shing //
T03TD3788E:115b-15: gzhan dag de la dgod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-16: gzhan gyi rten can sbyin sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-17: zab mo'i don la som nyi med //
T03TD3788E:115b-18: byams lus sogs dang sgrib pa ni //
T03TD3788E:115b-19: rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs dang ;
T03TD3788E:115b-20: / bag la nyal kun 'joms pa dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-21: dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-22: gos la sogs pa gtsang ba dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-23: lus la srin bu rnams mi 'byung //
T03TD3788E:115b-24: gya gyu med sems sbyangs pa ni //
T03TD3788E:115b-25: len dang ser sna med sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-26: chos nyid ldan pa 'gro nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-27: sems can don du dmyal 'tshol dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-28: gzhan gyis bkri bar mi btub dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-29: lam gzhan nye bar ston bdud la //
T03TD3788E:115b-30: bdud ces bya bar rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:115b-31: sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod pa ste //
T03TD3788E:115b-32: rtags ni nyi shu de dag gis //
T03TD3788E:115b-33: drod dang rtse mo bzod dang bcas //
T03TD3788E:116a-2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:116a-4: // / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir ;
T03TD3788E:116a-5: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:116a-6: shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug gis //
T03TD3788E:116a-7: byang chub sems dpa' mi ldog pa'i //
T03TD3788E:116a-8: mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:116a-12: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:116a-13: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'du shes las phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phyir mi ldog pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:116a-15: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
T03TD3788E:116a-16: des chos de yang dmigs la des na mngon bar 'du mi byed do //
T03TD3788E:116a-17: des na skye bo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:116a-19: mngon par 'du byed pa las ldog pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:116a-20: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni gang yang bdud sdig can nye bar 'ongs te mos pa zlog par byed cing /
T03TD3788E:116a-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T03TD3788E:116a-22: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:116a-25: rtogs par bya ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa ldog pa na /
T03TD3788E:116a-26: de khong du chud cing sems brtan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-0: mi 'phrogs pa nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i sbyor bas ched du bya ba @116b las mi nyams pa'i don gyis so //
T03TD3788E:116b-2: de la sems brtan pa ni rgyun du gces par byed pas so //
T03TD3788E:116b-3: mi g-yo ba ni mngon sum du byed pas so //
T03TD3788E:116b-4: mi 'phrogs pa ni gzhan rnams kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3788E:116b-5: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang nyan thos dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyis dag dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-7: rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i bar la ldog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-8: 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ldog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-9: phyir mi ldog pa gnyis ka la mi brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bstan pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:116b-10: bden pa la zhugs pa las ldog pa yod pa gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-11: bden pa la ma zhugs pa las 'jug pa yod pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
T03TD3788E:116b-15: 'jug pa tsam ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:116b-16: skad cig ma gsum la ni rjes su shes pa dang 'brel bas nyan thos la sogs pa'i sar lhung bar 'gyur ba mi srid de /
T03TD3788E:116b-17: de ni khams gsum pa'i gnyen po thob pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:116b-18: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa ni gang yan lag zad par byed pa spang ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang du mdzad nas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-19: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-20: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug la /
