T03TD3788E:116b-21: de'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed pas yan lag zad par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir yan lag zad par byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3788E:116b-22: bsam gtan nam snyoms par 'jug pa gang la yan lag gang yod pa de spong ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don no //
T03TD3788E:116b-23: dper na bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yan lag zad par byed pa zhes smos pa'i rjes su shes pas ni gzugs dang /
T03TD3788E:116b-24: gzugs med pa'i gnyen po nyid yin par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-0: rjes su mthun pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i gnas skabs su @117a * //
T03TD3788E:117a-1: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba 'dor bar byed pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-2: kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po byang chub yid la byed pa dang ldan te /
T03TD3788E:117a-3: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal ba nyid kyis lus dang sems yang ba nyid kyis gzugs lhur len pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas blta ba dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lhur len pa nyid kyi bar du rgya cher bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-6: de ni 'di ltar de'i chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-7: de ltar yid la byed pa na /
T03TD3788E:117a-8: 'o na spyod lam thams cad du 'khrul ba med pa'i sems kyis byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-9: kun 'byung la chos shes pa ni gang yang khyim na gnas pa thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga len pa dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-10: zas la sogs pa'i yo byad mang zhing sna tshogs pas sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag nyid gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-11: gzhan dag yang dag par dgod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-12: de'i bsngags pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-13: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-14: gzhan mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa mi byed ces bya ba ni rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa nyid kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:117a-15: 'khrug pa'i 'dod chags spang ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:117a-16: gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'di zhi gnas kyis rgyud mnyen pa nyid du ston pa dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-18: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ba sbyin pa gtong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:117a-19: lag na rdo rje'i rigs lnga rjes su 'brang bas de la bdud la sogs pas mi brdzi ba nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117b-0: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa ni gang sems mi g-yeng ba thob pas dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po @117b ma tshang ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-1: byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa la dbang thob pa nyid kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:117b-2: skyes bu dam par gyur pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-3: bud med dbang du 'gyur ba'i sngags dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-8: skyes pa la sogs pa ze slong ba'i sbyor ba mi byed pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117b-10: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad la mtshan mar mi mthong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-11: 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas gnas pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117b-12: de la yan lag tshogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni sman no //
T03TD3788E:117b-13: yan lag gcig pa ni rtsi'o //
T03TD3788E:117b-14: yang na nad skyes pa gso bar byed pa ni sman no //
T03TD3788E:117b-15: phyis mi skye bar byed pa 'gegs pa ni rtsi'o //
T03TD3788E:117b-16: yang na lus la bgos pa'i gnas skabs thob par byed pa ni sman no //
T03TD3788E:117b-17: mi rgas pa'i khyad par thob par byed pa ni rtsi zhes bya ste rnam grangs gzhan no //
T03TD3788E:117b-18: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na byang chub yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:117b-21: skye mched rnams la sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-22: rjes su sbyor ba bkag pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i phyin ci log yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:117b-24: rjes su sbyor ba smos pa ni sdug bsngal dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-25: kun 'byung gi bden pa gnyis dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-27: lam gyi bden pa gnyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-28: rjes su sbyor ba snga ma dang /
T03TD3788E:117b-29: phyi mar shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:117b-31: de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang bzang po'am /
T03TD3788E:117b-32: ngan par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:117b-33: phyin ci ma ldog pa'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-0: 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni gang rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dge ba'i phyogs 'phrog pa'i bar chad kyi chos kyi @118a * //
T03TD3788E:118a-2: rjes su sbyor bar gnas pa bkag pas de dag shin tu mi snang bar gyur pa'i don bstan pa nyid de /
T03TD3788E:118a-4: 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chos gang yang 'phrog pa'am /
T03TD3788E:118a-5: sbyin par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas so //
T03TD3788E:118a-6: gtam smos pa ni dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa ni sdug bsngal dang /
T03TD3788E:118a-7: kun 'byung shes pa'i dus su 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:118a-8: 'gog pa shes pa ni gtam gyi sbyor ba tsam gyis rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-9: de lta bu'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:118a-11: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste /
T03TD3788E:118a-12: 'du shes tsam du rab tu gnas //
T03TD3788E:118a-13: brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa //
T03TD3788E:118a-14: brjod par bya ba yod ma yin //
T03TD3788E:118a-16: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni byang chub kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i gtam mang po rnam pa sna tshogs pa chos kyi gtam gyi sbyor ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-17: 'gog ba shes pa ni gnas skabs su yang dag par bsgrub pa mang po dang nye bar ldan pa'i don ston pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-19: de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang nyung ngu'am /
T03TD3788E:118a-20: mang por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-21: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni gang gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gsod pa po dang /
T03TD3788E:118a-22: gsad par bya ba'i g-yul gyi gtam ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-24: lam gyi de bzhin nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang chags pa'am /
T03TD3788E:118a-25: khong khro ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118a-26: gang de lta bu'i gnas su rang nyid kyis rnam par smin pa'i 'gog pa rnam pa bzhi las gang gis 'dir dbang po'i grong 'gog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:118b-0: de nas gzhan yang rnam par smin pa ma lus pa'i dbang po'i grong gi @118b gtam ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-2: 'di ltar de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang tshogs sam /
T03TD3788E:118b-3: tshogs ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-4: dbang po'i rten 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa'i grong khyer 'gog pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:118b-5: de nas dbang po'i rten du gyur pa 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:118b-6: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grong khyer gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-8: nam mkha' stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang la yang gzung ba'am /
T03TD3788E:118b-9: mi gzung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-10: dbang po'i yul gyi grong rdal la 'gog pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:118b-11: de nas gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi grong rdal gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-13: de yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas chos gang yang 'phel ba'am /
T03TD3788E:118b-14: 'grib par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-15: bdag tu mngon bar zhen pa 'gog pa ni gang de nas rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings bsgoms bas de'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis gnas yongs su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir gtam gyi spyor ba la mi gnas pa snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-17: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:118b-18: rjes su sbyor ba la gnas par gsungs pa ni 'thad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:118b-19: rnam par smin pa'i 'gog pa rnam pa bzhi po 'di yang khams gsum po re re na yang yod par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:118b-21: re zhig dbang po la 'gog ba ni bsam gtan dang /
T03TD3788E:118b-22: gzugs med pa gang na dbang po gang zhig yod pa ste /
T03TD3788E:118b-23: ji ltar yid bde ba dang /
T03TD3788E:118b-25: btang snyoms kyi yid bde ba dang /
T03TD3788E:118b-26: btang snyoms la ni btang snyoms dang //
T03TD3788E:118b-27: tshor ba'i bye brag bsam gtan skyes //
T03TD3788E:118b-29: gzugs med na ni btang snyoms dang //
T03TD3788E:118b-30: srog dang yid kyi dbang po yod //
T03TD3788E:119a-2: ji ltar de dbang po'i rten 'gog pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:119a-3: rigs mthun pa dang srog la 'dir //
T03TD3788E:119a-4: sems kyi rgyud ni rtogs pa yin //
T03TD3788E:119a-6: dbang po'i yul gyi grong rdal ni de na yod pa yid kyi yul chos rnams kyang 'gog pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:119a-7: / bdag tu mngon par zhen pa ni thams cad na yod pa'i phyir de thams cad du'ang 'gog pa kho na yin no //
T03TD3788E:119a-8: lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
T03TD3788E:119a-9: ser sna la sogs pa'i rjes su sbyor ba la brtson pa bkag pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-10: bzod pa bar chad med pa'i lam yin pa nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i rgyu nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-11: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas shing chos 'dod pa 'di nyid kyis dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-12: chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing chos tha mi dad pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub pa dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-13: 'bras bu'i chos dag 'dus byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-14: 'dus ma byas pa nyid kyis go rims bzhin du dor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-15: blang bar shes pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-16: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya bar 'dod pas mnyes par byed pa nyid kyis shin tu khyad par can gyi gnas skabs thob pa'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-17: nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pas 'gro ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bskul ba dang /
T03TD3788E:119a-19: rab tu 'jog pas khyad par rtogs pas thob pa'i tshogs 'dod pas sangs rgyas mngon du gyur par skye zhing /
T03TD3788E:119a-20: skye ba la dbang ba shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:119a-21: lam la chos shes pa ni gang rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa'i dpes chos cung zad dngos su ma dmigs pas /
T03TD3788E:119a-22: nang stong pa nyid nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi rang gis la dogs pa med pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam nyid du shes pa'i bral ba thob pa'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-0: phyir @119b mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:119b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:119b-2: sems can rnams yongs su smin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:119b-3: bdud kyi las shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:119b-6: bral ba thob par byed pa shes par byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-7: mtshams med pa byed pa'i skyes bu'i dpes yang dag pa la gnas shing /
T03TD3788E:119b-8: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i sems ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzlog par mi nus so //
T03TD3788E:119b-10: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te /
T03TD3788E:119b-11: yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs pa nyid kyi lam la chos shes pa ni khams gsum gyi gnyen po yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119b-12: mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas rnams la blta ba la sogs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
T03TD3788E:119b-14: khyad par can gyi yon tan rnams mngon par sgrub pa la shin tu sbyangs pa shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119b-16: bdud kyi las rnams la thabs la mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-17: rang gi sa la nim nur med pa nyid kyis sbyor pa 'dren ma ma yin pa rnam par dag pa shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:119b-19: de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la nem nur med pa'i phyir gcig gam /
T03TD3788E:119b-20: gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-21: tshe 'phos su zin kyang nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems mi skyed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-22: sbyor ba theg pa gzhan du nges par 'byung ba med pas gcig tu nges pa nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:119b-24: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:119b-26: 'gag pa lam chen po'i chen por rtog pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:119b-27: dang po nyid lam chen po skye ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:119b-28: lam chen po skyes pa na nyon mongs pa chen po yod pa mi srid pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:119b-29: dang por gos kyi dri ma chen po bsal nas phyis chung ba dag par byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:120a-0: mun pa chen po ni snang ba chung @120a * //
T03TD3788E:120a-2: chung ngu ni chen pos sel ba'i dpes chung ngus chen po sel ba'i dpe de rigs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120a-3: dkar po'i chos ni stobs dang ldan pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:120a-4: nag po ni nyam chung ba yin pas 'phags pa'i lam gyi skad cig ma gcig la chung ngus kyang 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i nyon mongs pa chen po brtan pa rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:120a-5: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis kyang dus mang por bsags pa'i nad rnams dur byid kyi khu ba btang bas nad rnams sel ba dang mtshungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:120a-6: skad cig ma gcig la sgron me chung ngun [?] gyis mun pa chen po 'joms pa dang 'dra'o zhes bshad do //
T03TD3788E:120a-7: de la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dkon mchog gsum la zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120a-8: de'i gnyen po lam gyi rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la sogs pa la brtson par byed na /
T03TD3788E:120a-9: de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:120a-11: gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ni 'di yin no zhes 'bad pas bstan pa 'di yin no //
T03TD3788E:120a-12: rnam par rtog pa chen po'i 'bring ni gang de nyid bskal pa de srid du /
T03TD3788E:120a-13: rgyun du zhugs pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la zang zing gi yon phul bas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120a-14: de nyid ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba ste /
T03TD3788E:120a-15: de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar ro //
T03TD3788E:120a-16: 'di'i gnyen po'i lam chung ngu'i 'bring ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed na bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:120a-18: nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa las 'das nas /
T03TD3788E:120b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i @120b 'thad pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-1: rnam par rtog pa chen po'i chung ngu ni gang yang de nyid bskal pa de snyed du gnas shing sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:120b-6: shes rab bsgoms pas so zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-7: 'di'i gnyen po'i lam chung ngu'i chen po ni gang cig shos nyin zhag gcig la sbyin pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:120b-9: 'di la gnas na chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-10: cig shos zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa dang ldan pa ste /
T03TD3788E:120b-11: de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar ro //
T03TD3788E:120b-12: rnam par rtog pa 'bring gi chen po ni gang yang de nyid bskal pa de snyed du sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pas zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-13: de'i gnyen po'i lam 'bring gi chung ngu ni gang cig shos kyis nyin zhag gcig chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:120b-15: gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar yongs su bsngo ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar gnas pa nyid 'thad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-16: rnam par rtog pa 'bring gi 'bring ni gang yang de nyid bskal pa de snyed du bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:120b-17: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byas pa bas zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-18: 'di'i gnyen po lam 'bring gi 'bring ni cig shos kyis de rnams la nyin zhag gcig mngon bar brtson par byas na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:120b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gnas pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir ldog pa'i gnas skabs med cing /
T03TD3788E:120b-21: gnas ma yin pa nyid du'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:120b-22: mtha' gcig tu nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni 'thad ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-0: rnam par rtog pa 'bring gi chung ngu ni gang yang @121a * //
T03TD3788E:121a-1: de'i bskal pa de snyed zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:121a-2: nang du yang dag 'jog pa dang ldan pa yid la byed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bas zhes smos pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-3: 'di'i gnyen po lam 'bring gi chen po ni gang cig shos kyis nyi ma gcig zang zing gi sbyin pa de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:121a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni mtshan nyid do zhes bya bas 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-6: rnam par rtog pa chung ngu'i chen po ni gang yang de nyid bskal pa de snyed du 'das pa dang /
T03TD3788E:121a-8: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bas zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-9: 'di'i gnyen po'i lam chen po'i chung du ni gang cig shos kyis nyi ma gcig rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsdos na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3788E:121a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i bsngo ba ni mchog nyid yin no zhes 'thad pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-12: rnam par rtog pa chung ngu'i 'bring ni gang mngon bar 'du byas pa ni yongs su btags pa nyid kyis bsod nams mang du skye ba na /
T03TD3788E:121a-13: mngon bar 'du byas pas yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am /
T03TD3788E:121a-14: skyon med par 'jug pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mi nus pas mi 'dod pa bskyed pa nyid do zhes bstan ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-15: de'i gnyen po'i lam chen po'i 'bring ni gang rab 'byor mngon du byas pa de yang stong pa nyid du snang ngo //
T03TD3788E:121a-18: snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121a-19: bsgom pa'i lam rnam pa dgu pa'i gnas skabs su snga ma la ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:121a-20: lan rjod par byed pa ste /
T03TD3788E:121a-21: de la nang stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-0: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ni @121b mngon bar 'du bya ba stong pa nyid du snang bar bshad do //
T03TD3788E:121b-1: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-2: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-3: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ni mngon bar 'dus byas pa gsog nyid du snang bar bshad do //
T03TD3788E:121b-5: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid dang ;
T03TD3788E:121b-6: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ni de dag gsob nyid du snang bar bshad do //
T03TD3788E:121b-7: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-8: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-9: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-10: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-11: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa nyid du snang bar bshad do //
T03TD3788E:121b-12: de nyid kyi phyir smras pa /
T03TD3788E:121b-14: 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121b-15: yang mngon bar 'du byas pa ni go cha dang /
T03TD3788E:121b-18: nges par 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas stong pa nyid du snang ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhir brjod pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121b-19: de yang de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags par rig par bgyi ste /
T03TD3788E:121b-20: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid lags pa'i slad du'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121b-21: rnam par rtog pa chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa rjes su mi mthong bas nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa la go bzlog par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:121b-22: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni gang bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam pa'i nges par mngon bar byang chub pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sbyor ba shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:121b-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:121b-25: de ltar gnas pa ni rang gi sa la gnas pa ni thams cad shes pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:122a-0: @122a * // gzhan gyi lam la rag ma lus pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:122a-1: gzhan gyis gzhol bar mi nus pa ni rang gis zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:122a-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:122a-3: yang bral ba thob pa de ni bdud kyi las yin par rtogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:122a-5: de ltar gnas pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa nyid kyis na 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa thob par gyis shig / khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
T03TD3788E:122a-6: gang gis khyod lung bstan par 'gyur ba mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khyod kyis ma thob bo //
T03TD3788E:122a-7: gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bdud kyis 'dun pa bzlog pa'i tshig thos nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems ma zhum /
T03TD3788E:122a-8: mi 'gong ba la sogs pa dang ldan na lung bstan par nges pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:122a-9: 'di la gnas pa ni rtogs pa'i chos kyi skad cig ma gcig lus yin pa'i phyir ltung ba'am khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:122a-11: de lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i chos yod pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:122a-12: de ltar byas na skyon med par zhugs pa ni lung bstan pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:122a-13: lam la rjes su shes pa ni gang bdud kyis khyod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya /
T03TD3788E:122a-14: gang la spyod pa 'di dag ni bdud kyis bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:122a-15: zhes zer zhing rnam par 'byed par byed na /
T03TD3788E:122a-16: kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang bral bar byed pa ni bdud sdig can yin no snyam du rig par byed pa ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:122a-17: mngon par byang chub pa dang mi 'bral ba thob par bya ba rnyed par shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:122a-18: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bdag kyang srog yongs su gtong bas zhes ga nyi ga smos pas ni bdag nyid du rtogs pa'i phyogs gcig dang /
T03TD3788E:122a-19: ma lus pa'i bdag yongs su gtong ba shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-1: bdag nyid kyang chos 'di nyid yin no zhes don gyi dbang gis mthong nas /
T03TD3788E:122b-2: srog dang bral yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-3: skal ba mnyam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-4: yang gzhung 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa chud mi zos pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:122b-5: des yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par bsgrub pa shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-6: yang gzungs thob pa'i rgyu nyid kyis nyen pa po'i lha la sogs pa'i skad dang brda la sogs pa la nges par rnyed pa nyid kyis de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid 'gog pa thob pas sems can smin par bya ba'i thabs kyis byed pa shes par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:122b-7: yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa'i bzod pa thob pa de ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:122b-8: gang 'di ltar mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang 'bral bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:122b-9: yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa'i shes pa thob pa ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:122b-10: dus gsum rnams tshad med pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-11: gang 'di ltar mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa yang mi skye bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:122b-12: yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni des phyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon bar 'grub pa ni de'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:122b-13: gang 'di ltar tshad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:122b-15: rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03TD3788E:122b-16: 'di ltar de nyid kyi phyir 'dis ni mtha' las 'das pa mthar thug pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-17: rtogs par mi nus pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:122b-19: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:122b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de mngon sum du mdzad pa nyid kyis rjes su bzlas nas gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:122b-21: de la mtha' yas pa ni rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:122b-22: mthar thug pa med pa ni thams cad du yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:123a-1: du so so yang dag par rig pa mngon bar bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar gtugs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:123a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog pa 'di'i rnam pa la sogs par bstan par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod mod kyi /
T03TD3788E:123a-3: shin tu thal ches pa'i lan du 'gyur bas bsgom pa'i lam gyi dbang du mdzad par bzhed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:123a-4: mdo 'di ni don rgyas par bstan pa 'di'i tshig le'ur byas pa lngas bsdus par gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:123a-5: gzugs sogs 'du shes ldog pa dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-6: sems brtan theg pa dman dag las //
T03TD3788E:123a-7: rnam log bsam gtan la sogs pa'i //
T03TD3788E:123a-8: yan lag yongs su zad pa dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-9: lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni //
T03TD3788E:123a-10: 'dod la spyod la thabs mkhas dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-11: rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-12: 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-13: phun tshogs bar chad med rnams dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-14: tshogs dang dbang tshogs bcas pa yi //
T03TD3788E:123a-15: g-yul 'gyed ser sna la sogs la //
T03TD3788E:123a-16: sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba yi //
T03TD3788E:123a-17: gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-18: chos ni rdul tsam mi dmigs nyid //
T03TD3788E:123a-19: rang gi sa la nges ba nyid //
T03TD3788E:123a-20: sa gsum la ni gnas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-21: chos kyi don du srog gtong dang //
T03TD3788E:123a-22: de 'dra'i skad cig bcu drug ni //
T03TD3788E:123a-23: blo ldan mthong ba'i lam gnas kyi //
T03TD3788E:123a-24: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dag yin //
T03TD3788E:123a-25: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:123a-27: // / mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs kyi byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:123a-28: bsgom pa'i lam ni zab pa ste //
T03TD3788E:123a-30: gang bcom ldan 'das gnas zab mo legs par bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du goms par bya ba ni bsgom pa shes par bya ba'i phyir zlos pa'i sbyor bas gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:123a-31: gang la gnas pa la byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya zhe na /
T03TD3788E:123b-0: rgyun nyid yin @123b pa'i bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:123b-1: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam de sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:123b-2: yang ji ltar bsgom pa'i lam zab pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:123b-3: zab mo stong pa nyid la sogs //
T03TD3788E:123b-4: zhes bya ba ni gang de ni stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:123b-7: mngon bar 'du bya ba med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:123b-14: yang dag pa'i mtha' rnams ni zab mo'i gnas nyid yin par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:123b-15: yang ci'i phyir stong pa nyid la sogs pa la zab mo zhes bya zhe na /
T03TD3788E:123b-16: zab mo de ni sgro 'dogs dang //
T03TD3788E:123b-17: skur ba'i lam las grol ba nyid //
T03TD3788E:123b-19: gang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa yang gzugs ma yin /
T03TD3788E:123b-20: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ni zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:123b-21: chos thams cad zab pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:123b-22: ji ltar sgro btags pa spang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:123b-23: gang gzugs las kyang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:123b-24: de bzhin nyid la yang gzugs med do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:123b-25: ji ltar skur pa 'debs pa spang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:123b-26: gang mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to //
T03TD3788E:123b-27: gzugs las gzhan na yang de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:123b-28: chos thams cad bsal nas mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:123b-29: yang bsgom pa'i lam ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:123b-30: yang dang yang du sems pa dang //
T03TD3788E:123b-31: 'jal dang nges rtog bsgom pa'i lam //
T03TD3788E:123b-33: gang gi tshe gnas zab mo 'di dag dang ldan pa zhes zlos pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i don gyis ni sems shing zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i shes rab kyis so //
T03TD3788E:123b-34: 'jal ba ni bsams pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T03TD3788E:123b-35: rtogs par byed pa ni bsgoms pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab bo //
T03TD3788E:123b-36: yang bsgom pa'i lam gyi yul ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:123b-37: nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i //
T03TD3788E:124a-0: @124a * // lam dang bsgom pa'i lam nyid la //
T03TD3788E:124a-1: zhes bstan pa ni gang bdag gis ji ltar gnas par bgyi zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha ji lta ba'i dbang du mdzad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:124a-2: ji ltar bdag gis bslab par bgyi zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam ji lta ba'i dbang du mdzad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:124a-3: ji ltar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam ji lta ba'i dbang du mdzad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:124a-4: de nyid kyi phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-6: bsgom pa'i lam gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:124a-7: de bzhin du bsgrub pa dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-8: de bzhin du sems pa dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-9: de bzhin du yongs su rtog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-10: de bzhin du yang brtson pa dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-11: de bzhin du 'bad pa zhes bya ba tshig drug gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:124a-12: ji ltar bsgom pa'i lam gyi yul de nyid ci yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:124a-13: de ni rgyun chags yin pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:124a-15: phyi ma phyi ma'i yul snga ma snga ma yin pas nyes pa med do /
T03TD3788E:124a-16: bsgom pa'i lam gyi phan yon rnam pa gsum ni gang tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pas /
T03TD3788E:124a-17: gzhan gyi bud med dang dus btab nas brda byas pa'i skyes bu'i rtogs pa mang po'i dpes bsod nams tshad med pa skye bas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor ba spong zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:124a-20: sngar ma skyes pa'i tshig gis ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi byed pa yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:124a-21: rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na //
T03TD3788E:124a-22: de ni rgyun chags pa yi phyir //
T03TD3788E:124a-23: chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams //
T03TD3788E:124a-24: chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yi //
T03TD3788E:124a-25: rnam pas rnam pa dgur 'dod do //
T03TD3788E:124a-27: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
T03TD3788E:124a-28: 'dir rtsa ba'i rnam par dbye ba ni chung du dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-31: de rnams re re yang chung ngu dang /
T03TD3788E:124a-33: chen po'i dbye ba byas pas rnam pa dgur 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:124a-34: 'di ltar chung ngu'i chung ngu dang /
T03TD3788E:124b-6: chen po'i chen pos dgur 'dod do //
T03TD3788E:124b-7: gnyen po'i phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:124b-8: de la lam chung du'i chung dus ni rnam par rtog pa chen po'i chen po spong ba nas /
T03TD3788E:124b-9: lam chen po'i chen pos ni rnam par rtog pa chung ngu'i chung du spong ba'i bar du ni grangs yod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:124b-11: tshad yod pa'i rtog pas bsdus pa bsgom pa'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas dgu pa'i gnyen po ni lam gyi rnam pa chen po'i chen po ni gang stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i lam rnam pa dgus bsdus pa /
T03TD3788E:124b-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba la bsod nams grangs med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:124b-14: tshad med pas bsdus pas nye bar bsdus pa rnam pa gsum char dgag pa med par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:124b-15: grangs med pa la sogs pa la khyad par ci zhig yod /
T03TD3788E:124b-16: tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
T03TD3788E:124b-17: rang gi mtshan nyid dang nye bar mtshon pa'i ched du yongs su dris pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:124b-19: grangs med pa'i khams ni 'khor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:124b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dag yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:124b-21: grangs med pa nyid kyis de mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa shes par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3788E:124b-22: dus rnams la tshad mi dmigs pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa nyid kyis de'i rtogs pa 'dus ma byas pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3788E:124b-23: gzhal bar mi nus pa'i phyir tshad med pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3788E:124b-24: de ni grangs med pa la sogs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:124b-25: / rang gi ngo bos mtshan nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:124b-26: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir grangs med /
T03TD3788E:124b-28: tshad med pa stong pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:124b-29: gal te de lta yin na /
T03TD3788E:124b-30: grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams //
T03TD3788E:124b-31: dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin //
T03TD3788E:125a-1: pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:125a-2: rjod par byed pa'i dbye ba dang /
T03TD3788E:125a-3: don gyi dbye ba med par dgongs so //
T03TD3788E:125a-4: kun rdzob de dag thugs brtse ba'i //
T03TD3788E:125a-5: rgyu mthun gyur pa thub pa bzhed //
T03TD3788E:125a-7: gang don yin par yi ge tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs mod kyi /
T03TD3788E:125a-8: grangs med pa zhes bya ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'di ni brjod du med pa las de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rje'i rgyu mthun par gyur pas bstan pa mdzad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje'i rgyu mthun pa'i dbang gis 'di dag thams cad kyi yul du gyur pa zhig na /
T03TD3788E:125a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na /
T03TD3788E:125a-11: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thams cad ni brjod du ma mchis pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125a-13: gang de rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni brjod par mi nus so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125a-14: dngos po brjod du med pa la //
T03TD3788E:125a-15: nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi rung //
T03TD3788E:125a-16: bsgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
T03TD3788E:125a-17: ci zhig nyams shing ci zhig thob //
T03TD3788E:125a-18: ces bya ba ni ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:125a-19: rnam par rtog pa'i rigs chen po'i chen po la sogs pa rnam pa dgu ni ci zhig nyams zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125a-21: lam chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa rnams pa rnams pa dgu ni ci zhig thob ces brgal ba ni gang brjod du med pa'i don la 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:125a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:125a-24: yongs su 'grib pa bkag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i skal ba med pa nyid do zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125a-25: 'di la lan du brjod pa ni //
T03TD3788E:125a-26: byang chub ji lta de bzhin du //
T03TD3788E:125a-27: de yi 'dod pa don sgrub byed //
T03TD3788E:125a-29: bsgom pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3788E:125b-0: gang thams cad du rtogs pa'i nga rgyal bkag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa la sogs pas yongs su bsngo @125b ba dang ldan pa de snod du 'gyur ba nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125b-1: byang chub kyang ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:125b-2: byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid //
T03TD3788E:125b-3: de yang de yi mtshan nyid bzhed //
T03TD3788E:125b-5: gzugs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:125b-6: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:125b-7: yongs su 'grib pa bkag pa'i sbyor ba rjes su gnang ba nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125b-8: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gam /
T03TD3788E:125b-9: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gcig la gcig rang bzhin gyis rjes su brgyud pas //
T03TD3788E:125b-10: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel ba phyin ci ma log par 'byung bar gyur pa yin par bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125b-11: yang de ltar byas nas gang /
T03TD3788E:125b-12: sems ni snga mas byang chub par //
T03TD3788E:125b-13: rigs min phyi mas kyang ma yin //
T03TD3788E:125b-15: sems dang po bskyed pa dang //
T03TD3788E:125b-16: phyis skyed pa dag ni gcig la gcig phrad pa med pas /
T03TD3788E:125b-17: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs su 'gyur ba med pas sems can gang /
T03TD3788E:125b-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes zhus pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125b-19: da ni ji ltar byang chub 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T03TD3788E:125b-20: 'jig rten du grags pa'i mar me'i dpe tshul gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gang snying po'i dpes sems bskyed pa gnyi ga 'bras bu dang bcas par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:125b-21: sems bskyed pa de'i yul du 'gyur bas sa bcu la bslabs pas /
T03TD3788E:125b-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par shes pa ni sems bskyed pa dang po dang /
T03TD3788E:125b-23: phyi ma dag bsgom pa la ma brten par mngon bar byang chub pa rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:125b-24: 'dir ci zhig shes par bya zhe na /
T03TD3788E:125b-25: zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad //
T03TD3788E:125b-26: ces bya bstan pa'i skabs 'dir rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03TD3788E:125b-27: ji ltar na rnam pa brgyad yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:125b-28: zab mo rnam pa brgyad do //
T03TD3788E:125b-30: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:125b-31: de bzhin nyid dang shes bya dang //
T03TD3788E:126a-1: dang spyod dang gnyis med dang //
T03TD3788E:126a-2: thabs la mkhas pa zab pa nyid //
T03TD3788E:126a-3: ces bya bas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-4: de la skye ba zab pa ni de dag ma yin la /
T03TD3788E:126a-5: de las gzhan pa las kyang ma yin pas mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang ba de ni /
T03TD3788E:126a-6: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pa nyid kyis 'gags pa'i sems skye ba 'gags pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-8: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:126a-9: sems gang 'gags pa de phyis skye bar 'gyur ram /
T03TD3788E:126a-10: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-11: 'gag pa zab pa ni gang sems skyes pa ni 'gags pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:126a-12: chos can de 'gag pa bkag pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-14: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:126a-15: gang skyes pa de 'gag par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin nam /
T03TD3788E:126a-16: bcom ldan 'das 'gag pa'i chos can lags so //
T03TD3788E:126a-17: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:126a-18: gang 'gag pa'i chos can ni yang 'gag par 'gyur ram /
T03TD3788E:126a-20: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-21: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:126a-22: skyes pa tsam nyid na de 'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:126a-23: yang ci zhig 'gag par 'gyur ba de bzhin nyid zab pa ni gang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du de la gnas pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul yin par dgongs pas /
T03TD3788E:126a-24: yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba nyid kyis so //
T03TD3788E:126a-25: de bzhin nyid zab po zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-27: de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin nyid gnas so zhes bya ba las gso pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-28: shes bya gang de zab pa ni gang sems de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no /
T03TD3788E:126a-30: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126a-31: shes pa zab pa ni gang de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid mi mthong ba'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-1: yang de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-2: spyod pa zab pa ni gang de ltar spyod pa de ni ci la yang mi spyod pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:126b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zab pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-6: de bzhin nyid la gnas pa la lung bstan pa la sogs pa'i yongs su rgyu ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-7: gnyis su med pa zab pa ni gang don dam pa la spyod pa la gnyis su kun du spyod pa med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:126b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma dang /
T03TD3788E:126b-9: mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes kyi sbyor ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-10: thabs la mkhas pa zab pa ni gang stobs bcu la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par /
T03TD3788E:126b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgyab bkag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis chos gang yang dngos po dang /
T03TD3788E:126b-12: dngos po med pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-14: chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du shes pa la gnas pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dang de la spyod pa'i sems can rnams /
T03TD3788E:126b-15: gnyen po'i phyogs de dang de la rab tu 'god kyang sems can yongs su smin pa la mkhas pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:126b-16: bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun gyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:126b-19: // / slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:126b-20: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:126b-21: mi slob pa'i dge 'dun bstan pa'i don ci dgos she na /
T03TD3788E:126b-22: 'di nyid kho na bslab par bya ba ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:126b-23: gang 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa spang bar bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:126b-24: rnam par byang ba'i rtog pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:126b-25: de gnyis mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs pas mi slob par 'gyur ba yin te /
T03TD3788E:126b-26: de phan chad bslab par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:127a-0: yang ji ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid yin @127a * //
T03TD3788E:127a-2: chos rnams rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:127a-3: srid dang zhi bar mi rtog pa //
T03TD3788E:127a-4: zhes bstan pa ni gang de nas mi mthun pa dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-5: gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas skabs dang bral ba'i sbyor ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gnyi ga mnyam par rtogs pas 'khor ba rmi lam dang 'dra bar rtogs nas /
T03TD3788E:127a-6: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la /
T03TD3788E:127a-7: nyin mo bsgoms pas rnam par 'phel ba bkag pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:127a-8: rmi lam gyi nang du bsgoms pas rnam par 'phel ba bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-10: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
T03TD3788E:127a-12: nyin par du rnam par rtog pa med do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-14: gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-15: las med la sogs klan ka yi //
T03TD3788E:127a-16: lan ni ji ltar bshad par zad //
T03TD3788E:127a-18: de la las med pa'i klan ka ni gang rmi lam dang 'dra ba'i chos nyid la rmi lam lta bu'i sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-19: dngos dang mjug gis bsdus ba'i las de la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-20: 'bri ba med par bstan pa nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-21: de'i lan ni gal te sad nas /
T03TD3788E:127a-22: bla na med par yongs su shes pas rnam par rtog pa ni de la sogs pa'am /
T03TD3788E:127a-24: mi rtog pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-25: las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba ni brda tsam du bshad pas /
T03TD3788E:127a-26: gang yang nyin par srog gcod par byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-27: rmi lam nang du srog gcod pa zhes bya ba ni nyin mo dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-28: mtshan mo zhes bya bar grags pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-29: nang du smos pa ni 'khor ba'i rmi lam khyad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:127a-30: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu las de la khyod ci zer zhes bya ba ni bden pa dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-31: bden pa ma yin pa dris pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:127a-32: gnyen po'i phyogs rtogs su zin kyang rnam par rtog pa rjes su 'jug pa skye ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:127a-33: de ni don dam pa bstan pa'i phyir rgol ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-34: 'di'i lan ni gang dmigs pa las las skye bar bshad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:127a-35: dmigs pa med pa las las skye ba 'gag pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127a-36: de yang brda dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:127b-0: dmigs pa'i @127b dngos po med pa yin no zhes brgal ba la /
T03TD3788E:127b-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu mtshan mar byas nas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127b-3: yongs su brtag pa'i dngos po dmigs par brten pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:127b-4: rmi lam gyi nang gi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na yang dag pa'am /
T03TD3788E:127b-5: yang dag pa ma yin par bsngos pa yin zhes dris pa la /
T03TD3788E:127b-7: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa gsum gyi mngon par rtogs pa mngon sum du gyur pa ;
T03TD3788E:127b-8: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin pas don 'di lan ldon par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127b-9: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:127b-10: dris pa de'i lan ldon pa'i dbang du mdzad pas ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i dri ba de ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127b-11: de rdzogs par gyur na ni ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas 'byung ba don med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:127b-12: ji ltar yongs su ma rdzogs pa bstan pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:127b-14: chos thams cad ldan ldon par byed pa'i dngos po dmigs su med pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127b-15: de ltar 'di dag rang nyid kyis mngon sum du byas par dam 'cha' zhing don mngon sum du byas na /
T03TD3788E:127b-16: dris pa'i lan yongs su rdzogs pa'i nyes par spang bar bya ba'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad med par 'dod pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:127b-17: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs par spyod pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:127b-18: shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa nyid yin pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:127b-19: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i mtshan ma med pa rtogs pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:127b-20: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa ni dus de nyid kyi dgongs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas dmigs pa med par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mngon bar byang chub pa nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128a-1: 'das pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:128a-3: // /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:128a-4: da ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:128a-5: de yang rnam pa gnyis su bstan te /
T03TD3788E:128a-7: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi bye brag gis yin te /
T03TD3788E:128a-8: sems can 'jig rten de bzhin du //
T03TD3788E:128a-9: snod kyi 'jig rten ma dag pa //
T03TD3788E:128a-10: de la dag pa sgrub pa yis //
T03TD3788E:128a-11: sangs rgyas zhing ni dag pa nyid //
T03TD3788E:128a-13: sems can gyi 'jig rten bkres pa la sogs pa ni lus kyi ma dag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:128a-14: de'i gnyen po ni lha'i longs spyod la sogs pa dag pas nye bar bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3788E:128a-15: snod kyi 'jig rten ni sa chen po 'di la sdong du ma dang /
T03TD3788E:128a-16: tsher ma la sogs pa ni ma dag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:128a-17: de'i gnyen po ni lag mthil ltar mnyam pa la sogs pa dag pas bsdus ba ste /
T03TD3788E:128a-18: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mdor bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128a-19: rgyas par ni mdo las gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:128a-20: sems can bkres pa la sogs pa mthong nas /
T03TD3788E:128a-21: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i ris dag gi longs spyod la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
T03TD3788E:128a-22: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
T03TD3788E:128a-23: de la nye bar longs spyod pa ni zas la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:128a-24: yongs su longs spyod pa ni nor bu dang /
T03TD3788E:128a-25: mu tig gi rgyan la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:128a-26: de bzhin du srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128a-27: de'i 'bras bu las bzlog pas bsdus pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128a-28: gnod sems las bzlog pas bsdus pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128a-29: le lo las bzlog pas bsdus pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128a-31: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa ma gtogs pa las bzlog pas bsdus pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128a-32: de la sgrib pa lnga ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-5: shes rab 'chal ba las bzlog pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3788E:128b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128b-7: thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar gyur pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-8: yang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can log par nges pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-9: ma nges pa'i phung po gsum du shes pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-10: ngan song gsum gyi sgra yang shes pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-12: tsher ma la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-13: sa chen po 'di sa'i rgyu las grub pa las bzlog pas bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-14: de bzhin du bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa las bzlog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-15: rigs bzhir yongs su 'dzin pa las bzlog pas nye bar bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128b-16: de dag las bzlog pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:128b-17: gang ci nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na chung du na rigs bzhi'i ming yang mi srid ba dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-19: des ni rigs kyi tshul gyi don med de /
T03TD3788E:128b-20: 'di ni bram ze zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-21: 'di ni dmangs rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:128b-27: chos gnyis po ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi dbang du byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-28: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-29: 'gro bas phye ba'i rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs pa skye gnas gsum po dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-30: mngon bar shes pa dang bral ba dang ;
T03TD3788E:128b-31: bshan gcig la sogs pa 'dzag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-36: zla ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-38: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang bral ba dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-39: sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed par nus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T03TD3788E:128b-41: khams mi mnyam pas kun nas ldang ba'i nad rnams las bzlog pas nye bar bsdus pa de dag las bzlog pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:128b-45: 'dus pas kun nas dkris pa'i nad rnams skyes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-0: ma skyes pa dag go rims @129a * //
T03TD3788E:129a-3: rjes su mthun pa'i gso bas nye bar bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-5: nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa la mos pa dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-6: nga rgyal can las bzlog pas ci rigs par rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de dang de rnams kyis bsdus pa la zhugs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun la tshad yod pa las go bzlog pas de dag tshad med par 'gyur ba nyid mngon bar 'tshang rgya bar sems bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-9: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bsam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-10: nam mkha' ltar mu med pa'i sems can gyi khams la 'khor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-11: mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang med par yongs su spyod pa'i yid la byed pas /
T03TD3788E:129a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:129a-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:129a-14: srid mo gang g'a'i lha mos de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar khas blangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pas 'khor rnams ji skad du bshad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba thob par yid ches pas dbang po'i don gyis dbang por gyur pa yin te zhes bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:129a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T03TD3788E:129a-17: // / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan nas thabs la mkhas pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:129a-18: de la re zhig de'i yul dang sbyor ba ste /
T03TD3788E:129a-19: ci zhig brjod par bya zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:129a-20: de la thabs la mkhas pa'i yul ni gang ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:129a-21: de dang der thabs la mkhas pas gsungs pa de ltar rang gi yul gyi sbyor ba tha dad pa bstan pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:129b-0: stong @129b pa nyid la sogs pa rnams nas /
T03TD3788E:129b-1: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la goms pa snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa yongs su 'dris pas ni thabs la mkhas pa'i yul don gyis bstan to zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:129b-3: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar stong pa nyid la ji ltar 'dris par bgyi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:129b-4: ji ltar stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris pas snyoms par 'jug par bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:129b-5: thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba ni gang gzugs stong pa'o zhes so sor rtog par byed cing thabs la mkhas pa la nye bar 'grong pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:129b-7: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:129b-8: goms par bsgom zhing mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ni ma yin par shes so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:129b-9: de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ni sbyin pa dang bral ba ma yin /
T03TD3788E:129b-10: tshul khrims dang bral ba ma yin /
T03TD3788E:129b-11: bzod pa dang bral ba ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo blang ngo //
T03TD3788E:129b-12: thabs ni rnam pa bcur 'gyur bas //
T03TD3788E:129b-14: mtshon bya rnams las 'das pa dang //
T03TD3788E:129b-15: mi gnas de bzhin shugs dang ni //
T03TD3788E:129b-16: thun mong ma yin nyid dang ni //
T03TD3788E:129b-17: ma chags pa dang mi dmigs dang //
T03TD3788E:129b-18: mtshan ma smon lam zad pa dang //
T03TD3788E:129b-19: de yi rtags dang tshad med dang //
T03TD3788E:129b-20: thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa bcu //
T03TD3788E:129b-22: de la bar chad kyi chos la yang dag pa'i 'da' ba'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gang skyes bu sgyu rtsal la byang ba zhig /'brog dgon par chas pa'i dpes bdag gir byas pa'i sems can gyi khams phyir rgol ba'i chos las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par don gyis bstan to zhes bshad do //
T03TD3788E:129b-23: mi gnas pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-0: gang yang bya bar snang la rgyu ba sa la mi lhung @130a * //
T03TD3788E:130a-1: ba'i dpes mi gnas pa rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-2: mi gnas pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-3: phyogs kyi zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:130a-4: grogs dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:130a-5: phyogs zhes bya ba ni yang 'jug pas bya ba smos pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-6: sngon gyi shugs kyis 'phags pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gang skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa 'phong gi slob dpon du gyur pas /
T03TD3788E:130a-7: mda' nam mkhar 'phangs pa gcig la gcig long btags pa'i dpes smon lam btab pa'i shugs kyis thabs la rjes su 'jug pa shes pa yin par don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-8: thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-9: gang sems can yongs su gtang ba'i bsam pas de ltar dga' ba'i gnas la sbyor ba shes pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-10: thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-11: ma chags pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-12: gang rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob par bsam gtan la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su ma nyams shing /
T03TD3788E:130a-13: mngon bar 'brel bar brjod par shes pa ni ro myang ba med par thabs la mkhas pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-14: mi dmigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-15: gang yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i sgo sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par rtogs pas mi dmigs pa'i thabs shes pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-16: mtshan ma med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-17: gang yang mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo yongs su rdzogs par rtogs pas mtshan ma med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-18: smon pa med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-19: gang yang smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par rtogs pas smon pa med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130a-20: stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130a-21: nyan thos pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-0: thun mong yin du zin kyang de thabs kyi khyad par yod pa'i @130b don ni de ltar spyod na mngon bar 'du bya ba med par ltung ba khams gsum pa dang lhan cig gnas pa ni gnas med do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130b-1: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gzhan gyis dris pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang rjes su mthun pa'i lung bstan pa la lung mi ston pas phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-2: phyir ldog pa nges par gzung ba'i thas la mkhas pa de'i rtags shes pa yin par don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130b-3: yul tshad med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gang yang gang rnam pa de ltar lan ldon pa de dag mi 'phrogs pa nyid kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i yul tshad med pa nyid shes pa yin bar don gyis bstan to zhes don gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130b-4: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:130b-6: // / de dag de ltar byas na rnam pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-7: sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-8: phan yon dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-9: bar chad dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-11: khyad par dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-12: byed pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-13: ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-15: yongs su smin pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-17: yan lag dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-18: nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:130b-19: yongs su gzung ba dang bcas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:130b-20: rnam pa thams cad mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs par gyur par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:130b-21: de la yul ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul gang yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:130b-22: 'jug pa ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams yin te /
T03TD3788E:130b-23: de rnams kyi bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:130b-24: yongs su smin pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams te /
T03TD3788E:130b-25: de rnams kyi rgyud yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:130b-26: rten ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun no //
T03TD3788E:130b-27: yan lag ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:130b-28: nye ba'i yan lag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:130b-29: lhag ma ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T03TD3788E:130b-30: yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:131a-0: rnam pa thams cad mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs @131a * //
T03TD3788E:131a-1: pa la khyad bar ci zhig yod ce na /
T03TD3788E:131a-2: kun mkhyen gsum ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa rnams so sor nges pa yin pas rnam pa'i yul re rer nges pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:131a-3: rnam pa thams cad mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa ni rnam pa ma lus pa yul du byed pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:131a-4: de ni khyad par yin no //
T03TD3788E:131a-5: yang na kun mkhyen gsum du bzhag pa ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:131a-6: rnam pa kun mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa ni sbyor ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131a-7: khyad par gzhan yang rnam pa kun mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa ni mi mthun pa dang /
T03TD3788E:131a-8: gnyen po'i gnas skabs kyis rab tu phye ba yin gyi /
T03TD3788E:131a-9: rnam pa la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de lta bu ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:131a-10: rnam pa ni zhi ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:131a-11: de ni de ltar byas na /
T03TD3788E:131a-12: rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang //
T03TD3788E:131a-13: yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas //
T03TD3788E:131a-14: thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang //
T03TD3788E:131a-15: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03TD3788E:131a-16: srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:131a-17: zhing dag bla na med pa ste //
T03TD3788E:131a-18: de ltar thabs la mkhas pa ni //
T03TD3788E:131a-19: rnam kun mngon rtogs rdzogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:131a-20: zhes bya ba ni rim gyis 'byung ba'i 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:131a-21: mngon bar rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las rnam pa kun mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T03TD3788E:131a-23: // / rnam pa kun mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa bstan nas da ni rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:131a-24: de la re zhig gang gis de mtshon par 'gyur ba'i rtags brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:131a-25: de'i rtags gang yin pa de yang ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:131a-26: rmi lam na yang chos rnams kun //
T03TD3788E:131a-27: rmi lam lta bu lta la sogs //
T03TD3788E:131a-28: rtse mor phyin pa'i sbyor ba'i rtags //
T03TD3788E:131a-29: rnam pa bcu gnyis dag tu bzhed //
T03TD3788E:131a-31: de la rtags dang po ni /
T03TD3788E:131a-32: gang rmi lam gyi nang du yang chos rnams ni rmi lam lta bur blta'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131a-34: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam gyi nang du yang chos rnams rmi lam lta bur blta zhing /
T03TD3788E:131b-0: de @131b bzhin du sgra brnyan dang /
T03TD3788E:131b-4: dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra bar chos thams cad la blta zhing mngon du mi byed na de ni rtse mo las phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-5: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:131b-6: gang de ltar thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyi chos bsgoms pas rtse mo thob pa ni rmi lam gyi nang du yang rnal 'byor 'di nges par mthong ba'i yid la byed pa gang yin pas sems can gyi khams la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du gnas pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-7: de bzhin du mdo gzhan las bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-8: gnyis pa ni gang de nyid nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:131b-9: khams gsum po 'dor ba'i sems dang /
T03TD3788E:131b-10: dga' ba'i sems mi skyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-11: gsum pa ni gang de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor chen pos bskor ba mthong zhing /
T03TD3788E:131b-12: de dam pa'i chos ston pa'i chos kyi rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-13: bzhi pa ni gang yang de nyid sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-14: lnga pa ni gang yang de nyid 'jigs pa'i gnas thams cad la khams gsum pa rmi lam lta bur chos ston pas nye bar bsdus pa'i sems bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-15: drug pa ni gang yang sems can nga dmyal ba la sogs pa mthong nas /
T03TD3788E:131b-16: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song spang bar bya ba rjes su dran pa thob pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-18: rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:131b-20: rmi lam gang yin pa gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:131b-21: bsam pas rnam pa gnyis su dbyer mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:131b-22: bdun pa ni gang rmi lam sad pa'i gnas skabs su grong khyer la sogs pa mes tshig par gyur pa bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu zhi bar nus pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:131b-23: de'i phyogs gcig zhi bar mi nus pa ni chos spong ba'i las byas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-1: khyim la la ni ma tshig pa las /
T03TD3788E:132a-2: sems can de dag gi las tshe 'di la rnam par smin pa nyid do zhes bstan pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:132a-3: brgyad pa ni gang yang mi ma yin pas byin gyis brlabs pa la /
T03TD3788E:132a-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa la 'byor pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-6: bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs nas bsal ba de la rang nyid nga rgyal skye ba dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la brnyas pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T03TD3788E:132a-9: thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-10: bdud kyis de'i ming dang rus la sogs pa gtan la phebs par smra bas slu ba rtogs pa'i ngag ma rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-11: yang bdud rang gis brtags pa'i slu tshig gtan pa bdag gir byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-13: mtshams med pa lnga bas kyang ming bstan pa'i rlom sems de shin tu lci ba'i las nyid dang yang bdud kyis dben pa'i yon tan bstan pas /
T03TD3788E:132a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems kyi dpen pa rjes su gnang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:132a-15: dgu pa ni gang mngon ba'i nga rgyal can gyi gang zag spangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-16: rang gi don la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa'i rang gi mngon bar shes pas pha rol gnon pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-17: dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos thams cad thob pa'i rgyu yin par shes par bya ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-19: byang chub kyi phyogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-20: de rnams dge ba'i chos thob pa'i lam shes par bya ba'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:132a-21: bcu pa ni gang mngon bar 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na /
T03TD3788E:132a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:132a-23: 'di ltar chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:132a-24: bcu gcig pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas gzung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:132a-25: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags med pa shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:132b-0: stong @132b pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du bar chad med pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3788E:132b-1: rnam par grol ba'i lam dag gi chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid du yod pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:132b-2: de lta na ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132b-3: rnam par byang ba med par 'gyur bas na /
T03TD3788E:132b-5: sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la spyod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa de grub po zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:132b-6: bcu gnyis pa ni gang de ltar spyod pa ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:132b-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:132b-10: // / rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa gang gis mtshon par 'gyur ba'i rtags rnams bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:132b-11: da ni de'i rnam par 'phel ba gang zhig yin zhe na ;
T03TD3788E:132b-12: 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs snyed kyi //
T03TD3788E:132b-13: sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge la sogs //
T03TD3788E:132b-14: dper mdzad nas ni rnam mang du //
T03TD3788E:132b-15: rnam 'phel bcu drug bdag nyid do //
T03TD3788E:132b-16: de la rnam par 'phel pa dang po ni //
T03TD3788E:132b-17: gang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi grangs snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la /
T03TD3788E:132b-18: rim gro la sogs pas mchod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132b-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:132b-20: ma bral ba na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:132b-21: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bzhag nas /
T03TD3788E:132b-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa bas cig shos kyis bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ba nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:132b-24: de'i de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i byams pa dang /
T03TD3788E:133a-1: par bya ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no /
T03TD3788E:133a-2: de'i mdo ni rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:133a-3: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag thams cad mi'i bdag nyid thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la /
T03TD3788E:133a-5: rigs kyi bu mo 'ga' zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur la sogs pa byas zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03TD3788E:133a-6: de bzhin du mdo gzhan las kyang gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:133a-7: gnyis pa ni gang skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba zhig rnyed pa las yang stor ba'i dpes /
T03TD3788E:133a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu gtod pa'i yid la byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:133a-9: yid la bya ba thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:133a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba nyid kyi dngos po bskyed pas /
T03TD3788E:133a-11: 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
T03TD3788E:133a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:133a-13: 'grib pa bkag pas mi 'bral ba nyid du rab tu bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:133a-14: gsum pa ni gang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:133a-15: rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste /
T03TD3788E:133a-16: rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do //
T03TD3788E:133a-18: de ni 'di ltar de de la gzhol bar 'gyur zhing /
T03TD3788E:133a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa yin no /
T03TD3788E:133a-21: gang bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lags /
T03TD3788E:133a-22: chos thams cad mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las /
T03TD3788E:133b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems @133b dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram /
T03TD3788E:133b-1: rab 'byor de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:133b-3: rtogs par byed pa'i chos nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:133b-5: 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad med pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:133b-7: rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa la /
T03TD3788E:133b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:133b-9: lnga pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon bar brtson pa las /
T03TD3788E:133b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba mi brtan pa dang ldan pa bkag pas /
T03TD3788E:133b-11: de la slob pa bsod nams mang bar bshad pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:133b-12: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T03TD3788E:133b-14: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas /
T03TD3788E:133b-15: chos 'di la mngon bar brtson pa dang ldan pa bsod nams mang du 'phel ba'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:133b-18: nyan thos la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:133b-19: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te /
T03TD3788E:133b-20: nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:133b-21: drug pa ni gang de ltar spyod pa la lha'i tshogs thams cad nye bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:133b-23: gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa rnams la yang khams mi mnyam pas /
T03TD3788E:133b-24: kun nas bslangs pa'i nad la sogs pa bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:133b-25: bdun pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' slob pa'i dus su nyan thos la sogs pa slob pa'i sar ltung ba byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:133b-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba las gzhan du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams dogs pa skye bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:133b-27: de mya ngan gyi zug rngu zug par 'gyur pa dang /
T03TD3788E:133b-28: yang de rnams skar mda' ltung ba gtong ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-0: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi @134a * //
T03TD3788E:134a-1: mdun du bdud sdig can 'tshe ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:134a-2: sngon gyi tshe rabs su chos 'di la lhag par mos pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-3: the tshom za bar gyur pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-5: 'jig rten rgyang pa na la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-6: de'i bsngags pa brjod pa la khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pas ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la brnyas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag rnams dang lhan cig 'thab cing rtsod pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-11: lung bstan pa gzhan dag la gnod sems dang ldan pa la ni bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur bas /
T03TD3788E:134a-12: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gtang ba dang ldan pa ni /
T03TD3788E:134a-13: de srid kyi dus su dmyal bar gnas par go cha bgo bar khas blangs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-14: 'chags shing sdom par brtson gyi sdom pa la gnas pas las kyi sgrib pa de las ldang ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3788E:134a-15: brgyad pa ni gang ston pa la ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang gnas par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-16: bslab pa mtshungs pa nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
T03TD3788E:134a-17: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:134a-18: byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar du bslab pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yul nye bar dgod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134a-19: dgu pa ni gang bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lags /
T03TD3788E:134a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:134a-22: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis bsam gtan la sogs pa la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
T03TD3788E:134a-23: de rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:134b-0: yongs su dag pa'i bslab pa brjod pa nas bslab pa rnam par 'phel ba @134b shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:134b-1: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:134b-2: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de mi shes pa'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob par byed pa'i 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-4: bcu pa ni gang gser sa le sbram 'byung ba'i gnas drug pa'i dpes sangs rgyas kyi rigs rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa mngon bar 'phel ba thob pa'i snod du rung ba shin tu nyung ba nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-5: bcu gcig pa ni gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te /
T03TD3788E:134b-6: gnas pa nyung ba'i dpes rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu nyid thob pa rnyed pa ni ches nyung ba nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-7: bcu gnyis pa ni gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sems mi skyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-8: bcu gsum pa ni gang gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:134b-10: rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-11: bcu bzhi pa ni gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thams cad du 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-12: bco lnga pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni /
T03TD3788E:134b-13: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-14: gal te de lta yin na nyan thos sam /
T03TD3788E:134b-15: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
