T03TD3788E:134b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:134b-18: mthong bas de dag bltas te 'da' bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:134b-19: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa bsal ba'i phyir mthong ba zhes smos pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:134b-20: 'khrul par snang ba bsal ba'i phyir shes pa smos pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:135a-1: ba'i tshig ni yang nyan thos dang /
T03TD3788E:135a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsgom pa'i lam du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:135a-3: yang ci'i phyir de dag 'di'i bsgom pa'i lam du bkag ce na /
T03TD3788E:135a-4: rgyun du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:135a-5: spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:135a-6: gtso bo gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:135a-7: yang 'da' bar byed pa ni rnam pa thams cad mngon bar rtogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:135a-8: rnam par 'phel ba bcu drug pa ni gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:135a-9: de'i yul gyi rnam par rtog pa bkag pa la slob par rjes su gnang ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:135a-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:135a-13: // / rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa'i rnam par 'phel ba ji lta ba bzhin du /
T03TD3788E:135a-15: da ji ltar 'gyur ba'i nges ba brjod pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:135a-16: sems can don yongs mi gtong ba //
T03TD3788E:135a-17: kun mkhyen nyid gsum chos rnams kyis //
T03TD3788E:135a-18: yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med //
T03TD3788E:135a-19: nges pa zhes ni mngon bar brjod //
T03TD3788E:135a-20: ces bstan pa ni gang de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing /
T03TD3788E:135a-21: sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon na /
T03TD3788E:135a-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur nas /
T03TD3788E:135a-23: lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:135a-24: thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:135a-25: zhes bya ba ni rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs pa la /
T03TD3788E:135a-26: nges pa'i gnas skabs thob pa ni rnyed par dka' bar shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:135a-27: de ston pa lha'i me tog man dar ba nye bar gtor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:135a-28: mngon du phyogs nas gtor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-0: rab tu khyab par gtor nas mchod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par @135b bsngos pa'i tshig gis /
T03TD3788E:135b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-3: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bya ba /
T03TD3788E:135b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pas de bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:135b-5: ji ltar na sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:135b-6: de lta bu'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i gnas skabs su mya ngan las 'das pa spang ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-7: thugs rje chen po mngon du bya ba'i dgongs pas sems can ma bsgral ba bsgral ba la sogs pa'i sems bskyed pas /
T03TD3788E:135b-8: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-9: spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-11: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams /
T03TD3788E:135b-12: ci rigs par rtogs pa bzhi'i gnyen po'i phyogs mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:135b-13: rnam pa bzhi bstan pas bzhi po de dag bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:135b-17: gling bzhi pa ni stong dag dang //
T03TD3788E:135b-18: stong gnyis gsum dag dper mdzad nas //
T03TD3788E:135b-19: bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni //
T03TD3788E:135b-20: ting 'dzin yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
T03TD3788E:135b-21: zhes bstan pa ni gang rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mang po nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:135b-22: gling chen po bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang gis gzhal ba'i dpe dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-23: de bzhin du stong chen po dang /
T03TD3788E:135b-25: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha gcig gis /
T03TD3788E:135b-26: chu'i thigs pa blangs pa'i tshad gzung ba'i dpes /
T03TD3788E:135b-27: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mang ba nyid dang ;
T03TD3788E:135b-28: sems bskyed pa 'di dag dang ldan pa dag ni /
T03TD3788E:135b-29: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dag tu zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:135b-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:136a-1: gzhan yang med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du phan yon rnam pa mang po zhig bstan pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:136a-2: rtag pa la sogs pa de dag ni dro ba la sogs pa nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi dang 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid du go rims bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:136a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:136a-5: // / da ni mthong ba'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /
T03TD3788E:136a-6: gnyen por bcas pa rnam pa bzhi po gzung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:136a-7: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:136a-8: 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la //
T03TD3788E:136a-9: gzung ba'i rnam rtog so sor te //
T03TD3788E:136a-10: dgu yi bdag nyid yin zhes bya //
T03TD3788E:136a-12: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3788E:136a-13: ma lus pa la 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi rten can dang po ni /
T03TD3788E:136a-14: gang gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i sems bskyed pa de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par nges par sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:136a-15: ma lus pa las ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can rnam pa gnyis ni /
T03TD3788E:136a-16: gang tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
T03TD3788E:136a-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:136a-18: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
T03TD3788E:136a-19: rnam par mi rtog pa'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rnam par byang ba'i yul gyi rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:136a-20: yang rgyu gang gis de dag rnam par rtog pa zhes bstan ce na /
T03TD3788E:136a-22: ji lta ba bzhin yul min bdag / ces bya ba smos te /
T03TD3788E:136a-23: phyin ci log tu rtog pas na rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:136a-24: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis bstan pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:136a-25: sems can rdzas dang btags yod par //
T03TD3788E:136a-27: so so'i skye bo 'phags dbye bas //
T03TD3788E:136a-28: so sor de dag dgu dag nyid //
T03TD3788E:136a-30: de la so so'i skye bo'i rdzas su yod pa'i rten can 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po ni gang /
T03TD3788E:136b-0: kye ma tshe dang ldan pa rab @136b 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gang snying po la spyod do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:136b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos thams cad dben par bshad pa la mi zhum /
T03TD3788E:136b-2: yangs su zhum par me 'gyur ba la sogs pas /
T03TD3788E:136b-3: skyes bu rdzas yod pa'i rten can gyi rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:136b-4: chos thams cad bdag med pa'i shes pa 'di ni so so'i skye bo la yod pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:136b-5: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i skabs su bzhag pa dang po 'di ni khyad par ma yin no zhe na /
T03TD3788E:136b-6: de rnams kyi de kho na nyid yid la byed pa de ni mos pa yid la byed pa yin par 'dir bshad pa'i phyir snying po med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:136b-7: brtags par yod pa 'phags pa'i gang zag gi rten can gyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa ni gang sems zhum pa de'i rgyu dris pa la /
T03TD3788E:136b-8: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma mchis pa'i slad du zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:136b-11: gzhan du 'gyur bar mi dmigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:136b-12: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas /
T03TD3788E:136b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'am /
T03TD3788E:136b-14: chos ston par 'gyur zhes 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad du rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:136b-15: 'phags pa'ang de lta bu yod de /
T03TD3788E:136b-16: dge slong dag mtshan mo 'das nas nang par gyi dus su ngas srog chags ce sbyang sgra 'byin pa'i skad thos so //
T03TD3788E:136b-17: da bzhin du nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus su ri dags kyi rgyal po seng ge yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:136b-18: tshig de dag ni tha snyad yin gyi /
T03TD3788E:136b-19: don dam pa ma yin pas snying po med do //
T03TD3788E:136b-20: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i skabs su bzhag par gyur pa ni khyab pa can ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:136b-21: ci'i phyir 'di dag rnam par rtog pa zhes brjod ce na /
T03TD3788E:136b-23: gal te gzung don de bzhin med //
T03TD3788E:136b-25: de ltar de dag 'dzin pa yi //
T03TD3788E:136b-26: ngo bos stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3788E:136b-27: de ltar rnam par rtog pa 'di bzhi yang //
T03TD3788E:137a-0: @137a * // re re yang rnam pa dgu dgur shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:137a-1: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po dgu po gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:137a-2: ngo bo nyid rigs de dang ni //
T03TD3788E:137a-3: kun nas yang dag bsgrub pa dang //
T03TD3788E:137a-4: shes pa'i dmigs pa ma 'khrul dang //
T03TD3788E:137a-5: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dang //
T03TD3788E:137a-6: rang gis rtogs dang byed pa dang //
T03TD3788E:137a-7: de yi las bya'i 'bras bu la //
T03TD3788E:137a-8: 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi rten can gyi //
T03TD3788E:137a-9: rtog pa de ni rnam dgur 'dod //
T03TD3788E:137a-11: de la ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:137a-12: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:137a-13: khyod kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:137a-14: ji ltar dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:137a-16: rab 'byor ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:137a-17: rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par ma gyur zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:137a-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dben par ma gyur na /
T03TD3788E:137a-19: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni de'i mtshan nyid can yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:137a-20: de ltar spyod pa ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137a-21: rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang nam mkha'i dpes rigs su rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137a-22: yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dpes bsgrub pa'i yang dag par 'grub pa'i rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137a-23: dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang gzugs brnyan gyi dpes dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137b-0: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpes gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin @137b no ;
T03TD3788E:137b-1: / rang gis rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang de'i dpes rang rang gis rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137b-2: byed pa po'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang de'i sprul pa'i dpes sprul pa'i rigs byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:137b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ring ba dang nye ba bkag pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137b-5: bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i bya ba'i dpes las kyi rnam pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137b-6: bya ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang shing gi 'khrul 'khor gyi dpes bya ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137b-7: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:137b-8: srid dang zhi bar ltung ba'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:137b-9: rtogs pa dman pa nyid dang ni //
T03TD3788E:137b-10: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:137b-11: lam gyi rnam pa ma tshang dang //
T03TD3788E:137b-12: gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang //
T03TD3788E:137b-13: ched du bya ba log pa dang //
T03TD3788E:137b-14: nyi tshe ba dang sna tshogs nyid //
T03TD3788E:137b-15: gnas dang 'jug la rmongs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:137b-16: rjes la 'gro zhes bya ba la //
T03TD3788E:137b-17: rnam rtog dgu yi bdag nyid ni //
T03TD3788E:137b-18: ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can te //
T03TD3788E:137b-19: mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin //
T03TD3788E:137b-21: de 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang rung ba zhig tu ltung ba nyid kyis dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhir las byed cing rjes su 'gro'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:137b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes rab dang snying rje dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pos 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang rung bar ltung bar mi byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:137b-23: 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpes rtogs pa ma lus pa la byed pa'i yul shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:137b-24: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang bud med khyim thab med pa'i dpes yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-1: ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang g-yul du zhugs pa'i mi dpa' bo'i dpes bsgrub pa'i khyad par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-2: gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la /
T03TD3788E:138a-3: khams kyi rgyal po rjes su 'brang ba'i dpes rtogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-4: ched du bya ba log pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang chu bo rnams gang g'a'i chu bo dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i dpes /
T03TD3788E:138a-5: grogs gtso bo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog par 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:138a-6: theg pa gzhan du 'gro ba med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ched du bya ba las yongs su nyams pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-7: nyi tshe ba byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang skyes bu'i lag pa g-yas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:138a-8: g-yon pa'i dpes nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i byed pa shes par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-9: rtogs pa tha dad nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni gang chu klung phra mo dang /
T03TD3788E:138a-10: chu klung chen po'i chu rnams rgya mtsho chen por phyin na ro gcig par 'gyur ba'i dpes pha rol tu phyin pa lnga de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur bar shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-11: gnas pa dang 'jug pa mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang 'khor lo rin po che gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:138a-13: 'gro ba dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga de'i rjes su 'brang bar shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-14: rjes la 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang de nyid dpung gi tshogs kyis mdun du 'gro ba'i dpes de'i rjes su 'brang bar shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138a-15: gal te de ltar yin na /
T03TD3788E:138b-0: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni med do zhes brgal ba la rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du 'jig rten na gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log tu gyur pa ste zhes bya ba @138b nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:138b-1: shes rab kyi don gyi dbang ma gtogs par sems can yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:138b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni don gyi lan yin no //
T03TD3788E:138b-3: tha dad du byed pa med pa thams cad las gcig gtso bor gyur pa yod pa ma yin no zhes brgal ba la /
T03TD3788E:138b-4: lus tha dad pa rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du phyin pa'i dpes lnga po de ni khyad par med pa'i thob pa 'dis gtso bor 'thad pa'i lan gyis gsungs la /
T03TD3788E:138b-5: yang don rjes su zhugs nas khyad par du shes pa med pas /
T03TD3788E:138b-6: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa dang 'brel ba bye brag tu rnam par rtog pa la kun tu spyod pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:138b-7: 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang brdar byas na zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:138b-8: bud med rin po che'i dpes dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bsdus shing mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga na ba der mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par dgongs pa mchog nyid yin par 'thad pa'i lan gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138b-9: da ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po re re zhing dbye ba rnam par dgur 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:138b-10: de la re zhig /'dzin pa dang ni 'dong ba dang //
T03TD3788E:138b-11: yid la byed dang khams gsum ni //
T03TD3788E:138b-12: gsum char nye bar 'brel pa dang //
T03TD3788E:138b-13: gnas dang mngon bar zhen pa dang //
T03TD3788E:138b-14: chos kyi dngos po btags pa dang //
T03TD3788E:138b-15: chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang //
T03TD3788E:138b-17: 'dzin pa dang por shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:138b-18: zhes bya ba la de la 'dzin pa dang thar pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3788E:138b-19: gang bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang 'dzin pa'am gtong ba ma mchis so zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:138b-20: yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yid la mi byed pas /
T03TD3788E:138b-21: yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba nyid kyis yid la byed pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:138b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:139a-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @139a * //
T03TD3788E:139a-1: thob par byed pa med pa thal bar 'gyur bas /
T03TD3788E:139a-2: gang rab 'byor nam gzugs yid la mi byed ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:139a-3: de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:139a-4: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3788E:139a-5: yid la mi byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o zhes bya ba'i 'thad pa'i lan gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139a-6: khams gsum pa dang nye bar 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de ltar gzugs yid lam bgyis zhes bya ba nas 'dren mar 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pas khams gang du yang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi bar du'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139a-7: gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de ltar spyod pa de /
T03TD3788E:139a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139a-9: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mngon bar chags par mi 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:139a-10: mngon bar chags par bya ba'i gnas kyi rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139a-11: dngos por brtags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:139a-13: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang ma gzigs pas 'dogs par ma mdzad do //
T03TD3788E:139a-14: de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud ba ni rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba brtags par rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:139a-16: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med do zhes bya ba dngos po nyid du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:139a-17: de ltar mngon bar zhen pa la spyod pa las nyams pa'i tshig gis na mngon par zhen pa med pa gtsor bya bar shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-0: chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa na gang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na ji ltar sbyin @139b pa sbyin pa la sogs pa'i skyon 'di dag ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
T03TD3788E:139b-1: rab 'byor gang gi tshe 'di ltar chos thams cad la chags pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par shes pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-3: gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi chos rnams de la dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:139b-4: mnyam pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:139b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:139b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de dang ma bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-7: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba la thogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang dmigs par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:139b-8: dmigs par byed pa dag dbyer med pas mngon par rtogs pa bsgrub pa med na /
T03TD3788E:139b-10: mngon bar sgrub pa med par thal bar 'gyur bas rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs zhe'am /
T03TD3788E:139b-12: 'di'i gzugs so zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:139b-13: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji ltar 'dod par 'gro ba'i dpes pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam du ji ltar 'dod par 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i bar gyis rjes su 'brang ba gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-14: da ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgu pa gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:139b-15: ched bzhin nges par mi 'byung dang //
T03TD3788E:139b-16: lam la lam min nges 'dzin dang //
T03TD3788E:139b-17: 'gog dang bcas pa'i skye ba dang //
T03TD3788E:139b-18: dngos po ldan dang mi ldan dang ;
T03TD3788E:139b-19: / gnas dang rigs ni 'jig pa dang //
T03TD3788E:139b-20: don du gnyer dang rgyu med dang //
T03TD3788E:139b-21: phyir rgol ba ni dmigs pa la //
T03TD3788E:139b-22: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gzhan yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-24: ched du bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang kha lo bsgyur ba'i dpes /
T03TD3788E:139b-25: de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mchog gis rab tu khrid pa des rang dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:139b-26: lam la lam ma yin par nges par 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3788E:140a-1: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni /
T03TD3788E:140a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin pa dang lam yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140a-4: 'gog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
T03TD3788E:140a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:140a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma yin 'gog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni chos nyid tshad mar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:140a-7: de lta na ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod par mi 'dod par mi 'dod do zhe na /
T03TD3788E:140a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs par byas nas /
T03TD3788E:140a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:140a-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
T03TD3788E:140a-11: 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i rnam par bsgoms pas /
T03TD3788E:140a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson par yang dag par brtson pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140a-13: dngos po dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:140a-14: mi ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de'i rgyu yongs su zhus nas /
T03TD3788E:140a-15: lan bka' stsal pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:140a-16: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ldan pa bkag pas mngon par brtson par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140a-17: gzugs la sogs pa la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par bya'o zhes brtson par mi bya ste /
T03TD3788E:140a-19: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar te /
T03TD3788E:140a-20: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum char ni gang na yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140a-21: rigs rnam par 'jig pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang aa mra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i dpes /
T03TD3788E:140a-22: chos rnam par mi 'jig par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140a-23: don du mi gnyer ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang chos thams cad kyi bar la dbang du gyur pa thob par 'dod pas /
T03TD3788E:140b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par @140b bya ba nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140b-1: rgyu med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03TD3788E:140b-2: rgya mtsho chen po ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i dpes /
T03TD3788E:140b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i gang zag gis rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140b-4: phyir rgol ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang yang 'phong gi slob dpon gyi dpes /
T03TD3788E:140b-5: phyir rgol ba'i chos thub par dka' bar ston cing /
T03TD3788E:140b-6: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi dmigs pa'i rnam par dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:140b-7: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po'i gnyen po'i phyogs shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:140b-8: mu bzhi las dang po ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:140b-9: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma yin pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dag go //
T03TD3788E:140b-10: gnyis pa ni rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gcig go //
T03TD3788E:140b-11: gsum pa ni rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gzhan no //
T03TD3788E:140b-12: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:140b-14: rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni tshig phyi ma can no //
T03TD3788E:140b-15: gang de las re zhig rigs kyi rnam pa de nyid rigs yin no //
T03TD3788E:140b-17: gnyen po'i phyogs yang dag par rtogs pa'i dus ni rigs te /
T03TD3788E:140b-19: rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:140b-21: yang dag par rtogs pa'i dus ma yin pa ni rigs tsam nyid do //
T03TD3788E:140b-22: yang dag par rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:140b-23: dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma yin pa ni tshig snga ma can no //
T03TD3788E:140b-24: gang de las re zhig yang dag par rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:140b-25: dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang yin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:140b-26: yang dag par rtogs par byed pa ni dmigs pa la yang sbyor ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:140b-27: yang dag par rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:141a-0: dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma yin pa ni 'di @141a * //
T03TD3788E:141a-1: ltar dmigs pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:141a-2: phyogs 'dis lhag ma rnams kyang rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:141a-3: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa mthong pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:141a-5: // / yang ci'i phyir de la mthong ba'i lam du 'dod ce na /
T03TD3788E:141a-6: byang chub chen po thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:141a-7: de thob pa yang rgyu gsum gyis yin te /
T03TD3788E:141a-8: yang rgyu gsum ni byang chub gzhan la ston pa dang zhes smos pa ni /
T03TD3788E:141a-9: gang bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab la /
T03TD3788E:141a-10: byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:141a-11: mthong ba'i lam thob pa dge slong brgya drug cu lung bstan pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141a-12: de'i rgyu ni yongs su gtod dang zhes bya ba ni gang 'phags pa kun dga' bo la de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mang du gtad pas gsungs so zhes zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141a-13: de'i mdo ni kun dga' bo ngas khyod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gtad do //
T03TD3788E:141a-14: ci nas phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i dus su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141a-15: de thob par chad med pa'i rgyu //
T03TD3788E:141a-16: bsod nams mang po'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3788E:141a-17: zhes bya ba ni gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur cing /
T03TD3788E:141a-18: de dag la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dper bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:141a-19: rgya cher skad cig dang yud tsam dang /
T03TD3788E:141a-20: thang cig tsam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ston par byed pa bsod nams mang du 'phel lo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141a-21: skad cig la sogs pa smos pas ni go rims bzhin du gang zag dbang po rnon po dang /
T03TD3788E:141a-23: tha ma shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:141a-24: bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa 'dir skad cig mar shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:141a-25: tha snyad gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:141b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du mdzad pa'i dpes ni rnam par rtog pa rnams ni mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi yul ma yin pa nyid du shes @141b par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:141b-1: de ltar na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i rgyu ni gsum po de dag yin no //
T03TD3788E:141b-2: yang byang chub chen po zhes bya ba 'di gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:141b-3: dri ma zad dang mi skye ba'i //
T03TD3788E:141b-4: ye shes byang chub ces brjod do //
T03TD3788E:141b-6: yang zad pa shes pa ni gang zhig yin mi skye ba shes pa ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:141b-7: zad med skye med phyir de dag / go rims bzhin du shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:141b-9: gang kun dga' bo nam mkha' zad par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad pa shes pa'o //
T03TD3788E:141b-10: rgya che ba'i ye shes brjod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:141b-11: chos de rnams ni skye ba yod pa ma yin no zhes mi skye ba shes pa brjod pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye bar dgongs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141b-12: de la ji ltar yid ches par bya zhe na /
T03TD3788E:141b-13: bden par mtshon pa'i ljags rgya chen po bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:141b-14: 'phags pa kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la sogs par nges par sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:141b-15: de gzung pas gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad gzung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141b-16: yang ji ltar na mi zad pa'i rnam pa zag pa shes pa yin zhing dngos po 'jig pa'i rnam pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:141b-17: gang gi phyir sbyor ba'i dus kyang /
T03TD3788E:141b-18: rab 'byor gzugs mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:141b-19: snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos te /
T03TD3788E:141b-20: de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas mngon par bsgrub par rnam par blta ba ni /
T03TD3788E:141b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:141b-22: de ltar lta ba ni bdag dang /
T03TD3788E:141b-23: chos thams cad du 'dzin pa spangs pas mthong ba'i lam gsal bar bsten pa'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:141b-24: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i la ni pha dang ma shi ba'i skyes bu'i dpes bdud rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul las 'da' bar sems pa dang /
T03TD3788E:141b-25: mya ngan gyi zug rdu zug pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:141b-26: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de bas na zad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:142a-1: skye ba shes pas ni gang yang zad pa'am /
T03TD3788E:142a-3: 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin la //
T03TD3788E:142a-4: mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
T03TD3788E:142a-5: rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad //
T03TD3788E:142a-6: skye med rnam pa ci zhig 'thob //
T03TD3788E:142a-8: dngos po gang 'jig pa la dgongs nas zad pa la ni zad pa shes pa yin ba zad pa shes zhes brjod la /
T03TD3788E:142a-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po mi skye ba la dgongs nas mi skye ba shes pa zhes bstan pa de la ci zhig ni zad pa'am /
T03TD3788E:142a-10: mi skye ba med pa ni ci zhig 'thob ces dris pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:142a-12: chos rnams kyang yod ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:142a-13: shes bya la yang sgrib zad par //
T03TD3788E:142a-14: ston pa gzhan gyi brjod pa gang //
T03TD3788E:142a-15: 'di la kho bos mtshar du rtsis //
T03TD3788E:142a-17: des na 'di nyid kho na legs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:142a-18: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
T03TD3788E:142a-19: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
T03TD3788E:142a-20: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta /
T03TD3788E:142a-21: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T03TD3788E:142a-23: skad cig ma gcig po 'di ni mthong ba'i lam yin te /
T03TD3788E:142a-25: sbyin la sogs pa re re la //
T03TD3788E:142a-26: de dag phan tshun bsdus pa gang //
T03TD3788E:142a-27: skad cig gcig gi bzod pa yis //
T03TD3788E:142a-28: bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3788E:142a-30: gang rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:142a-31: rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:142a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
T03TD3788E:142a-33: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:142a-34: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
T03TD3788E:142a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i bar du drug po re re zhing drug tu byas nas rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug gis bsdus pa thams cad du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir thams cad gcig gis gcig bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:142a-37: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba ni sems can rnams la byams pa'i lus dang /
T03TD3788E:142b-0: yid kyi las nye bar 'gyur ba ni tshul khrims @142b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-1: de nyid la len pa po rnam par gshe zhing 'khyal bar smra ba la sogs pa bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-2: de nyid kyi slong mo'i mtshang 'dru ba dang //
T03TD3788E:142b-3: yongs su smra ba la sogs pas sbyin pa la spro ba mi 'dor ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-4: de nyid kyi sbyin pa de rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /
T03TD3788E:142b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rnam par g-yengs pa'i sems med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-7: de nyid kyi sbyin pa byin pa na sgyu ma'i blos gnas pas gang gi yang phan pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:142b-8: gnod par bya ba ma mthong ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-9: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung ba nas shes rab bsgom pa'i bar du re re zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par bsdus pa mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-10: de ltar na drug tshan cha drug po 'di dag ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:142b-11: mthong ba'i lam gyi bzod pa 'di skyes pa na 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:142b-13: gzugs med pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa'i nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pa bzhis bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad spong bar 'gyur ro ;
T03TD3788E:142b-14: / de la dbang du bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:142b-15: de nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T03TD3788E:142b-17: lugs mi mthun la rtog gar byed //
T03TD3788E:142b-19: de la lugs dang mthun pa ni /
T03TD3788E:142b-20: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-21: lugs dang mi mthun pa ni gang de rnams med pas /
T03TD3788E:142b-23: smre sngags 'don pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-24: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:142b-27: da ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa bzhi brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:142b-28: de la re zhig bsgom pa'i lam bsgoms nas 'di phyir brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:143a-1: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus bsdus pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:143a-2: de yang thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pas bsdus pa yin pas de'i phyir de bstan pa'i sgo nas bsgom pa'i lam mdor bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad de /
T03TD3788E:143a-4: rnam pa gnyis su song 'ongs nas //
T03TD3788E:143a-5: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
T03TD3788E:143a-6: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
T03TD3788E:143a-7: thod rgal du ni snyoms 'jug pa //
T03TD3788E:143a-8: gcig dang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga //
T03TD3788E:143a-9: drug dang bdun dang brgyad rgal nas //
T03TD3788E:143a-12: rnam pa gnyis su zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mthun pa dang /
T03TD3788E:143a-14: de nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas /
T03TD3788E:143a-15: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la so sor brtags pa'i rjes mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu nas mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang /
T03TD3788E:143a-17: lugs dang mi mthun pa gcig dang /
T03TD3788E:143a-25: dgu po la thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pas mngon du byed pa na /
T03TD3788E:143a-26: ji ltar 'dod pas dbang du bya ba mang du thob pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:143a-28: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
T03TD3788E:143a-29: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa /
T03TD3788E:143a-31: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T03TD3788E:143a-32: bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
T03TD3788E:143a-34: tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
T03TD3788E:143a-35: de 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas /
T03TD3788E:143a-36: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143a-37: de las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-0: de nas rnam shes @143b mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-1: de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-2: de nas ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-3: de nas bsam gtan gsum pa la /
T03TD3788E:143b-5: de nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs te /
T03TD3788E:143b-6: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rnam par dbye ba byas nas thong rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-7: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin de yang gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:143b-8: de la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa nas /
T03TD3788E:143b-9: de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-10: de las langs nas bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
T03TD3788E:143b-11: de las langs nas 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-12: de nas ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-14: de nas ni gsum pa la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-16: de nas ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-18: de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-20: / de nas rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-22: de nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-24: de nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la'o //
T03TD3788E:143b-25: de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-26: de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-27: de las langs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems mngon du byed do //
T03TD3788E:143b-28: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:143b-29: de las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so //
T03TD3788E:143b-30: de nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:144a-0: de las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems @144a * //
T03TD3788E:144a-2: de nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'o //
T03TD3788E:144a-3: de nas ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so //
T03TD3788E:144a-4: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03TD3788E:144a-5: gang sa brgyad rnam gnyis rjes 'brel dang //
T03TD3788E:144a-6: gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs nas ni //
T03TD3788E:144a-7: rigs mi mthun par gsum par 'gro //
T03TD3788E:144a-8: thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug min //
T03TD3788E:144a-9: zhes bstan pa de ji ltar yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:144a-10: khva dang 'ug pa gnyis mtshan nyid mtshungs pa yin nam //
T03TD3788E:144a-11: de'i skabs gzhan ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:144a-12: thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu thob bas bskal ba grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya snyed da 'jug cing /
T03TD3788E:144a-13: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa nyid kyis rgya che ba yin pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam rgya chags pa nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:144a-14: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:144a-16: // / bsgom pa'i lam bstan nas da de de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa bzhi brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:144a-17: de la re zhig mdor bsdus rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi //
T03TD3788E:144a-18: mgon dang bcas pa med nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:144a-19: dus gsum yon tan med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:144a-20: legs pa'i lam ni rnam gsum dang //
T03TD3788E:144a-21: gzung ba'i rnam rtog 'di gcig ste //
T03TD3788E:144a-22: sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i spyod yul can //
T03TD3788E:144a-24: de la chos rnams kyi mdor bsdus pa mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:144a-25: bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par bstan pa de la /
T03TD3788E:144a-26: byang chub sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par kun chub par bya'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:144a-27: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum char mngon par rtogs pa gcig gis mdor bsdus pa bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:144a-28: mngon par rtogs pa re re yang rgyas par bstan pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:144a-29: da ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa la mdor bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-0: rgyas par bsgoms pa'i lam gyi @144b dbang du mdzad nas nye bar bkod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-1: des spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa spangs par shes par bya ba'i don du /
T03TD3788E:144b-2: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags zhus pas /
T03TD3788E:144b-3: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mdor bsdus pa shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-4: rgyas pa shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-5: byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rnon po la sogs pa 'jug pa nyid kyis mdor bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-6: rgyas pa brjod pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:144b-7: sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:144b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du slob pa ni bdud kyi las mi byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-9: yongs su mi nyams pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-10: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas tshims par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-11: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-12: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pas /
T03TD3788E:144b-14: gang de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di se go la gtogs pa tsam du bsgoms pa'i bsod nams de mang du 'phel ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-15: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i rgyu nyid shes par bya ba'i don gyi phyir te /
T03TD3788E:144b-17: chos thams cad rtag pa'i rgyu can yin pas /
T03TD3788E:144b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las 'khrungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:144b-19: sbyor ba'i lam med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang ji skad bshad pa la gnas pa ni phyir mi ldog pa yin pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-20: de la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-21: dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-22: dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:144b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam pa dpag tu med pa bsgoms pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:145a-0: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la phan yon 'di dag yod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa ni @145a * //
T03TD3788E:145a-1: sbyor ba'i lam gyi dus su'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-2: mthong ba'i lam med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3788E:145a-3: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-4: de mthong ba'i lam gyi dus su'o //
T03TD3788E:145a-5: bsgom pa'i lam med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de la bsgom pa'i lam gyi dus su sems kyi phan yon mang po zhig bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-6: sbyor ba'i lam mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang gzugs la sogs pa zhib dang /
T03TD3788E:145a-9: snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ba nyid sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-10: de la dngos po rnams 'gog pas na zhi ba'o //
T03TD3788E:145a-11: rkyen gyi dbang gis na rags la pa'o //
T03TD3788E:145a-12: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yin pas na gsog go //
T03TD3788E:145a-13: rnam par dpyad mi bzod pas na snying po med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:145a-14: mthong ba'i lam mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang nam mkha' stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs pas /
T03TD3788E:145a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-16: bsgom pa'i lam mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang nam mkha' stong pa nyid du bsgoms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:145a-17: bsgom pa'i lam gyi ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyi ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-18: yang nam mkha' zhes smos pa ni bsgom pa'i lam ni mthong pa'i lam las dngos po tha mi dad par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:145a-19: de la nam mkha' stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' zhes smos pas ni gcig yin no //
T03TD3788E:145a-20: nam mkha' stong pa nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin no / de ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa gnyis brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:145a-22: gnyis pa sems dang sems byung rnams //
T03TD3788E:145b-0: @145b sems mi skye dang byang chub kyi //
T03TD3788E:145b-1: snying po yid la mi byed dang //
T03TD3788E:145b-2: theg pa dman pa yid byed dang //
T03TD3788E:145b-3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid mi byed //
T03TD3788E:145b-4: bsgom dang bsgom pa med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:145b-5: de dag las ni bzlog nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:145b-6: ji bzhin don min rnam rtog pa //
T03TD3788E:145b-7: bsgom pa'i lam la shes par bya ;
T03TD3788E:145b-9: de la byang chub kyi sems mi skye ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145b-10: byang chub kyi snying po yid la mi byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang byang chub kyi snying po yid la mi byed do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145b-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yid la mi byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang theg pa gzhan gyi yid la bya ba go skabs med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145b-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la mi byed pa'i nam par rtog pa ni gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba mi 'dor bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:145b-14: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi rgyu ba de ltar spyad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:145b-15: de ltar mngon par bsgrub par gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:145b-18: bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:145b-19: theg pa chen po skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145b-20: bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni de ltar bsgoms pa nyid kyis de ni rgyun chags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:145b-21: 'dod pa'i don yin par mi 'thad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:145b-22: bsgom pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de ltar bsgoms pa nyid kyis mi slob pa'i dus su dor ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:145b-24: bsgom pa ma yin pa yang med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang bsgoms pas kyang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:145b-25: ma bsgoms pas kyang ma yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:145b-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pas bar du chod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:146a-0: ma chod pa 'dren mar bsgoms pas @146a * //
T03TD3788E:146a-1: de'i rgyu nyid ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146a-2: don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang zhig mya ngan las 'das pa yang gzhan la /
T03TD3788E:146a-3: thob pa yang gzhan par sems pa'i dbang du mdzad pa ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146a-4: da ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun phyogs 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:146a-5: de la re zhig / sems can btags pa'i spyod yul dang //
T03TD3788E:146a-6: chos btags pa dang stong min nyid //
T03TD3788E:146a-7: chags dang rab 'byed bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:146a-8: dngos por byed dang theg gsum dang //
T03TD3788E:146a-9: yon ni dag pa ma yin dang //
T03TD3788E:146a-10: spyod pa rnam par 'khrugs pa la //
T03TD3788E:146a-11: 'dzin par byed pa dang po ni //
T03TD3788E:146a-12: shes par bya ba nyid dang ni //
T03TD3788E:146a-14: de la sems can du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang sems can la sogs pa mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:146a-15: sems can gyi khams su gtogs pa bkag pa'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3788E:146a-16: de lta yin na sems can dmyal ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:146a-17: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du btags pa med par thal par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03TD3788E:146a-18: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3788E:146a-19: sems can du gdags pa dmigs su yod dam /
T03TD3788E:146a-20: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sems can du btags pa ni dngos po med par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146a-21: chos su btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang chos su btags pa la slob pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:146a-22: bcom ldan 'das 'on byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
T03TD3788E:146a-23: gzugs la bslab par gyi 'am zhes bya bas nye bar dmigs pa la bslab pa thams cad bkag pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146a-24: stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bri ba dang /
T03TD3788E:146a-25: bsnan pa med par bslab par gsungs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:146b-0: chos thams cad @146b rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du mthong bas /
T03TD3788E:146b-1: de slob pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yin na /
T03TD3788E:146b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa med par thal bar 'gyur bas /
T03TD3788E:146b-3: rab 'byor spyod pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:146b-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa de'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:146b-5: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i lan gyi bar gyis gnyis dang gnyis su med pa dag dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa nyid du'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146b-6: chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:146b-7: mi dmigs pa dag la chags pa bkag pas de lta na ni sa nas sa gzhan du 'pho zhing de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med de /
T03TD3788E:146b-8: dmigs pa la gnas na de yongs su rdzogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:146b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs su med ces gang gsung pa'i lan gyi 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146b-11: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de ltar chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa med pas /
T03TD3788E:146b-12: ji ltar nye bar dmigs pa de ltar chos rnam par 'byed par mi byed do zhes mi dmigs pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yin par gnang ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146b-13: dngos po'i ched du bya ba byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de yin na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad par mi rigs pas spyod pa de ni su yang byed par mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:146b-15: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma byas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:146b-16: mngon par ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:146b-17: theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de lta yin na theg pa gsum du rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:146b-18: gzugs la mngon par zhen nas de rnams la rlom sems dang ldan pa'i theg pa gsum du rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:146b-20: chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan lngas kyang ma gzigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-0: de lta na ni bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po gsum du lung ston par @147a * //
T03TD3788E:147a-2: rdzas ma yin pa la rdzas su 'du shes pa de zlog par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-3: de ltar bstan pas don dam pa'am de las bzlog pa la zhugs nas /
T03TD3788E:147a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes 'dus byas dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-6: 'dus ma byas la gnas pa bkag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad par gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-7: de lta na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sprul pa la khyad med par thal bar 'gyur bas /
T03TD3788E:147a-8: byed pa po'i sprul pa dang bcas pa'i dgongs pa shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-9: de gnyi ga'i don byed pa'i khyad par bye brag med par gsungs pas /
T03TD3788E:147a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i smon lam gyi rjes su byed pas de gnyi ga'i khyad par brjod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-11: sprul par mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang sprul pa'i dpes byed pa po'i rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i dpes zhes bstan pa yin no /
T03TD3788E:147a-12: yon ma dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang de lta yin na yon yongs su dag pa med pas /
T03TD3788E:147a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dang sprul pa de dag chos nyid kyi dbye ba med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:147a-14: yon gyi gnas khyad par du 'gyur ba med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i byams pa'i sems dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-16: de yid la byas shing nam mkha' la me tog 'thor bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-17: sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dag kyang yon phul ba des sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:147a-18: dgu pa spyod pa rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos nyid mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod pa gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-19: de lta na ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos la nges par rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:147a-20: gzhan dag rnam pa med pa de la 'jug par bya ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnams kyi ming dang mtshan ma ston pas chos nyid 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:147b-1: rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba ni skyes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:147b-2: bud med smos pas za ma dang /
T03TD3788E:147b-4: 'bras bu ston pa la sogs pa'am /
T03TD3788E:147b-6: rigs kyi khyad par smos pa ni rigs bzhi rnam par dag pa shes par bya ba'i don no //
T03TD3788E:147b-7: bu dang bu mo zhes smos pa ni rab tu byung ba'i skye bo dang /
T03TD3788E:147b-8: rjes su mthun par smra ba shes par bya ba'i don yin no //
T03TD3788E:147b-9: rigs smos pas ni rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dam pa'i chos la dbang du bya ba shes par bya ba'i don no //
T03TD3788E:147b-10: yang 'am zhes smos pa ni skye gnas dang /
T03TD3788E:147b-11: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i dpes ni skal ba can du gyur pa'i nyes pas rigs ngan par gyur pa dag kyang 'dir skal ba dang ldan pa'i dbang du byas par shes par bya ba'i don yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:147b-12: da ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa brjod par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:147b-13: sems can btags pa de yi rgyu'i //
T03TD3788E:147b-14: yul can bsgom pa'i lam 'brel ba //
T03TD3788E:147b-15: de la gnod pa byed pa yis //
T03TD3788E:147b-16: mi mthun phyogs rnams rnam pa dgu //
T03TD3788E:147b-19: ming dang mtshan ma la mngon bar chags pa ma yin te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:147b-20: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bstan pa'i bar gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:147b-21: ji ltar rnam pa dgu yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:147b-23: thams cad mkhyen nyid gsum dag gi //
T03TD3788E:147b-24: bdag nyid ji bzhin sgrib rnam gsum //
T03TD3788E:147b-25: zhi bde bzhin nyid sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:147b-26: mtshungs par ldan dang mi ldan dang //
T03TD3788E:147b-27: mi mnyam sdug bsngal la sogs dang //
T03TD3788E:147b-28: nyon mongs rnams kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03TD3788E:147b-29: gnyis su med la kun rmongs dang //
T03TD3788E:147b-30: rnam par rtog pa tha mar bzhed //
T03TD3788E:147b-32: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la kun du rmongs pa ni gang ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:147b-35: mtshan ma gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas /
T03TD3788E:148a-0: de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad @148a * //
T03TD3788E:148a-1: mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-2: lam shes pa nyid la kun du rmongs pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:148a-3: rab 'byor lam thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bskyed par bya zhes pa la sogs pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-4: thams cad shes pa nyid la kun du rmongs pa ni gang /
T03TD3788E:148a-5: rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni nang dang phyi'i bdag nyid can gyi chos 'di dag yin la /
T03TD3788E:148a-6: de dag thams cad nyan thos dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-7: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes te zhes bya ba la sogs pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-8: lam la kun du rmongs pa ni gang lam la gnas pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:148a-9: 'phags pa'i lam gang zag thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi pha rol tu 'gro ba yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-11: de dag dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-12: mi ldan pa la kun du rmongs pa ni gang yang de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-14: chos kyi dbyings 'di khongs su chud pa'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-15: chos gang gis kyang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-16: mi ldan pa la sogs pa'i don gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-17: mi mnyam pa nyid ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:148a-18: de la rmongs pa ni gang yang phyir rgol ba dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-21: theg pa gzhan thams cad kyis mi chod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-22: mi mthun pa'i don gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-23: sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la kun du rmongs pa ni gang yang sdug bsngal gyi don nam /
T03TD3788E:148a-24: sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa'i don la spyad par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148a-25: nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la kun du rmongs pa ni gang yang 'dod chags dang /
T03TD3788E:148a-27: gti mug gi don la spyod pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T03TD3788E:148a-31: gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang gi yang don mi byed /
T03TD3788E:148b-0: don ma yin pa yang mi byed do zhes 'thad pa bstan pa @148b yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-1: de ltar na chos thams cad kyi don dang don ma yin pa la spyod pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03TD3788E:148b-4: chos gang don du bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:148b-5: don med par bya ba ma dmigs te /
T03TD3788E:148b-7: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang mi byed pas /
T03TD3788E:148b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang don mi byed pa bkag pas /
T03TD3788E:148b-9: 'phags pa thams cad 'dus ma byas kyi don gyis na de'i don nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i dpes phan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:148b-10: gnod pa med pas don dang don ma yin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-11: gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:148b-13: de la kun du rmongs pa ni gang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos thob pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:148b-14: gnyis kyi chos shig gnyis kyi chos kyis thob pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:148b-15: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i chos mi dmigs pa na thob pa yin par bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-16: gang gi phyir ji ltar yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbye ba rgya cher bshad pas dngos po thams cad la mngon par zhen pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:148b-17: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs su med pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-18: de ltar byas na dngos po med pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa med pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad med par 'gyur zhes zhus pa la /
T03TD3788E:148b-21: thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:148b-22: 'dus ma byas pa ni 'byung ba med pa nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi mtshan mar byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lan yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-24: don dam pa'i tshig gis don du btags pa med pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:148b-25: phyi ma'i mtha' shes pas mtha' yongs su chad pa ni zhus pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:148b-26: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la de'i mtha' mi shes pas mi shes pa dang ldan pa la de bstan to zhes bya ba ni lan yin no //
T03TD3788E:149a-1: med pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:149a-2: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:149a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa la sems can du btags pa yang mi dmigs shing /
T03TD3788E:149a-4: sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'brel ba ni dka' ba byed pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:149a-5: yams nad 'di rnams zad nas ni //
T03TD3788E:149a-6: yun ring lon nas dbugs phyin ltar //
T03TD3788E:149a-7: rnam pa kun du 'gro ba yi //
T03TD3788E:149a-8: bde bsgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun //
T03TD3788E:149a-9: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin //
T03TD3788E:149a-10: 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' ba yi //
T03TD3788E:149a-11: sems dpa' chen po de la ni //
T03TD3788E:149a-12: rnam pa kun du rten par byed //
T03TD3788E:149a-14: gang ljang bu'i sdong bu dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-17: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi zhing nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:149a-18: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bde ba'i longs spyod mchog mang zhing /
T03TD3788E:149a-19: sna tshogs pa'i don gyis na skyed mos tshal bzang po dang 'dra bar 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' zhing mdzes pa de lta bu de ni bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:149a-21: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'thob pa'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-22: de ltar de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na /
T03TD3788E:149a-23: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-24: las rang gis byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-26: dus kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-27: sems can rnams kyi don dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-28: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-29: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T03TD3788E:149a-31: sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phan yon thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:149a-34: skyes bu la la zhig ljang bu bskyed par 'dod la /
T03TD3788E:149a-35: skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmigs /
T03TD3788E:149b-2: 'bras bu ma dmigs par ljang bu de'i sdong bu bskyed de /
T03TD3788E:149b-3: dus dus su chus bran zhing /
T03TD3788E:149b-4: de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga dang /
T03TD3788E:149b-7: 'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:149b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par 'jug ste /
T03TD3788E:149b-9: de dag rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
T03TD3788E:149b-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de /
T03TD3788E:149b-13: 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:149b-14: de la lo ma ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la brten cing sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i //
T03TD3788E:149b-15: me tog ni gang la brten cing rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu nas /
T03TD3788E:149b-16: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye'o //
T03TD3788E:149b-17: de la 'bras bu ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:149b-18: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang la brten nas /
T03TD3788E:149b-19: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa dang /
T03TD3788E:149b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rab tu gnas so //
T03TD3788E:149b-22: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi 'bras bu mchog du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:149b-23: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:149b-25: // / sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rtse mo'i de ma thag par chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas de bstan pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:149b-26: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3788E:149b-27: stong dang stong gnyis gsum skye bo //
T03TD3788E:149b-28: slob ma'i phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:149b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med la //
T03TD3788E:149b-30: bkod pa'i dge rnam dper mdzad nas //
T03TD3788E:149b-31: bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni //
T03TD3788E:149b-32: sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de //
T03TD3788E:149b-33: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3788E:150a-0: gang de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'o 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag @150a * //
T03TD3788E:150a-1: thams cad nyan thos kyis la gnas par gyur pa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par gyur pa bas /
T03TD3788E:150a-3: de rnams ni byang chub sems d'a las byung ba nyid kyis na /
T03TD3788E:150a-4: sems can thams cad la dmigs te /
T03TD3788E:150a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni /
T03TD3788E:150a-6: bsod nams mang du 'phel ba nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:150a-7: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la bkod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-8: de bzhin du rigs kyis dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-9: de bzhin du brgyad pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-10: de bzhin du mthong pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-11: de bzhin du bsrabs pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-12: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-13: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i skyen med par zhugs pa la bzhag pas bas byang chub sems pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa'i bsod nams mang du skye ba nyid kyis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'tshang rgya ba nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:150a-16: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la zhugs pa ni 'bras bu bzhi'i gnas la zhugs par gyur pa yin gyi gnas brgyad pa la ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:150a-17: de ji lar khong du chud par bya zhe na /
T03TD3788E:150a-18: gang gi phyir rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par smos te /
T03TD3788E:150a-19: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams ches mang du rab tu sdud pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:150a-20: yang ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rjes thogs la de ma thag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir sangs rgya ba nyid do //
T03TD3788E:150a-22: de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid //
T03TD3788E:150a-24: rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la bya'o //
T03TD3788E:150a-26: 'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de //
T03TD3788E:150a-27: bdag po dran pa yin par bzhed //
T03TD3788E:150a-28: rnam pa zhi nyid ces bya ba ni gang de'i dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:150a-30: rnam pa la lan du dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:150b-0: bdag po ni dran pa nyid @150b yin no //
T03TD3788E:150b-1: rnam pa ni zhi ba nyid yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:150b-2: 'gog pa shes pa'ang zhi ba nyid yin no zhe na /
T03TD3788E:150b-3: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid pa yin zhes bya ba smos te /
T03TD3788E:150b-4: 'dis ni 'dir rang bzhin gyis zhi ba yin par bshad kyi dngos po 'gog pa'i zhi ba ni ma yin no zhes bshad do //
T03TD3788E:150b-5: da ni log par rtog pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3788E:150b-7: rab tu smra rnams brgyud mar rgol //
T03TD3788E:150b-9: 'di la zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di la'o //
T03TD3788E:150b-10: rab tu smra rnams zhes bya ba ni log par zhugs pa rnams so //
T03TD3788E:150b-11: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud mar sna tshogs par rgol pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'am /
T03TD3788E:150b-12: de la sel ba tsam du smra ba rgol zhing //
T03TD3788E:150b-13: tshig tu smra ba'i lam mthar thug pa med pas shar cher smra ba rtsod pa byed do //
T03TD3788E:150b-15: de'i phyir brjod pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:150b-16: dmigs pa 'thad dang de yi ni /
T03TD3788E:150b-17: ngo bo nyid nges bzung ba dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-18: rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-19: dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-20: sbyor dang dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-21: thabs dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-22: phyin ci log ni lam bcas dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-23: gnyen po mi mthun phyogs dag dang //
T03TD3788E:150b-24: mtshan nyid dang ni bsgom pa la //
T03TD3788E:150b-25: smra ba rnams kyi log rtog pa //
T03TD3788E:150b-26: rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid rten can //
T03TD3788E:150b-27: rnam pa bcu drug dag tu bzhed //
T03TD3788E:150b-29: dbye ba bcu drug tu bzhed ces bya ba'i don no //
T03TD3788E:150b-30: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten pa'i dmigs pa 'thad pa la log par rtog pa ni gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yum shes par bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas brtsams te 'dus byas dang /
T03TD3788E:150b-31: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:150b-33: de'i ngo bo nyid med pas dngos po med pa'o zhes gsungs la /
T03TD3788E:150b-34: gzhan dag de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par 'dri bar bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags zhes zhus pa gang yin pa la /
T03TD3788E:150b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid med par bstan pas /
T03TD3788E:151a-0: chos thams cad ni dngos po med @151a * //
T03TD3788E:151a-1: pa'i ngo bo nyid de zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151a-2: mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid la log par rtog pa ni gang yang de rnams de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:151a-3: de lta yin na byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nas /
T03TD3788E:151a-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa med par zhus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151a-5: rab 'byor chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid /
T03TD3788E:151a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ste zhes bya ba de ni lan yin no //
T03TD3788E:151a-7: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:151a-8: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob kyi bar du dus de srid du byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
T03TD3788E:151a-9: des pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
T03TD3788E:151a-10: skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur nas /
T03TD3788E:151a-11: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi skye bar spangs pas yongs su spong ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151a-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la log par rtog pa ni gang de nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa na /
T03TD3788E:151a-13: dngos po dang dngos po med pa ma gzigs pas /
T03TD3788E:151a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa spyad pa nas /
T03TD3788E:151a-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i bar la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:151a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dngos po dang dngos po med par yid la mi byed do ;
T03TD3788E:151a-18: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03TD3788E:151a-19: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis kyang dgongs shing yid la ma byas pa nyid kyis chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang mi 'bral ba'o //
T03TD3788E:151a-20: chos kyi chos la dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid dang ;
T03TD3788E:151a-21: / chos kyis chos la dngos po med par shes par bya ba la sogs pa mu bzhi'i tshul gyis /
T03TD3788E:151a-22: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung nas /
T03TD3788E:151a-23: dngos po dngos po med ces bya bar ston par rjes su gnang ba'i phyir ro zhes rjes su bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151b-0: bden pa gnyis la @151b log par rtog pa ni gang kun rdzob dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-1: don dam pa dag gis de bzhin nyid mngon par mi shes pa rnams kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151b-2: sbyor ba la sogs par rtogs pa ni gang byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba la gzugs nas 'dus byas dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-3: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la spyod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-4: rjes su spyod pa dag la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151b-5: sangs rgyas dkon mchog la log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3788E:151b-6: gang sangs rgyas zhes bya pa ni yang dag pa'i don brjod pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin par bstan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-7: yang dag pa'i chos la mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-8: yang dag pa'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-9: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon bar rtogs pa'i go rims bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa gsum gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:151b-10: sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151b-11: chos dkon mchog la log par rtog pa ni gang byang chub ces bya ba'i tshig bla dags lus pa la /
T03TD3788E:151b-12: stong pa nyid la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshig bla dags nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-13: yang byang chub ni ming tsam nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-14: yang mi byed pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-15: yang de bzhin nyid la sogs pa byang chub yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-16: yang ming dang mtshan ma tsam byang chub yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-17: yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yin pa /
T03TD3788E:151b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na byang chub nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:151b-19: dge 'dun dkon mchog la log par rtog pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nang byang chub la dmigs pa nyid bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-20: de lta yin na pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa med na de nyid du gnyis kyi spyod pa spangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-21: de lta yin na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i don du gnyis su med pa la brten pa 'phel bar bstan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:151b-22: byang chub sems dpa' gnyis su med par spyod pa ni /
T03TD3788E:152a-0: @152a * // dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel zhing /
T03TD3788E:152a-1: mi 'jigs pa yin pa'i lan gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bstan pa'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-2: sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-3: gzungs rab tu thob pa dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-5: byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral ba dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:152a-7: thabs la mkhas ba la log par rtog pa ni gang de thob pa'i rgyu'i thabs la mkhas pa dang de bstan pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:152a-8: dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:152a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas /
T03TD3788E:152a-10: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
T03TD3788E:152a-13: len pa po mi dmigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su skyob pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-14: de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mkhas pa brjod par rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:152a-15: de ltar thabs la mkhas pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin med par dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:152a-16: rnam par smin pa mi mdzad pas blo mchog dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:152a-18: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:152a-19: mngon bar rtogs pa la log par rtog pa ni gang dngos po med pas dngos pa med pa mngon bar byang chub bar bya bar mi nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-20: dngos pos dngos po mngon par byang chub par mi nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-21: dngos pos dngos po byang chub pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-22: de bzhin du dngos po dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-24: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa mngon bar byang chub par bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:152a-25: de lta na ni mngon bar rtogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur bas mu bzhi la go bzlog pa dngos po dang /
T03TD3788E:152a-26: dngos po med pa mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba ni /
T03TD3788E:152a-27: mngon bar rtogs pa nyid yin par dam bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:152b-0: phyin ci log par rtog pa ni gang gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams rtag @152b pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-8: mngon bar zhen pa'i spros pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-9: de bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-10: yongs su ma shes pa nyid du mngon bar zhen pa'i spros pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:152b-11: de bzhin du skye mched dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-12: khams la sogs pa nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du bsgom pa bsgom par mngon bar zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-13: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-14: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa la mngon bar zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-15: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:152b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las 'da' ba'i bar la mngon bar zhen pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mngon bar zhen pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:152b-18: skyon med par zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:152b-20: sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-22: stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-27: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba la mngon par zhen pa ni spros pa nyid yin pa nyid du shes pas /
