T03TD3788E:152b-28: byang chub sems dpa' ji skad du bshad pa'i spros pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T03TD3788E:152b-30: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid la spros par mi byed la /
T03TD3788E:152b-31: dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa la spros par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gzugs la sogs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:152b-32: gzugs la sogs pa'i spros pa med pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
T03TD3788E:152b-33: spros pa med par rjes su gnang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-34: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i lta bar zhugs pa la /
T03TD3788E:152b-35: rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs la yang ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:152b-36: ngo bo nyid kyis na spros pa med par lta ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:152b-37: skyon med par rdzogs pas dngos po med pa nyid yin no /
T03TD3788E:153a-1: skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i lam med pas /
T03TD3788E:153a-2: ma skyes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i lam dgra bcom pa'i dpes bstan pas lam shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med bar 'jug ba'i 'bras bu thob par bstan pa yin la /
T03TD3788E:153a-3: de nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid kyi skad cig ma gcig la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:153a-4: 'di'i mdo ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na dgra bcom pa ni lam thams cad la bslabs shing /
T03TD3788E:153a-5: yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
T03TD3788E:153a-6: nam 'bras bu'i lam ma grub kyi bar du thob par mi byed do //
T03TD3788E:153a-7: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam bsgrubs shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
T03TD3788E:153a-8: nam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:153a-9: lam la log par rtog pa ni gal te lam shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T03TD3788E:153a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug na brgyad pa la sogs pa'i lam ni gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:153a-11: lam de yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur bas brgyad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:153a-12: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:153a-13: byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:153a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:153a-15: shes pa dang mthong ba dag gis dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la sogs pa'i sa brgyad po las yongs su 'das nas /
T03TD3788E:153a-16: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
T03TD3788E:153a-17: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:153a-19: brgyad pa la sogs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-0: spong ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang po kho nar nyan thos kyi lam gyis de'i rtogs pa @153b thob pa mngon du mi byed pa'i don gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i 'thad pas /
T03TD3788E:153b-1: rim pa 'dis mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /
T03TD3788E:153b-2: 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba sems can thams cad la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:153b-3: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-4: tha dad pa'i bsam pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i lam la zhugs pas /
T03TD3788E:153b-5: lam thams cad kyi rnam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-7: mtshan ma rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /
T03TD3788E:153b-8: de gzhan dag la brjod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-9: bstan pa la sogs pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi lam nyid yin pas /
T03TD3788E:153b-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad go bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-11: rjes su mthun pa'i skad dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-12: brda bya ba'i sgra ni sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar shes par bya ba'i dgos pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:153b-13: gzhan gyi don gyi thabs phun sum tshogs par shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-14: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T03TD3788E:153b-15: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pas gzhan gyi don gyi sbyor ba don yod par bya ba nyid shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-16: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro rnams kyi lam dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-17: de'i 'bras bu shes nas de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu las bzlog pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:153b-18: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam dang ;
T03TD3788E:153b-19: 'bras bu la sogs pa shes par bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:153b-20: byang chub kyi phyogs nas snying rje chen po'i bar du shes par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
T03TD3788E:153b-21: sems can lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la bkod pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:153b-23: de ni 'di ltar des skyes pa'i dbang po shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas so //
T03TD3788E:153b-24: shin tu shes par byas pa zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu rnam par dbye bas rab tu rnam par shes pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3788E:153b-25: skyes pa smos pa ni bud med kyang dgag pa yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:154a-0: sgra las skyes pa smos par bud med kyang sdud pa yin @154a * //
T03TD3788E:154a-2: dbang po de dag kyang dad pa la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:154a-3: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang byang chub pa'i chos de dag ni ldan pa yang ma lags /
T03TD3788E:154a-4: mi ldan pa yang ma lags /
T03TD3788E:154a-7: mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na ji ltar byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ba lags zhes zhus pa la sems can rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi don du 'di skad du /
T03TD3788E:154a-8: 'di dag bdag gis bshad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:154a-10: gnyen po'i phyogs la log par rtog pa ni gang rab 'byor de ni 'dir gzugs gang yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:154a-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar gyi chos gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ni ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:154a-12: mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa nyid kyis sems can rnams gzung bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod do //
T03TD3788E:154a-13: de rnams kyis btags pa nyan thos dang /
T03TD3788E:154a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154a-15: mthong ba dag gis rtogs par mi bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:154a-16: rtogs par bya ba nyid kyis so //
T03TD3788E:154a-17: 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:154a-18: bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:154a-19: nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bya ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:154a-20: bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3788E:154a-21: bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:154a-22: rtogs pa'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:154a-24: de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs med pa /
T03TD3788E:154a-27: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
T03TD3788E:154a-28: de dag ni gzugs med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154a-29: bstan du med pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-0: bstan du med pa la sogs pa dag dang lhan cig ldan pa dang bral ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i @154b 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:154b-1: mtshan nyid la log par rtog pa ni gang 'dir gzugs med pa /
T03TD3788E:154b-4: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab nas /
T03TD3788E:154b-5: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dmigs su med pas chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par bya ba yin na ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i las 'da' bar bya ba med par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:154b-6: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa /
T03TD3788E:154b-9: thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par mi bya'o ;
T03TD3788E:154b-11: gal te sngon mtshan nyid med par gyur pa de phyis mtshan nyid yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-12: mtshan nyid med par bslab pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:154b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
T03TD3788E:154b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
T03TD3788E:154b-16: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyibs 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:154b-17: bsgom pa'i lam la log par rtog ni gang chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin na ni de bsgoms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi 'thad pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i las 'das nas /
T03TD3788E:154b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa la sogs pa med par 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:154b-20: mtshan nyid tha dad pa gnyis ka bkag bas de ltar bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:154b-21: ji lta zhe na zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'o //
T03TD3788E:154b-22: gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-23: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-25: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-26: de'i 'dus te reg pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-27: de'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-28: sa la sogs pa'i khams drug dang /
T03TD3788E:154b-30: de'i yan lag mya ngan la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-0: spang ba'i mtshan nyid blang ba @155a * //
T03TD3788E:155a-3: dang po la sogs pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-8: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-9: rjes su dran pa drug nas bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:155a-10: thabs rjes su dran pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-15: sems can la sogs pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-22: dran ba nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-23: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-27: rnam pa thar pa brgya dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-28: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-30: dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:155a-31: rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-32: rtog pa med cing dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-33: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-38: mi skye ba shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-43: sgra ji bzhin shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-44: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-45: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-51: so so yang dag par rig pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:155a-52: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-54: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-57: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-59: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:155a-60: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:155a-61: bsgom pa smos pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi mdor bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-0: rgyas pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa'i dbang @155b du mdzad pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:155b-1: ji skad du bstan pa'i bsgom pa'i lam shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:155b-2: rnam par bsgom pa smos pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya ba'i ched du yin no //
T03TD3788E:155b-3: gzugs la sogs pa spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-4: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba mang po smos pa ni sngar bsgom pa'i lam gyi yul du shes par bya ba'i ched yin no //
T03TD3788E:155b-5: ji lta zhe na zhes dris pa la ji skad du bshad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bag chags la sogs pa'i bsgom pa med pa yin pas dngos po med pa rgya cher bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:155b-8: rab 'byor dngos po'i 'dus shes can la shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do //
T03TD3788E:155b-10: ji ltar dngos po la ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas so //
T03TD3788E:155b-11: gnyen po'i phyogs thams cad bsgom pa med pa la dngos po yod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-12: dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid zhus pa la /
T03TD3788E:155b-13: gnyis po de dag la ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid yin par bstan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-14: gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa zhus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-15: gzugs kyi 'du shes nas 'dus byas dang /
T03TD3788E:155b-16: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes kyi bar du go rims bzhin du gnyis dang gnyis med pa bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:155b-17: ji tsam du gnyis pa de tsam dud ngos po'o //
T03TD3788E:155b-18: ji tsam dud ngos po yod pa de tsam du 'dus byas so //
T03TD3788E:155b-19: ji tsam du 'dus byas pa de tsam du sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal las mi 'grol lo //
T03TD3788E:155b-20: gnyis kyi 'du shes can ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad med do //
T03TD3788E:155b-21: gal te de lta yin na dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad med par 'gyur bas ;
T03TD3788E:155b-23: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te zhes zhal gyis bzhes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' ni dngos po thams cad yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes bkag pas mthun pa'i bzod pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3788E:156a-1: dngos por rtog pa med pa nyid kyi rnam grangs kyi chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas /
T03TD3788E:156a-2: mngon par rtogs pa'i ye shes dmigs pa las tha dad pa'i chos med par shes par byed pa'i don yin no //
T03TD3788E:156a-3: gal te de lta yin na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03TD3788E:156a-4: de la dbang bsgyur ba'i yul brnyes pa la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03TD3788E:156a-5: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:156a-6: 'dod pa rnams las dben sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /
T03TD3788E:156a-9: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T03TD3788E:156a-10: bde ba dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:156a-11: sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T03TD3788E:156a-12: nga nyid dbang du gyur pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid thugs su chud pa'i chos bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:156a-13: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rnam pa thugs su chud par zhes pa'o //
T03TD3788E:156a-14: rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams la sogs pa dngos po zhig yod de /
T03TD3788E:156a-15: ngo bo nyid yod pa'am zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:156a-16: mngon par 'dod pa'i thugs su chud pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:156a-17: de la dngos po ni gang gi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ni bya ba'o //
T03TD3788E:156a-18: med pa ni dngos po'i rgyun chad pa'o //
T03TD3788E:156a-19: de ltar 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten du byas nas rab tu smra ba rnams kyi ma nges pa dang bcas pa'i skabs rgyas par 'phros pa'i log par bsgrub pa'i gnas rnam pa bcu drug tu gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:156a-21: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //
T03TD3788E:156a-22: brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:156a-23: mthong zhes bya dang bsgom pa zhes //
T03TD3788E:156a-24: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03TD3788E:156a-25: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03TD3788E:156a-26: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03TD3788E:156a-27: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3788E:156a-28: log par bsgrub dang bcas pa ni //
T03TD3788E:156b-0: rtse mo'i mngon bar rtogs zhes bstan pa de bshad pa yin par shes @156b par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:156b-1: mngon bar rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'o /
T03TD3788E:156b-3: // / da ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:156b-4: gal te de ltar rtogs pa'i chos ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na /
T03TD3788E:156b-5: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na mthar gyis spyod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:156b-7: mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi bar 'tshal zhing zhes zhus pa gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:156b-8: mthar gyis pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa nye bar dgongs pa'i don yin no //
T03TD3788E:156b-9: de la sems bskyed pa shes par bya ba'i don du spyod pa smos so //
T03TD3788E:156b-10: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa /
T03TD3788E:156b-11: shes par bya ba'i don du ni bslab pa smos so //
T03TD3788E:156b-12: mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam shes pa'i don ni nan tan du bya ba smos so //
T03TD3788E:156b-13: mngon bar rtogs pa'i go rims shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:156b-14: gsum char smos pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:156b-15: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang zhes bya ba rnams brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:156b-16: gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung ma rgyas kyang rung ste /
T03TD3788E:156b-17: chos thams cad dngos po med pa nyid kyis zhes nges par bzung ba la /
T03TD3788E:156b-18: sems can dngos po'i 'du shes can la spyod pa thams cad de las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:156b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug cing mthar gyis spyod pa la sogs pa brtson par bstan pas /
T03TD3788E:156b-20: mngon par rtogs pa'i go rims kyis gzhan gyi don bya ba'i thabs yin bar brdar byas pa'i dngos po'i dngos po shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:156b-21: mthar gyis pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa de yang rnam pa bcu gsum du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:156b-23: sbyin dang shes rab bar dag dang //
T03TD3788E:156b-24: sangs rgyas la sogs dran dang chos //
T03TD3788E:156b-25: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis te //
T03TD3788E:156b-26: mthar gyis pa yi bya bar bzhed //
T03TD3788E:157a-1: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:157a-2: gang de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon bar spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:157a-3: bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:157a-4: sbyin pa mthar gyis spyod pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa shes pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:157a-5: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:157a-6: tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa la 'jug pa la sogs pa la shes pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:157a-7: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:157a-8: bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa'i shes pa la 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:157a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa re re zhing mthar gyis pa'i rnam par 'phel bar re res mthar gyis pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:157a-13: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa ni gang yang de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe /
T03TD3788E:157a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
T03TD3788E:157a-15: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhag par mos shing /
T03TD3788E:157a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs kyi sku la sogs par byed pa la mi byed pas /
T03TD3788E:157a-17: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157a-19: gzugs la ngo bo nyid med pas dngos po med pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:157a-21: dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:157a-22: de bzhin du re re zhing rgyu'i drug pa'i sbyor ba gnyis yin no //
T03TD3788E:157a-23: de ni mtshan dang dpe byad pa la sogs pa'i yid la mi byed pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ;
T03TD3788E:157a-24: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs pa yid la mi byed pas de rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3788E:157a-25: de bzhin du stobs bcu la sogs pa yid la mi byed pas de rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3788E:157a-26: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yid la mi byed pas /
T03TD3788E:157b-0: de rjes su dran pa zhes bstan pa'i @157b sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam pa lngas de bshad pa byas pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:157b-1: de la dang pos ni sems bskyed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-2: lhag ma bzhis ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhis yin te /
T03TD3788E:157b-3: de ltar bslabs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su rdzogs te /
T03TD3788E:157b-4: mthong ba'i lam nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa ni bsgom pa'i lam zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:157b-5: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yod du zin kyang thar pa'i spyod pa la sogs pa rab tu shes pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par rtogs par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-6: de bzhin du dge ba dang /
T03TD3788E:157b-8: lung ma bstan la sogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-9: skyes bu zung bzhi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu bsgoms pas dngos po med pa nyid du yid la byed pas rjes su dran pa yid la bya ba med pa ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-10: dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
T03TD3788E:157b-18: shin tu rtogs pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su bsgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:157b-19: de tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pa'i rjes su dran pa'i yid la mi byed pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-20: de la theg pa gzhan la mi rten pa nyid kyis na ma ral pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-21: yang srid par skye ba rnam par spangs pas rnam par ma zhig pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-24: ma 'dres pa nyid kyis rnam 'dres pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-25: dkar po'i chos kyi cha gcig tu rnam par 'phel ba na skyon med pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-26: skye bar smon lam mi 'debs pa nyid kyis na ma nyams pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-27: ji ltar 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid kyis na mthu dang ldan pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-28: mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pas na mkhas pas bsngags pa'o //
T03TD3788E:157b-29: dbang po rnam bsangs pas na shin tu rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:158a-0: bsam gtan gyi yan lag gi tshogs rgyas pa nyid kyis na ting nge 'dzin yongs su bsgrub @158a * //
T03TD3788E:158a-2: / chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pa bdag la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa med pa ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o //
T03TD3788E:158a-3: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'i rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-4: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa med pa ni lha rjes su dran pa ste /
T03TD3788E:158a-5: mthar gyis pa'i spyod pa la sogs pa shes pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:158a-6: gal te de lta yin na /
T03TD3788E:158a-7: mdo sde gzhan las lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par byas te /
T03TD3788E:158a-9: gtsang ma'o zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar drang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:158a-10: de ni ma 'dres pa'i gang zag la dgongs nas gsungs pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
T03TD3788E:158a-11: chos rnams la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas mthar gyis pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:158a-12: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-13: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-14: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-18: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-20: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-21: rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-26: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-27: snying rje chen po la slob pa na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mthar gyis spyod pa la sogs pa shes pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:158a-28: chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na ni gang thams cad med pa'i phyir gcig tu chad par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-29: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo bo nyid la yod pa'am /
T03TD3788E:158a-30: med pa mi dmigs par de'i lan gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-31: rang nyid la ne ma nur med kyang ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la ltos nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis zhus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158a-32: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na ni sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du /
T03TD3788E:158b-0: bla na med @158b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa med pa zhe na /
T03TD3788E:158b-1: dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la thob pa dang mngon bar zhe na /
T03TD3788E:158b-2: dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la thob pa dang mngon bar rtogs pa bkag pa dang mi dmigs pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158b-3: de thob pa dang mngon bar rtogs pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158b-4: de lta yin na sa bcu la sogs pa gzhag pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158b-5: de nyid kyi phyir mngon bar 'dod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158b-6: ma dmigs pa la sbyin pa la sogs pa tha dad du bya ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:158b-7: de mi dmigs par sgom par byed pa'i khyad par shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:158b-10: rnam gsum rnam bcu zhes bstan pa de 'thad ba dang bcas par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:158b-11: mngon bar rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las /
T03TD3788E:158b-12: mthar gyis pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:158b-14: // / da ni sems kyi skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:158b-15: gang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:158b-16: sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags zhes zhus pas /
T03TD3788E:158b-17: skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par rtogs par nye bar bkod pa'i don gyis so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:158b-18: skad cig ma gcig gi mngon bar byang chub pa de yang rnam pa bzhir shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:158b-19: sbyin pa la sogs pa zag pa med pa gang yang rung ba'i zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig gis bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:158b-20: sbyin pa la sogs pa re res kyang //
T03TD3788E:158b-21: zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:158b-22: thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yi //
T03TD3788E:158b-23: rtogs pa 'di ni shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:159a-0: zhes bstan pas ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su @159a * //
T03TD3788E:159a-1: zin pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
T03TD3788E:159a-2: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:159a-3: gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes ni skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:159a-4: dkar po'i chos thams cad khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa ni ci zhig gis sbyin par bya zhes mtshan ma de mi mthong bar sbyin pa gtong ba ni /
T03TD3788E:159a-5: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i rnam pas skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:159a-6: de lta yin na mtshan ma med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:159a-7: mngon bar 'dus ma byas pa la sogs pas ni /
T03TD3788E:159a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:159a-9: khyed kyi sbyin pa de ltar phan pa med pa /
T03TD3788E:159a-10: mi brten pa des ci zhig bya zhes zer na zhes bya ba slu ba yin du zin kyang mi dmigs par yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T03TD3788E:159a-11: sbyin pa la sogs pa las yongs su ldog par mi byed par ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi dpes pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sogs pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs par gsungs pas de'i lan btab pa dang /
T03TD3788E:159a-12: de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rgya cher mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:159a-15: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo //
T03TD3788E:159a-16: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:159a-17: yang ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i chos gcig dmigs nas bsgom pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad sdud pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:159a-18: don 'di la 'jig rten pa'i dpe byad kyang re zhig bstan dgos so //
T03TD3788E:159a-19: ji ltar skyes bus zo chun brgyud //
T03TD3788E:159a-20: rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na //
T03TD3788E:159b-0: thams @159b cad cig car 'gul ba ltar //
T03TD3788E:159b-1: skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:159b-2: zhes bstan pa ni sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis zhes bya ba ni de'i dgongs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:159b-3: rnam par smin pa'i chos nyid gnas skabs kyi zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig gis mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:159b-4: gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi //
T03TD3788E:159b-5: rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin //
T03TD3788E:159b-6: rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes //
T03TD3788E:159b-7: de tshe skad cig gcig ye shes //
T03TD3788E:159b-8: zhes bstan pa ni gang rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa'am /
T03TD3788E:159b-9: yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:159b-10: rnam par smin pa las byung pa'i phyogs thams cad chos nyid kyi gnas skabs su mtshan ma med pa'i sbyor bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:159b-11: skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa nyid kyis na /
T03TD3788E:159b-12: rnam par smin pa dus gcig tu skyes pa dang mi 'gal bar shes par byed pa'i phyir zhes rgya cher gsungs so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:159b-13: mtshan ma med pa'i chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:159b-14: sbyin la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis //
T03TD3788E:159b-15: chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas //
T03TD3788E:159b-16: chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa nyid //
T03TD3788E:159b-17: skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs //
T03TD3788E:159b-18: zhes bstan pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid chos gcig gi khongs su 'dus pa mi 'thad pas /
T03TD3788E:159b-19: skad cig ma gcig mngon par rtogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur la /
T03TD3788E:159b-20: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:159b-21: rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /
T03TD3788E:159b-22: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:159b-23: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs pas /
T03TD3788E:160a-1: med par skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:160a-2: rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:160a-3: mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:160a-4: 'di ltar chos mthun pa'i dpe don yin no //
T03TD3788E:160a-5: sbyin pa la sogs pa de'i dus su bar chad dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:160a-6: bar chad med par stong pa nyid yid la byed pas kun tu spyod pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:160a-7: chos bsags pa yang dgos par shes par bsam pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:160a-8: rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su ni chos rnams ro gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:160a-9: dbye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:160a-10: de phung po rnams ni shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03TD3788E:160a-11: byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu yin pas /
T03TD3788E:160a-12: phung po rnams dang byang chub ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:160a-13: de bzhin du rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa lnga po mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:160a-14: gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig la mngon bar rtogs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:160a-15: rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid //
T03TD3788E:160a-16: gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar //
T03TD3788E:160a-17: chos rnams gnyis su med pa yi //
T03TD3788E:160a-18: de nyid skad cig gcig gis mthong //
T03TD3788E:160a-19: zhes bstan pa ni rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3788E:160a-21: rmi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:160a-22: de ni chos de dag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:160a-23: chos thams cad gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:160a-24: chos thams cad dbyer med mi dge ba'i chos bstan ba med par thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:160a-25: de brjod pa de 'jug pa'i rgyu btsal ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:160b-0: chos rnams kyi chos nyid brjod du med @160b pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T03TD3788E:160b-1: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni chos kyi skur brtags pa 'byor pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:160b-2: de ltar byas na skad cig ma //
T03TD3788E:160b-3: gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa //
T03TD3788E:160b-4: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03TD3788E:160b-6: de 'das pa'i 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:160b-7: skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa'i don ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:160b-8: kun 'byung la kun 'byung zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3788E:160b-9: lam la lam du yid la byed pa'i bar du zag pa med pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:160b-10: yang dag par ldan pa'i chos rnams la rnam par dpyad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo zhe na /
T03TD3788E:160b-11: de ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi yin par shes pas kho bo cag dang 'gal ba med de /
T03TD3788E:160b-12: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon bar rtogs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:160b-13: 'dir mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod par bya ba mang du yod mod kyi skad cig ma gcig la mngon bar byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid bdag gis nye bar sbyar ba'i rjes su 'brangs te /
T03TD3788E:160b-14: de lta bu 'khor ba thog ba med pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par goms pas rab tu zhen ci bsngags pa'i nye bar dmigs pa la mngon bar zhen pa'i dug gis zin pa las bzlog pa la 'bad par bya ba'i rigs so //
T03TD3788E:160b-15: mngon bar rtogs pa'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:160b-16: mngon bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mngon du 'phags pa'o //
T03TD3788E:160b-17: sam gyi sgra ni nges par brjod pa'o //
T03TD3788E:160b-18: aa'i sgra ni 'gro ba'i don no //
T03TD3788E:160b-20: mngon du phyogs pas yang dag pa ji lta bar nges par 'gro ba'i ye shes rtogs pa ni mngon bar rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:160b-21: mngon bar rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las /
T03TD3788E:160b-22: skad cig ma gcig gis mngon bar rtogs pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T03TD3788E:160b-24: // / da ni chos ku sku brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:160b-25: de yang sku gsum du shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:160b-26: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T03TD3788E:160b-27: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T03TD3788E:160b-29: gang gi phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:161a-2: zag pa med chos rnam kun du //
T03TD3788E:161a-3: rnam par dag 'gyur gang dag yin //
T03TD3788E:161a-4: de dag de yi rang bzhin can //
T03TD3788E:161a-5: zhes bstan pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i chos dbyings yang dag pa'i rang bzhin te /
T03TD3788E:161a-6: ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'di ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i don gyis na /
T03TD3788E:161a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:161a-8: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin par 'jig rten la grags so //
T03TD3788E:161a-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ni de thob par byed pa po ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:161a-10: gang yang rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T03TD3788E:161a-11: chos kyi sku zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:161a-12: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-13: rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni //
T03TD3788E:161a-14: snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-15: zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-16: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni //
T03TD3788E:161a-17: rab tu dbye ba rnam brgyad dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-18: nyon mongs med dang smon med dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-19: mngon mkhyen so so yang dag rig / rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-20: dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-21: mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang ;
T03TD3788E:161a-22: / bsrung ba med pa gsum dag dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-23: dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-24: bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-25: bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-26: skye la thugs rje chen po dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-27: thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos //
T03TD3788E:161a-28: bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-29: rnam pa pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:161a-30: chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin //
T03TD3788E:161a-32: bdag nyid phyis pas chos kyi sku la chos kyi sku zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:161a-33: gzhan du na chos kyi sku ni chos kyi sku'o zhes byas pa na ngo bo nyid bkag par gyur pa dang /
T03TD3788E:161a-34: sku'i don bsags pa la yang 'gro bas 'dus byas su 'gyur ba'i nyes pa yod do //
T03TD3788E:161a-35: de bas na sku zhes brjod pa de la sngon gyi gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i nye bar gdags pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-0: de la byang chub kyi phyogs dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ni bshad pa dang bcas pa'i skabs @161b rgyas par lam gyi tshogs las /
T03TD3788E:161b-1: ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-2: tshad med pa ni byams pa la sogs pa ste /
T03TD3788E:161b-3: tshad med pa la 'jug pa las ji skad du bshad pa'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-4: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gzugs can gzugs la blta ba 'di ni dang po'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-5: nang du gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-6: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas /
T03TD3788E:161b-7: rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-8: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:161b-9: rnam shes mtha' yas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:161b-11: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba'i rnam par thar pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:161b-13: tshor ba 'gog pa'i zhes bya ba gcig te /
T03TD3788E:161b-14: de ltar na brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:161b-17: kun du bskor bas 'di'i mtha' yod pa ma yin pas /
T03TD3788E:161b-18: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:161b-19: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:161b-20: 'di ni nam mkha' rgyur byas pa'o //
T03TD3788E:161b-21: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa de la bsam gtan brten pa'i don gyis ni skye mched de /
T03TD3788E:161b-22: lha rnams kyi gnas dang 'dra bas na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched do //
T03TD3788E:161b-23: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa nyid ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do //
T03TD3788E:161b-24: de yongs su chad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:161b-25: kun du bskor bas 'di'i mtha' yas pa ma yin pas rnam shes mtha' yas so //
T03TD3788E:161b-26: ming nas nam mkhar rnam par shes pa 'jug pas te snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:161b-27: 'di'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa yin pas na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do //
T03TD3788E:161b-28: 'di la yan lag tsam yang lus pa med pas na ci yang med pa ste /
T03TD3788E:161b-29: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T03TD3788E:161b-30: rnam par shes pa dang bral ba la de skad ces ming btags pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:161b-31: bsam gtan 'di yang med pa la brten pas na /
T03TD3788E:161b-32: ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:161b-33: rgya che ba'i 'du shes ni med la phra mo ni yod pas na /
T03TD3788E:161b-34: 'du shes med 'du shes med min te /
T03TD3788E:162a-0: de dang yang dag par ldan pa'i @162a * //
T03TD3788E:162a-1: bsam gtan ni 'du shes med 'du shas med min no //
T03TD3788E:162a-2: 'du shes med 'du shes med min yang yin la /
T03TD3788E:162a-3: de ni chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa nyid kyi skye mched kyang yin pas na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o //
T03TD3788E:162a-4: 'di dag thams cad kyang dmigs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba nyid kyis 'thob kyi /
T03TD3788E:162a-5: yan lag las 'das pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:162a-6: dper na bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-7: zad par sa la sogs pa dmigs pa gcig la dmigs pa ma spangs par rtogs pa la sogs pa'i yan lag las yang dag par 'das par gyur pa yin na /
T03TD3788E:162a-8: 'di rnams ni de lta ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:162a-9: gang gzugs kyi mtshan ma las 'das pa dang po'o //
T03TD3788E:162a-10: nam mkha' las 'das pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3788E:162a-11: nam mkhar zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa las 'das pa ni gsum pa'o ;
T03TD3788E:162a-12: / nam mkhar zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa las 'das pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3788E:162a-13: de ltar na 'di dag thams cad dmigs pa 'di las 'das pa nyid las thob kyi yan lag las 'das pas ni ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:162a-14: de dag thams cad kyang btang snyoms dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-15: sems rtse gcig pa nyid la rag las pa yin pas de dag gi yan lag gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3788E:162a-19: shin tu phra ba'i dog pa las chu dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-20: zheng mnyam pa'i ras gos bzhi po la tshad kyi khyad par med du zin kyang /
T03TD3788E:162a-21: bde ba'i reg pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-22: che ba nyid kyis snga ma las cig shos dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-23: phyi ma las phyi ma phul du byung bar gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:162a-24: de bzhin du 'di dag gi khyad par med du zin kyang bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis phra ba dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-25: zhi ba'i ngo bo nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir snga ma las phyi ma cig shos dag tu phul du byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:162a-26: mchog tu phul du byung ba nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:162a-27: rnam par thar pa'i lhag ma bshad pa ni /
T03TD3788E:162a-28: rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:162b-0: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bsam gtan @162b bzhi dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-1: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-2: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:162b-3: zad par gyi skye mched bcu ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:162b-11: dkar po ste zad par brgyad dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-12: zad par rnam par shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-13: zad par nam mkha' zhes bya'o //
T03TD3788E:162b-14: de la zad par sa ni rnal 'byor goms pa gang zhig dbang du gyur pas bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin las 'das nas sgrib pa cung zad lus pas snyoms par 'jug pas na rnam par rtog pa rags pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:162b-15: yan lag nyam chung ba zhes bya ba'i nyes pa de mthong nas /
T03TD3788E:162b-16: bsam gtan gnyis pa zhi ba nyid du yid la byed pas de gnyis pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:162b-17: dang po la 'dod pa med pa yongs su bzung nas bsam gtan gyi yan lag la so sor rnam par rtog pa na rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi rags pa lam spyod pa la sogs pa zhi ba nyid du nye bar gnas so //
T03TD3788E:162b-18: de'i tshe rags pa'i yan lag spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-19: mtshan ma de nyid sa yin no zhes yang dang yang du yid la byed pas zad par sa la rnam par 'jog go //
T03TD3788E:162b-20: de bzhin du zad par chu la sogs pa dgu po la yang tshul de nyid ltar blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:162b-21: sngar bsgoms pa goms pa dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-24: mtsho la sogs pa las ni ma byas pa nyid du zad par chu 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-25: de bzhin du nags kyi me 'bar ba'i du ba'i rtse mo la sogs pa las ni zad par me 'byung ngo //
T03TD3788E:162b-26: rlung gis phyogs pa'i 'od ma dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-27: ljon shing gi lo ma la sogs pa la rlung 'di gnas te /
T03TD3788E:162b-28: 'di rab tu 'jig par byed do zhes pa las ni zad par rlung 'byung ngo //
T03TD3788E:162b-31: gos la sogs pa sngon po bting ba las ni zad par sngon po'o //
T03TD3788E:162b-34: dkar po las ni zang par ser po la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-37: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa las ni zad par dkar po'o //
T03TD3788E:162b-38: skar khung gi nang du zhugs pa'i zla zer dang /
T03TD3788E:162b-40: rtsig pa'i phyogs kyi snang ba'i tshogs byung ba dang /
T03TD3788E:163a-1: lo ma'i tshogs kyi gseb nas byung ba'i snang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:163a-2: rlung gis bskyod pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer lta ba las ni zad par rnam par shes pa'o //
T03TD3788E:163a-3: skar khung gi nang gi bu ga dang /
T03TD3788E:163a-5: khung bu la sogs pa las ni zad par nam mkha' skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:163a-6: gang yang bsgom pa ma byas pa'i las dang po pa la ni rnal 'byor 'di lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur bas /
T03TD3788E:163a-7: de yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:163a-8: des sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye ba dang bral ba'i bar snang ngam /
T03TD3788E:163a-9: gos gtsang ma las 'dzag pa'i gzhong pa la sogs pa'i snod gang yang rung ba chus bkang ba gnas shin tu bzang por bzhag la bde bar 'dug nas yid la byed pa brtsams par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:163a-10: de ni zad par chu la yongs su sbyang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:163a-11: yang snying po dang ldan pa dum bur gtubs la shing drung ngam /
T03TD3788E:163a-12: stegs bu zla med pa la lhung bzed rtsi btang ba'i tshul gyis 'bar bar byas la bug pa mtho gang ba'am /
T03TD3788E:163a-13: sor bzhi pa zhig btod de /
T03TD3788E:163a-15: re lde gang yang rung ba'i stan mdun du bzhag pa la bde bar 'dug nas 'og rdza dang /
T03TD3788E:163a-16: shing rnams la steng na du ba'i rtse mo yod pa yid la byas la /
T03TD3788E:163a-17: dbus su me 'bar ba'i phung po stug po'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba ni zad par me'i yongs su sbyang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:163a-18: rtsig pa'i bu ga phug pa'am /
T03TD3788E:163a-19: med na yang bug pa'i skar khung gi nang khong seng byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:163a-20: nye bar 'dug pa la yan lag gi phyogs gang du rlung gis reg pa der dran pa gtad par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:163a-21: de ni zad par rlung gi yongs su sbyang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:163a-23: gi ni ga na ri ka la sogs pa'i sdong bu la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:163a-24: ge sar bsal la ras sngon po'am /
T03TD3788E:163a-25: zam tog kha sbyar la sogs pa snod gang yang rung ba bting zhing khengs par byas la /
T03TD3788E:163a-26: ras sngon po de rnga bo che'i kha ltar g-yogs pa'am /
T03TD3788E:163a-29: mig sman sngon po la sogs pa'am /
T03TD3788E:163a-30: tshon gyi rigs gang yang rung ba bsku zhing rtsig ngos la dkyil 'khor byas shing /
T03TD3788E:163b-0: bsku bzlum po byas shing kha dog mi mthun pa gang yang rung bas yongs @163b su chod par byas la /
T03TD3788E:163b-1: de dang nye bar stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T03TD3788E:163b-2: yid la byed pa la 'jug par byed pa 'di ni zad par sngon po las su rung bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:163b-5: dkar po yang tshul de nyid de khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:163b-6: gang dang gang du sngon po yin pa de dang der ser po la sogs pa'i kha dog tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T03TD3788E:163b-7: yang bum pa'i nang du mar me btang la de'i kha bkab ste /
T03TD3788E:163b-8: bu ga ha cang mi che ba zhig byas la /
T03TD3788E:163b-9: rtsig pa la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas mar me de las byung pa'i snang bas rtsig ngos la phog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yun ring du gnas par gyur pa la /
T03TD3788E:163b-10: de la yid gtod par byed pa de ni zad par rnam par shes pa las su rung bar bya ba'o //
T03TD3788E:163b-14: gos la sogs pas ma bkab pa'am /
T03TD3788E:163b-16: kun nas bkab pa der bu ga mtho gang ba'am /
T03TD3788E:163b-17: sor bzhi pa byas pa de la yid gtad par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:163b-18: yongs su bcad pa 'di ni zad par nam mkha' las su rung bar bya ba'o //
T03TD3788E:163b-19: de ltar na re zhig de dag ni yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:163b-20: de yang rnam pa dgu char yang zad par byas pa'am /
T03TD3788E:163b-21: ma byas pa la 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:163b-22: so sor snang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid gnyis su 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:163b-23: zad par chu gang yin par 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni rab tu g-yo ba'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3788E:163b-26: 'dres pa'i char snang ba de lta bu kho nar gyur nas nye bar gnas pa ni zad par gyi nyes pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:163b-27: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' la bkab pa'i g-yo 'gul med pa ni nor bu'i rlung g-yab 'dra ba'am /
T03TD3788E:163b-28: nor bu las byas pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur nas gnas so //
T03TD3788E:163b-29: zad par me'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni rtse mo'i cha g-yo ba'am /
T03TD3788E:163b-31: 'dir ma byas pa la zad par gyi nyes par shes par bya ba ni mgal me dang /
T03TD3788E:163b-32: me mdag gi dum bu dang /
T03TD3788E:163b-34: du ba la cung zad gnas nas so //
T03TD3788E:164a-0: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' ltar bzhag pa'i @164a * //
T03TD3788E:164a-1: la ba dmar po lta bu'am /
T03TD3788E:164a-2: gser gyi rnga yab lta bu'am /
T03TD3788E:164a-3: gser gyi ka ba 'dra bar nye bar gnas so //
T03TD3788E:164a-4: zad par rlung gi 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni 'o ma bskol ba phog ma thag pa'i rlangs pa'i rtse mo bzhin du gnas so //
T03TD3788E:164a-5: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma ni legs par 'dug pa ltar mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164a-6: zad par sngon po ni me tog ge sar sdong bu med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164a-7: ge sar sdong bu bcas pa dag cig shos 'dab ma phye ba lta bu de zad par gyi nyes par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:164a-8: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma ni zad par dkyil 'khor gyen du 'phags te /
T03TD3788E:164a-9: nam mkha' la nor bu'i rdul yab lta bur snang ba'o //
T03TD3788E:164a-10: zad par ser po la sogs pa la yang tshul 'di nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:164a-11: zad par rnam par shes pa'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid ni sa rtsig pa las gyen du 'phags te /
T03TD3788E:164a-12: zlum po lta bu nyid du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164a-13: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma ni sdug cing dangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164a-15: zad par nam mkha'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni rtsig pa'i mtha'i bu ga dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur la /
T03TD3788E:164a-16: bskyed na yang 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164a-17: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du gyur nas gnas la /
T03TD3788E:164a-18: bskyed na yang 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164a-20: ma byang ba'i zad par 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164a-21: so sor snang ba'i mtshan ma dag gi khyad par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:164a-22: mtshan ma de dgu char la yang bde bar 'dug nas kha dog la brtag pa'i yid la byed pa spangs nas /
T03TD3788E:164a-23: zad par sa zhes bya ba la mig gis ma bltas par brtags pa tsam la sems gzhag par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:164a-24: chu chu me me zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:164a-25: de dang de'i ming gsal ba'i dbang nyid kyis bslab par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:164a-26: de ltar de rnams kyi de dang de la bslabs pa'i khyad par yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:164a-27: de ltar bslabs pa na de rnams la snga ma ltar nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin de rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164a-28: yang gang zad par sa zhes bya ba 'di la dbang thob pa ni mngon par shes pa thob pa yang gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-0: chu la sar sprul nas @164b rkang pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-1: g-yo ba la sogs pa'i khyad par 'di 'byor par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164b-2: yang zad par chu la dbang thob pas sa la byi zul byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-4: chu'i tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-5: chu bo dang rgya mtsho la sogs par sprul pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-6: sa dang ri bo la sogs par ston par nus par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164b-7: zad par me la dbang thob pa ni du ba 'thul ba dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-8: me rab tu 'bar zhing me mdag gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-9: me dang me rnams zil gyis gnon cing gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de bsreg par nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-10: lha'i mig gi yul gyi snang ba bskyed par nus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'am /
T03TD3788E:164b-13: dus su lus bsreg pa la sogs pa la 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:164b-14: zad par rlung la dbang thob pa ni rlung gi 'gros ltar 'gro ba dang ;
T03TD3788E:164b-15: rlung gi tshogs bskyed par nus pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:164b-16: zad par sngon po la dbang thob pas ni gzugs sngon por sprul zhing mun par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:164b-17: zad par ser po la dbang thob pas ni gzugs ser por sprul pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-18: gser du bsgyur nus pa la sogs pa'o ;
T03TD3788E:164b-19: / zad par dmar po la dbang thob pas ni gzugs dmar por sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:164b-20: zad par dkar po la dbang thob pas ni gzugs dkar por sprul nus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-21: gnyid dang rmugs pa thag ring du spong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-22: mun par rnam par 'jig pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-23: lha'i mig gi yul snang bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:164b-24: zad par rnam par shes pa la dbang thob pas ni gzugs 'od gsal bar sprul pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-25: gnyid dang rmugs pa rgyang ring du byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-26: mig gi yul gyi snang ba bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:164b-27: zad par nam mkha' la dbang thob pas ni sgrib g-yogs rnams sgrib g-yogs med par byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-28: sa dang ri la sogs pa'i bar nam mkhar sprul nas /
T03TD3788E:164b-29: spyod lam ston par byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:164b-30: rtsig pa la sogs pa la thad kar thogs pa med par 'gro ba la sogs par 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-0: rgyun mi 'chad par zad par spros pa na zad par @165a * //
T03TD3788E:165a-2: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni brgyad do //
T03TD3788E:165a-4: phyi rol gyi gzugs kha dog phra mo sdug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:165a-5: kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes /
T03TD3788E:165a-6: zil gyis mnan nas mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o //
T03TD3788E:165a-7: de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa ste /
T03TD3788E:165a-8: de bzhin du 'di la bzhir bya ba'am /
T03TD3788E:165a-9: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa nyid la sngon po dang /
T03TD3788E:165a-13: rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3788E:165a-14: de sngon po zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i tshig go //
T03TD3788E:165a-15: kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sngon po nye bar gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-16: sngon por snang ba zhes bya ba ni sbyar ba las byung ba'i sngon po nye bar gzung ba'o //
T03TD3788E:165a-17: mdog sngon po zhes bya ba ni de gnyi ga'i 'od 'phro bar 'ong ba de nye bar gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-18: zil gyis mnan zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-19: zil gyis mnan te zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi lam gyis so //
T03TD3788E:165a-20: zil gyis mnan te mthong zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi lam gyis so ;
T03TD3788E:165a-21: / de ltar 'du shes pa zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:165a-22: zil gyis mnan pa ma yin pa de la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i 'du shes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-23: dpe gnyis las gcig ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T03TD3788E:165a-24: gnyis pa ni sbyar ba'i mdog las byung bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-26: zhes bya ba me tog dang /
T03TD3788E:165a-27: gos dag kha dog sngo ba nyid du bstan pa'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3788E:165a-28: kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni me tog gi dbang du byas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:165a-29: de'i sngo ba ni lhan cig skyes pa yin pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:165a-30: sngon por snang ba zhes bya ba ni gos kyi dbang du byas pa ste ;
T03TD3788E:165a-31: de'i sngon po ni sbyar ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-32: mdog sngo bar mthong zhes bya ba ni me tog dang gos gnyi ga'i dbang du byas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:165a-33: gnyi ga yang mdog tu snang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165a-34: de ltar dper byas pa bas kyang 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:165b-0: ao ma ka lta bu'i me tog phun sum @165b tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:165b-1: yul b'a r'a na s'i'i gos ltar sngo ba /
T03TD3788E:165b-2: kha dog sngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa rigs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:165b-3: ser po la kar ni ka'i me tog dang /
T03TD3788E:165b-4: dmar po la ban du dzi ba ka'i me tog dang /
T03TD3788E:165b-5: dkar po la skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:165b-6: gos zhes bya ba dmigs pa zil gyis mnan pa de'i dbang du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:165b-7: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched do //
T03TD3788E:165b-8: nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:165b-9: bsam gtan la gnas nas pha rol po nyon mongs pa mi skye zhing rjes su bsrung bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i shes rab de dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sems dang /
T03TD3788E:165b-10: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra mi bskyed pas /
T03TD3788E:165b-12: de la nyan thos rnams las sangs rgyas kyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:165b-14: nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lha //
T03TD3788E:165b-15: mi yi nyon mongs yongs spong nyid //
T03TD3788E:165b-16: rgyal ba'i grong sogs de dag ni //
T03TD3788E:165b-17: nyon mongs rgyun gcod nyon mongs med //
T03TD3788E:165b-19: 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni grong la sogs par sems can gang dag mthong nas nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur na mi rung zhes mi'i nyon mongs pa yongs su spong bar 'dod pa yin gyi /
T03TD3788E:165b-20: de rnams la lta ba ni ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:165b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang la dmigs nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs te ;
T03TD3788E:165b-22: shin tu de dag lta bar bzhed nas gzigs nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu drungs nas 'byin par mdzad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:165b-23: smon nas mkhyen pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:165b-24: bsam gtan la de gnas te 'di shes par bya'o zhes smon lam 'byor pas snga ma bzhin du thob ste dus gsum shes pa'am /
T03TD3788E:165b-25: shes par gang dang gang 'dod par 'gyur ba de dang de la shes par bya'o zhes yid kyis smon par byas nas /
T03TD3788E:165b-26: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de nas ldang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:165b-27: smon lam de 'grub par 'gyur zhing shes bya de yang shes so //
T03TD3788E:166a-0: de la nyan thos rnams las sangs rgyas kyi @166a * //
T03TD3788E:166a-1: smon gnas mkhyen pa'i khyad par 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:166a-3: sangs rgyas smon gnas mkhyen pa ni //
T03TD3788E:166a-4: lhun gyis grub dang bag chags spangs //
T03TD3788E:166a-5: thogs pa med dang rtag gnas dang //
T03TD3788E:166a-8: de la lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-9: bag chags spangs zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-10: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya thams cad la 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-11: rtag gnas zhes bya ba ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa la 'jog pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-12: 'dri ba lan kun 'debs par bzhed pa ni zhus pa'i lan thams cad 'debs par mdzad pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-13: nyan thos rnams kyi sgo nas zhes pa ni de las bzlog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-14: mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:166a-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul mngon par shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:166a-18: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:166a-19: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3788E:166a-20: zag pa zad pas mngon par shes pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166a-21: 'di dag bshad pa ni gdams ngag rnam par 'grel pa las ji skad bshad pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:166a-22: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni bsam gtan la gnas te /
T03TD3788E:166a-23: 'di ltar rnam grangs ma rig pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:166a-26: mngon par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa thogs pa med par byon pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni thams cad do //
T03TD3788E:166a-27: don so sor yang dag par rig pa ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams kyi don gzhan la sogs pa'i dgongs pa la thogs pa med par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:166a-28: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni /
T03TD3788E:166a-29: gang yul skye bo rnams kyi skad kyis so so'i yul dang /
T03TD3788E:166a-30: rang dang spyi'i 'du shes tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi chos kyi nges pa'i tshig ste /
T03TD3788E:166a-31: 'di ltar 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pas de'i phyir 'jig rten zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:166a-32: gzugs su rung bas gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166b-0: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang chos kyi rab tu dbye @166b ba la thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:166b-1: de la rab tu dbye ba ni rdzas su yod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:166b-3: don dam par yod pa zhes bya ba ste de dag la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166b-4: rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:166b-7: yang dag par phan 'dogs par mdzad pa la ji ltar bzhed par bzhugs pas na rten yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166b-9: yongs su bsgyur ba la ji ltar bzhed pa'i spyod pas 'jug pa'i phyir dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166b-10: ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:166b-11: ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pas na thugs yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:166b-12: ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3788E:166b-15: tshe la dbang ba ni 'tsho ba bzhed pa la rag las pas bsdus pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob ste /
T03TD3788E:166b-17: longs spyod byin pas sems can rnams tshe dang nges par 'brel ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:166b-18: sems la dbang ba ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod par sems pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T03TD3788E:166b-19: longs spyod byin pas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:166b-20: yo byad la dbang ba ni /
T03TD3788E:166b-21: ji ltar mngon bar 'dod pa'i mchog gi yang dag par nye bar bsdus pa de thob pa nyid yin te /
T03TD3788E:166b-22: sems can rnams la yo byad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yang dag par byin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:166b-25: ngag gi las ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa yang dag par bsdus pa nyid kyis thob pa ste /
T03TD3788E:166b-26: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas thob pa ste /
T03TD3788E:166b-28: sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las dang /
T03TD3788E:166b-29: ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pas mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:166b-30: skye ba la dbang ba ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'gro ba'i skye bas yang dag par bsdus pa nyid kyis thob pa ste /
T03TD3788E:167a-0: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam grub pa yin pa'i @167a * //
T03TD3788E:167a-2: mos pa la dbang ba ni sa la sogs pa gser la sogs par dngos po ji ltar mos pa de'i rjes su 'jug pas yang dag par bsdus pa /
T03TD3788E:167a-3: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:167a-5: sngon gyi tshe rabs su de bzod pas sems can gyi mos pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:167a-6: smon lam la dbang ba ni ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub pas yang dag par bsdus pa /
T03TD3788E:167a-7: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:167a-9: des sngon sems can thams cad kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med par spyad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:167a-10: mngon par shes pa lngas yang dag par bsdus pa /
T03TD3788E:167a-11: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:167a-12: sngon sems can rnams kyi dgos pa ji lta ba bzhin bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:167a-13: ye shes la dbang ba ni /
T03TD3788E:167a-14: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ye shes mngon du byed pas yang dag par bsdus pa /
T03TD3788E:167a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:167a-16: sngon chad sems can rnams ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du mdo la sogs pa'i chos la yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:167a-18: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-19: las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-22: snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-23: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-24: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-25: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-26: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-27: 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-28: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3788E:167a-29: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T03TD3788E:167a-30: de rnams kyi don ni gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i mdo las rgya cher blta'o //
T03TD3788E:167a-31: mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3788E:167b-0: kye ma bdag ni yang dag par rdzogs par sangs @167b rgyas zhes dam bcas na /
T03TD3788E:167b-1: de la chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya bas bdag la gang gis kyang chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas bdag bde ba dang /
T03TD3788E:167b-2: bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /
T03TD3788E:167b-3: mi 'jigs pa thob pa 'di ni dang po'o //
T03TD3788E:167b-4: de bzhin du kye ma bdag gi zag pa thams cad zad do zhes dam bcas pa la /
T03TD3788E:167b-5: de la zag pa 'di rnams zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar 'dir bdag la gang gis kyang /
T03TD3788E:167b-6: chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3788E:167b-8: yang gang bdag gis nyan thos rnams nges par 'byung ba'i lam ston pa na de 'gags par byed cing /
T03TD3788E:167b-9: sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:167b-10: zhes dam bcas pa de la sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ma yin no zhes gang yang rgol bar mi 'gyur ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3788E:167b-12: yang gang zhig bdag gis nyan thos rnams la bar du gcod pa'i chos su bstan pa la de 'gegs par byed cing bar du gcod pa ni ma yin no zhes bdag la sus kyang 'dir chos dang ldan par rgol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:167b-13: de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3788E:167b-14: bsrung ba med pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:167b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste /
T03TD3788E:167b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas zhes gang zhig bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste /
T03TD3788E:167b-17: de ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o //
T03TD3788E:167b-18: sku'i phrin las ji lta ba bzhin du gsung dang /
T03TD3788E:167b-19: thugs kyi phrin las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:167b-20: dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3788E:167b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe la la rna ba btud de gus par nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa dang /
T03TD3788E:167b-22: chos dang don du gnyer ba'i chos nan tan du byed pa dang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par yang mi 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:168a-2: thugs yeng yeng por mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:168a-3: gzhan dag rna ba btud de gus par nyan pa las go bzlog pa rgyas par gsungs pa des /
T03TD3788E:168a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khong khro bar mi 'gyur /
T03TD3788E:168a-6: thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:168a-7: la la gcig tu gus par nyan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:168a-8: gcig tu gus par mi nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am /
T03TD3788E:168a-11: thams cad du btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o //
T03TD3788E:168a-12: bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ste /
T03TD3788E:168a-13: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bya ba mdzad pa gzhan mi mnga' bar 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:168a-14: bag chags yang dag par bcom pa ni 'di na nyon mongs pa spangs pa yongs su zin kyang /
T03TD3788E:168a-15: nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa ltar spyod pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yin par bshad do //
T03TD3788E:168a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de yang spangs shing mi mnga' bas /
T03TD3788E:168a-17: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mi mnga' zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:168a-18: thugs rje chen po ni phan par dgongs pa nyid de /
T03TD3788E:168a-19: gang gis dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum rtog par mdzad do //
T03TD3788E:168a-20: ji ltar rtog par mdzad ce na //
T03TD3788E:168a-21: su'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni yongs su ma smin /
T03TD3788E:168a-22: su'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni yongs su smin /
T03TD3788E:168a-23: su zhig mngon bar mtho ba bstan pa'i snod yin /
T03TD3788E:168a-24: su zhig ni nges par legs pa bstan pa'i snod yin /
T03TD3788E:168a-25: su zhig ni sangs rgyas su 'byor ba'i snod yin /
T03TD3788E:168a-26: gang zhig la ci zhig bya zhes rtog par mdzad do //
T03TD3788E:168a-27: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
T03TD3788E:168a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168a-30: dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168a-32: thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168a-33: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-0: 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa @168b mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-1: brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-2: dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-3: ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-4: shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-5: rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3788E:168b-6: sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
T03TD3788E:168b-7: gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
T03TD3788E:168b-8: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
T03TD3788E:168b-9: 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:168b-10: ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go //
T03TD3788E:168b-11: ma 'dres pa'i bshad pa ni rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par rnam par 'grel pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin no //
T03TD3788E:168b-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:168b-13: la la ni bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bsdus pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:168b-14: gzhan dag ni de dag dang yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:168b-17: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /
T03TD3788E:168b-18: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:168b-19: kha cig na re 'dir gnyen po'i phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par 'chad par 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
T03TD3788E:168b-20: de lta mod kyi don thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nyid du 'chad de /
T03TD3788E:168b-21: de bas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don kha na ma tho ba med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:168b-22: yang gzhan dag ni rnam pa thams cad spangs pa'i dbang du byas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:168b-23: de yang 'di ltar gzhan ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T03TD3788E:168b-25: bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa rnam pa gsum char yang mnga' ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3788E:169a-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bshad pa 'di @169a * //
T03TD3788E:169a-1: dag thams cad kyang legs mod kyi /
T03TD3788E:169a-2: skabs kyi shes bya'i gnas skabs la sogs pa rnam pa bcu pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pas bsdus pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:169a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu legs so zhes slob dpon bzang skyong gis bshad do //
T03TD3788E:169a-4: 'di nyid ni shin tu legs pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:169a-5: dmigs pa yongs su grub pa ni /
T03TD3788E:169a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:169a-7: rab 'byor gang la dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:169a-8: bdag po'i rkyen dran pa yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:169a-9: rnam pa zhi ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T03TD3788E:169a-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:169a-11: de la dran pa bdag po'i rkyen ces bya ba ni /
T03TD3788E:169a-12: gang de dang der rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:169a-13: rab tu ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:169a-14: de yang 'dir ngo bo nyid chos kyi sku yin no //
T03TD3788E:169a-15: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas //
T03TD3788E:169a-16: gang dang gang la gang dang ni //
T03TD3788E:169a-17: gang tshe bya ba phan gyur pa //
T03TD3788E:169a-18: de dang de la de snang ngo //
T03TD3788E:169a-19: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa snang ngo zhes dgongs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:169a-20: de ltar byas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la ji ltar bya zhes pa'i tshul du gnas te /
T03TD3788E:169a-21: sems can dman pa rnams lam la gnas su zin kyang rang gi rgyu yongs su smin pa dang bral bas da rung yang dge ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar ma gyur pas 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:169a-23: lha yi rgyal pos char bab kyang //
T03TD3788E:169a-24: sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar //
T03TD3788E:169a-25: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang //
T03TD3788E:169a-26: sgal pa med pas bzang mi myong //
T03TD3788E:169a-27: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:169a-28: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03TD3788E:169a-29: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:169a-30: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03TD3788E:169a-32: dgongs pa 'dis sangs rgyas ni thams cad du son pa dang /
T03TD3788E:169a-33: rtag pa yin par bshad pas spros pa dang 'gal bar gyur pa ma yin no //
T03TD3788E:169b-0: ngo bo nyid kyi sku @169b bstan nas //
T03TD3788E:169b-1: da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:169b-2: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T03TD3788E:169b-3: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di //
T03TD3788E:169b-4: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03TD3788E:169b-5: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed //
T03TD3788E:169b-7: sku des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa chen po la zhugs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3788E:169b-8: thabs cig tu theg pa chen po'i chos kyi longs spyod kyi dga' ba dang /
T03TD3788E:169b-9: bde ba shin tu kha na ma tho ba med pa nye bar longs spyod par mdzad pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:169b-10: yang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:169b-11: phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
T03TD3788E:169b-12: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel ba dang //
T03TD3788E:169b-13: phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //
T03TD3788E:169b-14: 'di yi sku ni bdun dag ma thob dang //
T03TD3788E:169b-15: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03TD3788E:169b-16: zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs //
T03TD3788E:169b-17: byin pa ae na ya 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03TD3788E:169b-18: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog / pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang /
T03TD3788E:169b-19: spu ni re re nas g-yas legs par 'khrungs //
T03TD3788E:169b-20: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stong seng ge'i 'dra //
T03TD3788E:169b-21: 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum thal gong rgyas //
T03TD3788E:169b-22: 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang //
T03TD3788E:169b-23: sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03TD3788E:169b-24: gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang //
T03TD3788E:169b-25: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems //
T03TD3788E:169b-26: shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang //
T03TD3788E:169b-27: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham bar tshang ba dang //
T03TD3788E:169b-28: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03TD3788E:169b-30: de la phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3788E:169b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa /
T03TD3788E:169b-34: rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
T03TD3788E:169b-36: ba so la brkos pa dang 'dra ba skyes par gyur pa mnga' bar gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:170a-1: mthil sa la mnyam par 'jog cing zhabs 'khums pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-2: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mi dra bas 'brel ba dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-3: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-7: ltag pa'i phyogs mtho ba'i phyir bdun shin tu mtho ba dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-8: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-9: rting ba ring bas rting pa yangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-10: mtho zhing mdun du 'phags la sku drang bas sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-12: long bu mdzes par nub pas na zhabs legs par mtho ba dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-13: spu gyen du g-yas phyogs su 'khyil bas na spu gyen du phyogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-14: ri dags shar ba dang ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu ni drang zhing mnyam la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-15: brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la sleb pas phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-16: glang po che dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-17: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-18: gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-19: sku la rdul mi gos pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-21: shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sdu re re nas skyes shing gnyis su med pas sdu re re nas phyogs g-yas su 'khyil pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170a-25: zla ba brgya las 'phags pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams su brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:170a-26: mdzod spus zhes bya ba ni spu 'jam zhing dkar ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pas gnas pa nyid do //
T03TD3788E:170b-0: sku'i ro stong seng ge dang 'dra ba nyid dang @170b mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel zhing phrag pa mdzes par grub pas dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-1: gser gyi gtan pa phyis pa lta 'phrag [?] so legs par 'grub pas thal gong rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-3: bad kan gyis ljags ma nyams pa dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-4: ro'i dbye ba mkhyen pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-5: sku'i chu dang zheng 'dom du mnyam pas na n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-6: spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu na nyam zhing legs par grub la blta na mdzes par mnga' bas dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-7: me tog autpala dmar po'i 'dab ma'i ma dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-8: tshangs pa dang ka la ping ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-9: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par 'khrungs te blta na sdug pas 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-12: dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar pa'i tshems mnga' bas tshems dkar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-13: chems la mtho dman med pas tshems mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-14: tshems bar mtshams dod pa med pas tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-15: bla 'og dgye sgu med pas tshems mnyam shing bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
