T03TD3788E:170b-16: dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres pa dang shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g-yogs par spyan dkar nag 'byes pas spyan mtshon mthing nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:170b-17: rdzi ma steng 'og tu ma 'dzings shing ba'i rdzi ma lta bu mnga' bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid do //
T03TD3788E:170b-18: 'di la mtshan ni gang gang gis //
T03TD3788E:170b-19: 'grub par byed pa'o rgyu gang yin /
T03TD3788E:170b-20: de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T03TD3788E:170b-23: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de'i mtshan rnams kyi sngon gyi rgyu las de dang yang dag par grub pas /
T03TD3788E:171a-0: mtshan yongs su rdzogs par shes @171a * //
T03TD3788E:171a-2: yang mtshan gang gis sngon rgyu yongs su sbyangs pa'i las de dag gang zhe na /
T03TD3788E:171a-3: bla ma skyes la sogs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:171a-4: yang dag blangs la brtan pa dang //
T03TD3788E:171a-5: bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pa'i //
T03TD3788E:171a-6: dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03TD3788E:171a-7: thar par byed pa dge ba ni ;
T03TD3788E:171a-8: / yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03TD3788E:171a-9: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid ni /
T03TD3788E:171a-10: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T03TD3788E:171a-13: bla ma bsu ba dang skyel ba dag dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-14: chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-16: mchod rten la phreng ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-18: bskor ba la sogs byas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:171a-19: g-yog 'khor byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T03TD3788E:171a-20: de ni 'khor shin tu mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:171a-21: yi dam la shin tu brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste /
T03TD3788E:171a-22: de ni mi g-yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3788E:171a-23: gang gis rang gis rtogs pa'i chos las gzhan gyis g-yo bar mi nus pa'o //
T03TD3788E:171a-24: bsdu ba'i dngos po kun tu bsten pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ste /
T03TD3788E:171a-25: de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas te gang gis ma bsdus pa'i sems can rnams myur du sdud pa'o //
T03TD3788E:171a-28: btung ba ro zhim zhing bsod pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-29: bdun shin tu mtho ba ste /
T03TD3788E:171a-30: de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-32: btung ba ro zhim zhing bsod pa byin pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:171a-34: srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-35: srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-37: sku che zhing drang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-38: sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:171a-39: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-40: dge ba bzung ba spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas /
T03TD3788E:171a-41: zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:171a-42: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa ste /
T03TD3788E:171a-43: de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'am /
T03TD3788E:171a-44: gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:171b-0: 'dir gdul bya ni gang zhig yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams de yongs su @171b smin par mdzad pa'o //
T03TD3788E:171b-1: rig pa dang bzo la sogs pa gus par byas te byin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-2: mchil lham byin pas byin pa ri dags ae na ya lta bu ste /
T03TD3788E:171b-3: de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3788E:171b-4: gang zhig gzhan gyis smras pa'am /
T03TD3788E:171b-5: brdar byas pa'i don myur du 'dzin pa'o //
T03TD3788E:171b-6: nor bdog pa la slong mo'i skye bo phyir ma bzlog par sbyin pa la sogs pa byas pas phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste /
T03TD3788E:171b-7: phyag ring zhing drang ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3788E:171b-8: de la drang ba ni nor bdog cing yod pa blangs pa na sbed pa'i gya gyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:171b-9: ring ba ni slang mo ba'i skye bo phyir ma bzlog pa dang skabs rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:171b-10: de ni yo byad mang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-11: dul ba'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba ni sems la dbang bas ser sna gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gro ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-12: nyon mongs pa thul bas rnam pa thams cad du mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:171b-16: bye bar gyur pa'i sems can bsdums pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-17: tshangs par spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-18: gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste /
T03TD3788E:171b-19: da ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ji srid par sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:171b-26: pags pa shin tu 'dzam pa ste ;
T03TD3788E:171b-30: gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:171b-36: sring mo la sogs pa bla ma rnams la ji ltar 'jam par rim gro byas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-38: bcol ba la bsgo ba rna la ma gzan pas /
T03TD3788E:171b-39: sbu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /
T03TD3788E:171b-40: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste /
T03TD3788E:171b-41: de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172a-0: mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi smod par snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa la @172a * //
T03TD3788E:172a-1: mthun par 'dzin pas ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-2: dbung mgo shin tu zlum par grub pa ste /
T03TD3788E:172a-3: de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang mthu thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172a-4: nad pa rnams la sman dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-7: phan pa'i zas byin pa dang rim gro byas pas thal gong rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni phrag so gnyis kyi phyogs sha rgyas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172a-8: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa brnyes pa nges pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags kyi dbang po ro mi zhim pa dag dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-9: ljags kyi dbang por phyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-10: ro mchog nyid du so sor ba dar par mdzad pa ste /
T03TD3788E:172a-11: de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172a-16: rgal dka' ba la zam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-18: gtsug lag khang gi phreng ba dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-20: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du song zhing bdag gis gzhan la byin pas /
T03TD3788E:172a-21: shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:172a-22: phyag gi 'dom brkyang ba'i zheng gi tshad ji tsam pa zhabs nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:172a-23: dbu'i bar du dkyus tshad de tsam kho na yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172a-24: dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste /
T03TD3788E:172a-25: de ni mnga' thang chen po brnyes pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172a-26: yun ring por tshig snyan zhing 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-27: yid du 'ong ba gsungs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa zhes bya ba ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyis khebs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172a-28: gsung gcig brjod pas rnam pa du mar go bar mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3788E:172a-29: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po'i nang na bar chad pas /
T03TD3788E:172a-30: gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po'i yul du mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsung dbyangs mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172a-31: de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172a-32: gsung dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /
T03TD3788E:172a-33: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:172a-34: mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-0: @172b zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-1: gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-3: ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par go bar byed pa'o //
T03TD3788E:172b-4: de nyid kyi phyir gsal ba zhes bya ste /
T03TD3788E:172b-5: gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyud la go bar mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172b-6: yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spong zhing dus su smra bar gsungs pas na 'gram pa seng ge 'dra ste /
T03TD3788E:172b-7: de ni tshig kun gyis gzung bar 'os pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172b-9: brnyas pa med pa nyid kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas /
T03TD3788E:172b-10: tshems shin tu dkar pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-12: de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172b-13: yun ring po nas bden pa'i tsheg dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-14: phra ma med pa'i tshig tu spyod pas tshems thags bzang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-15: tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste /
T03TD3788E:172b-16: de ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3788E:172b-17: bang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-18: rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-19: ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste /
T03TD3788E:172b-20: de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba spyan phye ba'i tshul dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:172b-21: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas /
T03TD3788E:172b-22: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3788E:172b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-24: gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste sen mo mdog snum pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-25: rigs rgyud mthon po 'byung ba ste sen mo mtho ba yin //
T03TD3788E:172b-26: spyod tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste sor mo zlum pa yin /
T03TD3788E:172b-27: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa nyid kyis sor mo rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-29: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rab tu bsrungs pas rtsa mi mngon pa dang /
T03TD3788E:172b-30: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis rtsa ma dud pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-1: gtsang ba'i blo gros can nyid kyis long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-2: bgrod dka' ba'i gnas thams cad las sgrol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-3: mi'i seng ge nyid kyis ni seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-4: mi'i glang po nyid kyis glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-5: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pa nyid kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs par mkhas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-6: mi'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa nyid kyis khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-7: skor phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa nyid kyis g-yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-8: blta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-9: rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste drang por gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-10: yon tan yang dag par brjod pa nyid kyis sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-11: sdig pa'i chos dang ma sbags pa nyid kyis sku byi dor byas pa lta bu nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-12: gdul bya dang 'tsham par chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-15: thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba'i phyir sku gtsang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-16: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sku 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-17: thugs rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-18: chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir mtshan rdzogs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-19: yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir sku yangs shing bzang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-20: thams cad la thugs snyoms pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:173a-21: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-22: rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:173a-23: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-24: chos shin tu go sla ba ston pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:173a-25: sku shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang ;
T03TD3788E:173a-26: thugs rtag tu ma zhum pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:173a-27: sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173a-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:173a-30: yang srid ba zad pa nyid kyis sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-0: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin tu rnam par phye ba rab @173b tu ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis /
T03TD3788E:173b-1: yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-2: tshig don rnam par dag pa ston pas gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-3: slob ma phun sum tshogs par gyur pa nyid kyis dku zlum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-4: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma sbags pa nyid kyis dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-5: nga rgyal gyis 'gying ba bcom pa nyid kyis dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-6: chos zad pa rnam par ldog pa nyid kyis phyal phyang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-7: chos zab mo rtogs pa nyid kyis lte ba zab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-8: slob ma mthun par mdzad pa nyid kyis lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-9: slob ma'i tshogs kun nas mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-10: thugs shin tu gtsang ba nyid kyis kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-11: dus ma yin pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis sku la sme ba gnag bag med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-12: lus la sogs pa zo mdog bde ba nyid kyis phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-13: rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal pa la byams pa nyid kyis dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa nyid kyi phyir phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-14: mchog tu zab pa'i chos la gnas pa nyid kyis phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-15: phyi rjes su yang dag par yongs su dag pa'i chos ston par mdzad pan yid kyis phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-16: bslab pa ha cang mi ring bar 'cha' ba nyid kyis zhal zha cang mi ring ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-17: 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar gzigs pa nyid kyis mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-18: tshig 'jam po sngon du 'gro bas 'dul ba nyid kyis ljags mnyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-19: yon tan 'thad pa mang po mnga' ba nyid kyis ljags srab ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-20: chos 'dul ba la byis pa ltar chags pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid kyis ljags dmar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-22: 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba nyid kyis glang po che'i nga ro dang /
T03TD3788E:173b-23: dbyangs dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-0: snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba @174a * //
T03TD3788E:174a-1: nyid kyis gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-2: srid pa kun du bsdams pa bcad pa nyid kyis mche ba zlum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-3: skye bo gdul bar dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis mche ba rno ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-4: chos 'dul ba shin tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-5: mnyam pa'i sa la bzhag pa nyid kyis mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-6: mthar gyis mngon par rtogs pa yang dag par ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-7: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa nyid kyis shangs mtho ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-8: 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyis shangs gtsang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu rgya che ba mnga' ba nyid kyi spyan yangs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-10: sems can gyi tshogs drangs pa nyid kyis rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-11: spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa lta bu ltar 'dug pa'i spyan gyis lha dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-14: na chung mchog mngon par dga' bar mdzad pa nyid kyis spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-15: padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu nyid dang rtag tu phyi rjes su gzigs pa nyid kyis smin mtshams ring ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-16: chos 'dul ba dkar po la mkhas pa nyid kyis 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-17: kun gzigs pa nyid kyis smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis bskus par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba nyid kyis smin ma snum par gyur ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-19: mchog tu gnod pa bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-20: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba nyid kyis snyan mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-21: sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa nyid kyis snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-22: lta bas byas pa thams cad kyi gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis dpral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-23: phas kyi rgol ba'i dge sbyong dang /
T03TD3788E:174a-24: bram ze rab tu 'joms pa nyid kyis dpral ba'i dbyes che ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-0: smon lam gyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid @174b dang ;
T03TD3788E:174b-1: yul gyi bung ba'i dga' ba bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-2: mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal spangs pa nyid kyis dbu skra stug pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-3: bstan pa thugs 'jam pas thugs su chud pa nyid kyis dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang ;
T03TD3788E:174b-4: 'dod chags la sogs pas ma ma 'khrugs pa nyid kyis dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-5: rtag tu tshig mi rtsub pa nyid kyis dbu skra mi bshor ba nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-6: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog g-yas su phyogs nas bkram pa nyid kyis dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-7: rnam pa thams cad mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis phyag dang zhabs la dpal be'u dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-10: g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa nyid yin no //
T03TD3788E:174b-11: mdo lhug pa 'di bsdu bar bya ba'i don du tshig le'ur byas pa sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3788E:174b-12: thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-13: mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
T03TD3788E:174b-14: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-15: rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
T03TD3788E:174b-16: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-17: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03TD3788E:174b-18: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-19: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03TD3788E:174b-21: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
T03TD3788E:174b-22: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-23: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03TD3788E:174b-24: gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-25: shin tu gzhon mdog spyan nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-26: sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-27: shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-28: yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-29: gzigs pa mun med dag pa dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-30: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-31: phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni //
T03TD3788E:174b-32: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-33: kun nas blta na sdug pa dang /
T03TD3788E:174b-34: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03TD3788E:174b-35: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-36: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-37: phyag ring mdangs yod zab ring dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-38: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-39: mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-40: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang //
T03TD3788E:174b-41: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-2: rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-3: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-4: mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni //
T03TD3788E:175a-5: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-6: smin dkyus ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-7: snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang /
T03TD3788E:175a-8: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-9: nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-10: dpral che legs par 'byes pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-11: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-12: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-14: mi bshor dri zhim skyes bu yi //
T03TD3788E:175a-15: yid ni 'phrog par byed pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175a-16: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni //
T03TD3788E:175a-17: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03TD3788E:175a-18: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas sprul pa'i sku ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T03TD3788E:175a-19: gang gis 'khor ba ji srid par //
T03TD3788E:175a-20: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag / mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
T03TD3788E:175a-21: thub pa sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad //
T03TD3788E:175a-22: de bzhin las kyang rgyun mi 'chad //
T03TD3788E:175a-25: de bas na de las gzhan pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku'i 'bras bu gnas skabs pas 'khor ba ji srid par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sprul pa lhun gyis grub par 'jug cing /
T03TD3788E:175a-26: sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad par sna tshogs mdzad pa'i sgo nas gnas gyur pas yong su gyur pa'i las kyi dbang du mdzad de /
T03TD3788E:175a-27: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmi ltam lta bur dngos po ma mchis pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la dge ba dang /
T03TD3788E:175a-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa la sogs pa zhes bgyi ba ji ltar rnam par gzhag par 'gyur zhes zhus pa ni byed pa de nye bar dgongs pa byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:175a-31: rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams ni //
T03TD3788E:175a-32: rmi lam yang mi dmigs zhes bya ba nas brtsams te ;
T03TD3788E:175a-33: 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur dgongs nas rmi lam mthong ba mi dmigs so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3788E:175a-34: de sad pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag la dgongs nas /
T03TD3788E:175a-35: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de nye bar ma dmigs pa'i dpes //
T03TD3788E:175b-0: rmi lam ltar bshad pas go rims bzhin du nyon @175b mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nye bar dmigs su med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:175b-1: chos rnam par bzhag ba dka' ba byed pa yin te ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstan to //
T03TD3788E:175b-2: yang chos kyi sku'i phrin las rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3788E:175b-3: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T03TD3788E:175b-4: bsdu ba rnam bzhi la 'god pa //
T03TD3788E:175b-5: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi//
T03TD3788E:175b-6: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-7: sems can rnams don ji bzhin du //
T03TD3788E:175b-8: don dang pha rol tu phyin drug dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-9: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis //
T03TD3788E:175b-10: stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-11: brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-12: lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni //
T03TD3788E:175b-14: mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-15: byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas shing //
T03TD3788E:175b-16: rnam par dag dang nges pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-17: sems can don ni tshad med dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-18: sangs rgyas bsten sogs yon tan dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-19: byang chub yan lag las dang ni //
T03TD3788E:175b-20: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-21: phyin ci log ni spangs pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-22: de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni //
T03TD3788E:175b-23: rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni //
T03TD3788E:175b-25: tha dad yongs su mi shes dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-26: mya ngan las 'das la dgod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:175b-27: sangs rgyas sku yi phrin las 'di //
T03TD3788E:175b-28: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T03TD3788E:175b-30: de la 'gro ba rnam par zhi ba'i las ni 'gro ba lngas bsdus pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:175b-31: gang gi phyir dmyal ba'i 'gro bzhi ba'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:175b-32: rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs nas /
T03TD3788E:175b-33: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
T03TD3788E:175b-34: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te /
T03TD3788E:175b-35: sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu song nas zhes bya ba de dag nas 'phos te /
T03TD3788E:175b-36: lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing rim gyis theg pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3788E:175b-37: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams kyi byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba la sogs pas byol song gi skye gnas zhi ba'i las dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-0: de bzhin du yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa @176a * //
T03TD3788E:176a-1: de dag rab tu 'joms shing gshin rje'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i las dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-2: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la chos bstan pa'i rim gyis theg pa gsum gyi rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-3: tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la chos bstan pas lha'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las yin te /
T03TD3788E:176a-4: rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas /
T03TD3788E:176a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:176a-6: sems can rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar thob par mdzad pa de ni 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs pa 'di ni mi'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las so //
T03TD3788E:176a-7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa yin na de lta na ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes brgal ba la /
T03TD3788E:176a-8: gnyi ga yang gcig tu bstan pas mngon sum du mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-9: ma mdzad pa dag la khyad par med par khas blangs pa ma yin pas lan btab pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:176a-10: bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi la 'god pa ni gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-13: don mthun pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas stong pa nyid la sogs pas rjes su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:176a-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-15: rnam par byang ba la 'god pa ni rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po //
T03TD3788E:176a-16: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la 'di skad 'dems shing 'di skad bstan te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:176a-17: yi ge bsgrub pa'i gzungs la mkhas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas zhus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-18: lan rgya cher gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpe dang bcas pas /
T03TD3788E:176b-0: chos thams cad ma bcings ma grol ba nyid kyis gnas pa med @176b pa'i tshul dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-1: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad skyon med pa pa nas chos kyi dbyings sam /
T03TD3788E:176b-3: yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das pa med pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:176b-5: gal te chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa 'da' ba med pa nyid yin na de ji snyam du sems //
T03TD3788E:176b-6: chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan nam /
T03TD3788E:176b-7: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la gzhan ma yin par zhus pas /
T03TD3788E:176b-8: de gzhan ma yin pa dgongs nas gzugs la sogs pa la yang ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur bas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid can du bstan par bya ba'i don gyis rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas nas /
T03TD3788E:176b-9: de rnam par gzhag pa dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa kun rdzob yin gyi /
T03TD3788E:176b-10: don dam pa ma yin byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-11: de rnams gnyi ga yongs su shes par yang dag pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:176b-12: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa med na /
T03TD3788E:176b-13: chos kyi dbyings la kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas 'bras bu dang po dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-14: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems srabs [*srab?] pas /
T03TD3788E:176b-15: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-16: tha ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-17: gong ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rgya cher gsungs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis par zhus pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-18: dus gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig gis chos thams cad rtogs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes //
T03TD3788E:176b-19: chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji snyed pa khong du chud do zhes lan gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:176b-20: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rdzogs par zhus pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes de bstan pa sprul lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-0: rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar dngos po med pa'i @177a * //
T03TD3788E:177a-1: chos rab tu rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-2: chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin na yang /
T03TD3788E:177a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma lta bu'i chos mthong ba'i skyes bu byed pa nyi dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-4: de lta yin na sems can rnams kyi don byed pa la 'jug pa don med par 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-5: sems can rnams kyis de ltar ma shes pas de 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin par bstan to zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177a-6: de bzhin du 'og ma 'og ma rnams la brgal ba dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-8: gcig nas gcig tu brjod pa'i gnas mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du rgya cher brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:177a-9: kho bos ni gzhung mangs kyi dogs pa'i phyir bsdu ba tsam byas pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177a-10: sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pa ni gang sgyu ma mkhan gyi dpes sems dang po bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-12: rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can thog ma dang bar dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-13: tha ma rnams su chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa med pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-14: gzhan rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rab tu zhugs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177a-16: sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-17: gang de'i 'og tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:177a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no ;
T03TD3788E:177a-19: / rang bzhin gyis stong pan yid la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes rgya cher bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177a-20: gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dgra bcom pa dang /
T03TD3788E:177a-21: rmi lam gyi nang gi dpe gnyis kyis gnyis su med pa la mngon par rtogs pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-0: brdar btags pa shes pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag nyid dbang du gyur pa'i @177b dpes chos thams cad tha snyad du btags pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-1: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-3: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa spang ba la 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu byang chub la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa dag pa la 'god pa ni de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'jog pa ni gang de'i 'og tu sems dang po bskyed pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dang srid pa tha mar so sor nges pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-7: sems can gyi don tshad med pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:177b-8: sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:177b-9: bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes thogs la 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:177b-10: bsnyen bkur bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:177b-11: mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa'i sgo nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par spong ba dang /
T03TD3788E:177b-12: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la nges par sbyor bar 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-0: byang chub kyi yan lag la dgod pa ni gang de'i 'og @178a * //
T03TD3788E:178a-1: tu byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la rab tu 'jog pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-2: las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba chud mi za ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba'i tha snyad 'gro ba lde'i 'khor ba rnam par 'jig pa la rab tu 'jig pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-3: bden pa mthong ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-4: phyin ci log spang ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la phyin ci log bzhi spang ba la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-5: phyin ci log bzhi med pa spang ba'i ye shes la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la sku'i cha shas tsam gyis dngos po bkag pa dang rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa'i dpes phyin ci log bzhi med pa spong ba'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-6: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'jog pa ni gang de'i rjes su tha snyad la brten te /
T03TD3788E:178a-7: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-8: de'i tshogs la nye bar 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:178a-9: mtha' gnyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178a-10: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tha mi dad par yongs su shes pa la 'god pa ni gang 'dus byas dang /
T03TD3788E:178a-11: 'dus ma byas kyi chos dag gcig la gcig tha dad pa nye bar dmigs par sngon du song ba'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:178a-13: de gnyis su rtogs pa'i dus su mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:178a-14: don dam pa rtogs pa nas 'dus byas dag rnam grangs gzhan med pas zhes gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:178b-0: chos rnams stong pa nyid yin pas gang la yang ce yid byed pa @178b yang med pas sems can rnams su 'du shes pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3788E:178b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu byed pa yin par bstan pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178b-2: nyi shu bdun pa mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod pa'i phrin las ni gang chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa las rnam par grol ba dang /
T03TD3788E:178b-3: ma 'dus pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das par sprul pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:178b-4: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3788E:178b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung ji ltar rdzogs par rnyed pa'i tshig gis ni sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:178b-6: phrin las 'di rnams kyi ni so so'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par de dang phrin las kyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ste dpyad par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:178b-7: don yongs su gsal bas kho bo cag gi rnam par ma phye ste /
T03TD3788E:178b-8: btags zin pa btags pas ci zhig bya /
T03TD3788E:178b-10: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03TD3788E:178b-11: de bzhin gzhan ni sprul pa dang //
T03TD3788E:178b-12: sangs rgyas sku mdzad bcas pa ste //
T03TD3788E:178b-13: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T03TD3788E:178b-14: ces bstan pa gang yin pa de bshad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:178b-15: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa man ngag gi bstan bcos las chos kyi sku'i rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T03TD3788E:178b-17: // / de nas da ni gleng gzhi'i le'u gang yin pa las /
T03TD3788E:178b-18: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pa la rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'i padma skyes bu bskur ba de la dgos pa ci zhig yod ce na /
T03TD3788E:178b-19: sems bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3788E:178b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs kyi bar du bstan pa /
T03TD3788E:178b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs ba nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:178b-22: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'i sems can thams cad rnams bsdu bas sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa /
T03TD3788E:178b-23: sems can gyi khams brjod du med pa la dmigs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3788E:179a-0: chos yongs su rdzogs par mnyam @179a * //
T03TD3788E:179a-1: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod pa'i phyir /
T03TD3788E:179a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba srid pas /
T03TD3788E:179a-3: sangs rgyas mang po nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:179a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3788E:179a-7: bsnyen bkur byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par rol pa dang /
T03TD3788E:179a-8: sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3788E:179a-9: rang gi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i dgos pa la sogs yin par bstan to //
T03TD3788E:179a-10: gang gi phyir dang po 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba'i skabs nas brtsams te ;
T03TD3788E:179a-11: nyi khri lnga stong pa'i gzhung 'di yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar 'di ni dngos po gcig tu byas pa ni /
T03TD3788E:179a-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pas na /
T03TD3788E:179a-13: chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i bar du dngos po brgyad du gyur pa yin /
T03TD3788E:179a-15: shes rab pha rol phyin pa la //
T03TD3788E:179a-16: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03TD3788E:179a-17: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03TD3788E:179a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang gsum //
T03TD3788E:179a-19: rnam kun rtse mor bcas pa dang //
T03TD3788E:179a-20: mthar gyis pa dang skad cig pa dang //
T03TD3788E:179a-21: chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste //
T03TD3788E:179a-22: rnam pa brgyad du bsdus pa yin //
T03TD3788E:179a-24: yang mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T03TD3788E:179a-25: sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:179a-26: rab kyi mthar 'gro ba ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:179a-27: go rims dang ldan pa ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:179a-28: mthar thug pa ni skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3788E:179a-29: rnam par smin pa ni chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:179a-30: de ni bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
T03TD3788E:179a-31: mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang //
T03TD3788E:179b-0: de rab de yi @179b go rims dang //
T03TD3788E:179b-1: de mtha' de yi rnam smin ni //
T03TD3788E:179b-2: de bsdus gzhan de rnam pa drug / ces bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:179b-3: gzhan yang dngos po gsum gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus par gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:179b-4: dngos po gsum ni rgyu dang /
T03TD3788E:179b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa gsum ni yul yin no //
T03TD3788E:179b-8: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs pa la sbyor ba bzhi po dag ni rgyu yin no //
T03TD3788E:179b-11: sprul pa'i sku gsum ni 'bras bu yin no //
T03TD3788E:179b-12: las ni 'gro ba zhi ba la sogs pa rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun ni chos yi sku'i phrin las yin te /
T03TD3788E:179b-15: yul ni gsum yin rgyu rnams te //
T03TD3788E:179b-16: sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3788E:179b-17: sangs rgyas sku 'bras phrin las dang //
T03TD3788E:179b-18: don bsdus gzhan yin rnam pa gsum //
T03TD3788E:179b-19: de ltar bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:179b-20: de la gang 'dir de dang der nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa du ma bstan pa las de rnams kyi so so'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T03TD3788E:179b-21: re zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:179b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni /
T03TD3788E:179b-23: nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i las kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa drug gis khyad par du 'phags te /
T03TD3788E:179b-24: dmigs pa'i khyad par ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:179b-25: rnam pa'i khyad par ni mngon par zhen pa med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:179b-26: rgyu'i khyad par ni theg pa gsum gyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:179b-27: yang dag par 'dzin pa'i khyad par ni thabs la mkhas pa dang /
T03TD3788E:179b-28: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:179b-29: yang dag par sbyor ba'i khyad par ni rnam par rtog pa rnam pa bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:179b-30: rnam pa'i khyad par ni chung ngu dang /
T03TD3788E:179b-32: chen po'i rnam pa rnams nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa cig shos las khyad par du 'phags pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:180a-0: de nyid las ji skad du dmigs pa dang @180a * //
T03TD3788E:180a-2: rgyu dang yongs su 'dzin pa yin //
T03TD3788E:180a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:180a-4: lam shes pa nyid gang yin pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:180a-5: nyan thos kyi lam du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun par bstan pa de rnams kyi yang dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par dag snga ma las khyad par du 'phags te /
T03TD3788E:180a-6: dmigs pa'i khyad par ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la stong pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:180a-7: rnam pa'i khyad par ni gzugs stong pa nyid gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:180a-9: 'phags pa nyan thos lam la ni //
T03TD3788E:180a-10: gzugs la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:180a-11: stong pa nyid rnams dbyer med pas //
T03TD3788E:180a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:180a-13: gang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam gyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bstan pa de dag gi yang dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:180a-14: rnam pa'i khyad par dag snga ma las khyad par du 'phags te /
T03TD3788E:180a-15: dmigs pa'i khyad par chos thams cad btags pa tsam du dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3788E:180a-16: rnam pa'i khyad par ni btags pa dang mi 'gal bar chos nyid bstan pa ni rnam pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3788E:180a-17: de nyid las ji skad du btags pa'i chos nyid mi 'gal bar /
T03TD3788E:180a-18: ston pa'i rnam par dro gyur pa //
T03TD3788E:180a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:180a-20: gang rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bstan pa de ni sems can thams cad brten pa'i sbyor ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:180a-21: sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i khyad par dang /
T03TD3788E:180a-22: de dag nyid sems can mnyam pa la sogs pa rnam pa'i khyad par gyis ci rigs par khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:180a-23: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:180a-24: dro ba rnams kyis dmigs pa 'dir //
T03TD3788E:180a-25: sems can thams cad yin par bsngags //
T03TD3788E:180a-26: de dag nyid la sems mnyam sogs //
T03TD3788E:180a-27: rnam pa dag ni bcur bshad do //
T03TD3788E:180a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:180a-29: de ni re zhig nges par 'byed pa'i cha rnams kyis mtshan nyid kyi khyad par yin no //
T03TD3788E:180b-0: de la gang @180b 'dir de dang der mthong ba'i lam rnam pa mang po zhig bstan pa la tha dad pa'i khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
T03TD3788E:180b-1: gang re zhig lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis mthong ba'i lam gang yin pa de ni /
T03TD3788E:180b-2: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag / gang yang rung bar mi ltung ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i lam yin no ;
T03TD3788E:180b-3: / yang de nyid ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:180b-4: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas lam thams cad bskyed par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:180b-5: des yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3788E:180b-6: thams cad shes pa'i mthong ba'i lam gang yin pa de ni theg pa dman pa las 'da' ba'i lam yin no //
T03TD3788E:180b-7: yang de nyid las nyan thos dang /
T03TD3788E:180b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3788E:180b-9: yang rgyun du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yin zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3788E:180b-10: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:180b-11: mthong ba'i lam bstan pa gang yin pa de ni khyad par gyi lam yin te /
T03TD3788E:180b-12: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:180b-13: bsam gyis mi khyab khyad sogs kyis //
T03TD3788E:180b-14: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //
T03TD3788E:180b-15: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gi / khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
T03TD3788E:180b-17: gang yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3788E:180b-18: slob ma dang bcas pa'i lam slob ma'i gnas skabs su gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3788E:180b-19: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:180b-20: mthong ba'i lam dang bzod pa dang //
T03TD3788E:180b-21: shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug ni //
T03TD3788E:180b-22: byang chub sems dpa' mi ldog pa'i //
T03TD3788E:180b-23: mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3788E:180b-25: skad cig ma smos pa thams cad kyang bya ba rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid can du shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:180b-26: ji srid kyis zhes bya ba shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba de srid do //
T03TD3788E:180b-27: yang rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam bshad pa de ni /
T03TD3788E:180b-28: gnyen po'i phyogs kyi lam yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3788E:180b-29: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3788E:181a-0: @181a * // mthong zhes bya dang bsgom pa zhes //
T03TD3788E:181a-1: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03TD3788E:181a-2: rnam par rtog pa rnam ba bzhi yi //
T03TD3788E:181a-3: gnyen po'i rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03TD3788E:181a-5: de ltar de dag gis mthong ba'i lam gyi khyad par yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:181a-6: de ni phyogs tsam yin te /
T03TD3788E:181a-7: phyogs de thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3788E:181a-8: rnam pa kun mngon bar rdzogs par rtogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi sbyor ba bstan pa de dang de'i rnam par rtog pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid brtags shing bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3788E:181a-9: mngon bar rtogs pa'i rgyan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos las /
T03TD3788E:181a-10: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'grel ba'o /
T03TD3788E:181a-12: // / ji ltar grags pa'i lam bzung nas ni 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rjes su 'jug pa yin //
T03TD3788E:181a-13: sangs rgyas lam ni gang phyir blo sbyongs ldan pa'i mkhas la'ang 'di ni mngon sum las ldog gyur //
T03TD3788E:181a-14: de phyir bdag gis 'di ni sngon gyi mkhas pas nyams su myong ba med pa 'gro la phan pa'i phyir //
T03TD3788E:181a-15: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul ni gang yin phyogs tsam mkhas la gsal bar byas pa yin /
T03TD3788E:181a-16: mche ldan glang po'i rgyal po khro ba dang bcas gnod pa gang gis bzlog par nus //
T03TD3788E:181a-17: stobs chen gang gis gnod pa brag ri 'phen med stobs kyis bzod par byed nus pa //
T03TD3788E:181a-18: de ltar bdag dang 'gal ba'i skye bos rab tu gnod pa phra mo yang ni med //
T03TD3788E:181a-19: sa las mkha' ltar skye bo dam pa dag ni thag ring khyad par 'phags //
T03TD3788E:181a-20: kye ma gzhung lugs sna tshogs kyis //
T03TD3788E:181a-21: dub pa dag gi ngal so'i gnas //
T03TD3788E:181a-22: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i lugs //
T03TD3788E:181a-23: ring mo zhig nas mthong ba yin //
T03TD3788E:181a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'grel pa /
T03TD3788E:181a-25: mkhas pa chen po mos pas spyod pa'i sa brnyes pa /
T03TD3788E:181a-26: slob dpon rnam par grol ba'i sdes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03TD3788E:181a-28: // / rje btsun byang chub 'od kyi bka' lung gis //
T03TD3788E:181a-29: bal yul gyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen po sh'anti bha dra'i zhal snga nas dang /
T03TD3788E:181a-30: 'bro seng dkar dge slong sh'akya 'od kyis bsgyur /
T03TD3788E:181a-31: 'di la sha lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya yod /
